translation: Therefore do thou hold Patience,- a Patience of beautiful (contentment).

name: Patience
subtopic2: according to best of deeds and more
translation: And because they were patient and constant, He will reward them with a Garden and (garments of) silk.

name: Patience
translation: Then will he be of those who believe, and enjoin patience, (constancy, and self-restraint), and enjoin deeds of kindness and compassion.
Except such as have Faith, and do righteous deeds, and (join together) in the mutual teaching of Truth, and of Patience and Constancy.

name: On Knowledge
translation: It is Allah who creates you and takes your souls at death; and of you there are some who are sent back to a feeble age, so that they know nothing after having known (much): for Allah is All-Knowing, All-Powerful.

name: Pregnancy
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: O mankind! if ye have a doubt about the Resurrection, (consider) that We created you out of dust, then out of sperm, then out of a leech-like clot, then out of a morsel of flesh, partly formed and partly unformed, in order that We may manifest (our power) to you; and We cause whom We will to rest in the wombs for an appointed term, then do We bring you out as babes, then (foster you) that ye may reach your age of full strength; and some of you are called to die, and some are sent back to the feeblest old age, so that they know nothing after having known (much), and (further), thou seest the earth barren and lifeless, but when We pour down rain on it, it is stirred (to life), it swells, and it puts forth every kind of beautiful growth (in pairs).

name: Strength
translation: It is Allah Who created you in a state of (helpless) weakness, then gave (you) strength after weakness, then, after strength, gave (you weakness and a hoary head: He creates as He wills, and it is He Who has all knowledge and power.

name: Creation
translation: If We grant long life to any, We cause him to be reversed in nature: Will they not then understand?

name: Oneness of Allah (swt)
subtopic2: behavior towards aging parents in your care
towards aging parents in your care
translation: Thy Lord hath decreed that ye worship none but Him, and that ye be kind to parents. Whether one or both of them attain old age in thy life, say not to them a word of contempt, nor repel them, but address them in terms of honour.

name: Prophet Jesus (as)
translation: And remember, Jesus, the son of Mary, said: "O Children of Israel! I am the messenger of Allah (sent) to you, confirming the Law (which came) before me, and giving Glad Tidings of a Messenger to come after me, whose name shall be Ahmad." But when he came to them with Clear Signs, they said, "this is evident sorcery!"

name: Forgiveness
main_Topic2: almost rent asunder by Allah`s Glory
subtopic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
almost rent asunder by Allah`s Glory
translation: The seven heavens and the earth, and all beings therein, declare His glory: there is not a thing but celebrates His praise; And yet ye understand not how they declare His glory! Verily He is Oft-Forbear, Most Forgiving!

subtopic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
translation: They celebrate His praises night and day, nor do they ever flag or intermit.

name: On Knowledge
subtopic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
translation: To Solomon We inspired the (right) understanding of the matter: to each (of them) We gave Judgment and Knowledge; it was Our power that made the hills and the birds celebrate Our praises, with David: it was We Who did (all these things).

name: On The Prayer
subtopic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
translation: Seest thou not that it is Allah Whose praises all beings in the heavens and on earth do celebrate, and the birds (of the air) with wings outspread? Each one knows its own (mode of) prayer and praise. And Allah knows well all that they do.

subtopic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
translation: Whatever is in the heavens and on earth,- let it declare the Praises and Glory of Allah: for He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

subtopic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
translation: Whatever is in the heavens and on earth, let it declare the Praises and Glory of Allah: for He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

subtopic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
to Him belong the Most Beautiful Names
translation: He is Allah, the Creator, the Evolver, the Bestower of Forms (or Colours). To Him belong the Most Beautiful Names: whatever is in the heavens and on earth, doth declare His Praises and Glory: and He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

subtopic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
translation: Whatever is in the heavens and on earth, let it declare the Praises and Glory of Allah: for He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

subtopic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
translation: Whatever is in the heavens and on earth, doth declare the Praises and Glory of Allah,- the Sovereign, the Holy One, the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

main_Topic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
subtopic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
to Him belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth
translation: Whatever is in the heavens and on earth, doth declare the Praises and Glory of Allah: to Him belongs dominion, and to Him belongs praise: and He has power over all things.

name: Guidance
subtopic2: all bounties are in His hand
translation: And believe no one unless he follows your religion. Say: "True guidance is the Guidance of Allah: (Fear ye) Lest a revelation be sent to someone (else) Like unto that which was sent unto you? or that those (Receiving such revelation) should engage you in argument before your Lord?" Say: "All bounties are in the hand of Allah: He granteth them to whom He pleaseth: And Allah careth for all, and He knoweth all things."

name: Qiyamah
subtopic2: all faces shall be humbled before Him
translation: (All) faces shall be humbled before (Him) - the Living, the Self-Subsisting, Eternal: hopeless indeed will be the man that carries iniquity (on his back).

name: Taqwa
translation: To the righteous (when) it is said, "What is it that your Lord has revealed?" they say, "All that is good." To those who do good, there is good in this world, and the Home of the Hereafter is even better and excellent indeed is the Home of the righteous,-

name: Blessings
translation: And ye have no good thing but is from Allah: and moreover, when ye are touched by distress, unto Him ye cry with groans;

name: Ego
subtopic2: to Him belong all glory and power
do not take for friends or helpers
translation: Yea, to those who take for friends unbelievers rather than believers: is it honour they seek among them? Nay,- all honour is with Allah.

name: Grief
subtopic2: to Him belong all glory and power
translation: Let not their speech grieve thee: for all power and honour belong to Allah: It is He Who heareth and knoweth (all things).

name: Hypocrites
subtopic2: to Him belong all glory and power
translation: They say, "If we return to Medina, surely the more honourable (element) will expel therefrom the meaner." But honour belongs to Allah and His Messenger, and to the Believers; but the Hypocrites know not.

name: Qiyamah
subtopic2: all sounds shall humble themselves in His Presence
translation: On that Day will they follow the Caller (straight): no crookedness (can they show) him: all sounds shall humble themselves in the Presence of (Allah) Most Gracious: nothing shalt thou hear but the tramp of their feet (as they march).

main_Topic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
translation: And there is not a thing but its (sources and) treasures (inexhaustible) are with Us; but We only send down thereof in due and ascertainable measures.

name: About Shirk
translation: Say: "O People of the Book! come to common terms as between us and you: That we worship none but Allah; that we associate no partners with him; that we erect not, from among ourselves, Lords and patrons other than Allah." If then they turn back, say ye: "Bear witness that we (at least) are Muslims (bowing to Allah's Will).

name: Taqwa
translation: Serve Allah, and join not any partners with Him; and do good- to parents, kinsfolk, orphans, those in need, neighbours who are near, neighbours who are strangers, the companion by your side, the wayfarer (ye meet), and what your right hands possess: For Allah loveth not the arrogant, the vainglorious;-

name: Forgiveness
main_Topic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
translation: Allah forgiveth not that partners should be set up with Him; but He forgiveth anything else, to whom He pleaseth; to set up partners with Allah is to devise a sin Most heinous indeed.

name: Forgiveness
translation: Allah forgiveth not (The sin of) joining other gods with Him; but He forgiveth whom He pleaseth other sins than this: one who joins other gods with Allah, Hath strayed far, far away (from the right).

name: About Shirk
translation: They do blaspheme who say: "Allah is Christ the son of Mary." But said Christ: "O Children of Israel! worship Allah, my Lord and your Lord." Whoever joins other gods with Allah,- Allah will forbid him the garden, and the Fire will be his abode. There will for the wrong-doers be no one to help.

subtopic2: Maker of the heavens and earth
translation: Say: "Shall I take for my protector any other than Allah, the Maker of the heavens and the earth? And He it is that feedeth but is not fed." Say: "Nay! but I am commanded to be the first of those who bow to Allah (in Islam), and be not thou of the company of those who join gods with Allah."

name: Guidance
translation: This is the guidance of Allah: He giveth that guidance to whom He pleaseth, of His worshippers. If they were to join other gods with Him, all that they did would be vain for them.

main_Topic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
translation: Follow what thou art taught by inspiration from thy Lord: there is no god but He: and turn aside from those who join gods with Allah.

name: On Animals
translation: Out of what Allah hath produced in abundance in tilth and in cattle, they assigned Him a share: they say, according to their fancies: "This is for Allah, and this" - for our "partners"! but the share of their" partners "reacheth not Allah, whilst the share of Allah reacheth their "partners"! evil (and unjust) is their assignment!

name: Verses on Killing
translation: Even so, in the eyes of most of the pagans, their "partners" made alluring the slaughter of their children, in order to lead them to their own destruction, and cause confusion in their religion. If Allah had willed, they would not have done so: But leave alone them and their inventions.

name: On Knowledge
main_Topic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
translation: Those who give partners (to Allah) will say: "If Allah had wished, we should not have given partners to Him nor would our fathers; nor should we have had any taboos." So did their ancestors argue falsely, until they tasted of Our wrath. Say: "Have ye any (certain) knowledge? If so, produce it before us. Ye follow nothing but conjecture: ye do nothing but lie."

name: Taqwa
mainTopic1: Three – Third – Quran – Marium – Isa – Injeel
translation: Say: "Come, I will rehearse what Allah hath (really) prohibited you from": Join not anything as equal with Him; be good to your parents; kill not your children on a plea of want;- We provide sustenance for you and for them;- come not nigh to shameful deeds. Whether open or secret; take not life, which Allah hath made sacred, except by way of justice and law: thus doth He command you, that ye may learn wisdom.

name: Prophet Jesus (as)
mainTopic1: Coloration of Maker – Variegation of Creator
subtopic2: taken as lords by some people
translation: They take their priests and their anchorites to be their lords in derogation of Allah, and (they take as their Lord) Christ the son of Mary; yet they were commanded to worship but One Allah: there is no god but He. Praise and glory to Him: (Far is He) from having the partners they associate (with Him).

One day shall We gather them all together. Then shall We say to those who joined gods (with Us): "To your place! ye and those ye joined as 'partners' We shall separate them, and their "Partners" shall say: "It was not us that ye worshipped!
Enough is Allah for a witness between us and you: we certainly knew nothing of your worship of us!

name: Dawah
main_Topic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
translation: Say thou: "This is my way: I do invite unto Allah,- on evidence clear as the seeing with one's eyes,- I and whoever follows me. Glory to Allah! and never will I join gods with Allah!"

name: Nafs
subtopic2: to Him belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth
translation: Say: "Who is the Lord and Sustainer of the heavens and the earth?" Say: "(It is) Allah." Say: "Do ye then take (for worship) protectors other than Him, such as have no power either for good or for harm to themselves?" Say: "Are the blind equal with those who see? Or the depths of darkness equal with light?" Or do they assign to Allah partners who have created (anything) as He has created, so that the creation seemed to them similar? Say: "Allah is the Creator of all things: He is the One, the Supreme and Irresistible."

name: Nafs
main_Topic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
translation: Is then He who standeth over every soul (and knoweth) all that it doth, (like any others)? And yet they ascribe partners to Allah. Say: "But name them! is it that ye will inform Him of something he knoweth not on earth, or is it (just) a show of words?" Nay! to those who believe not, their pretence seems pleasing, but they are kept back (thereby) from the path. And those whom Allah leaves to stray, no one can guide.

name: Dawah
main_Topic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
translation: Those to whom We have given the Book rejoice at what hath been revealed unto thee: but there are among the clans those who reject a part thereof. Say: "I am commanded to worship Allah, and not to join partners with Him. Unto Him do I call, and unto Him is my return."

name: About Shirk
translation: Allah has said: "Take not (for worship) two gods: for He is just One Allah: then fear Me (and Me alone)."

name: Taqwa
subtopic2: to Him belongs all in the heavens and on earth
to Him belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth
translation: To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and on earth, and to Him is duty due always: then will ye fear other than Allah?

name: Adversity
translation: Yet, when He removes the distress from you, behold! some of you turn to other gods to join with their Lord-

name: Contentment
translation: (As if) to show their ingratitude for the favours we have bestowed on them! then enjoy (your brief day): but soon will ye know (your folly)!

name: Rizq
translation: And they (even) assign, to things they do not know, a portion out of that which We have bestowed for their sustenance! By Allah, ye shall certainly be called to account for your false inventions.

subtopic2: attribute to Allah what they hate for themselves
translation: And they assign daughters for Allah! - Glory be to Him! - and for themselves (sons,- the issue) they desire!

name: Rizq
translation: And worship others than Allah,- such as have no power of providing them, for sustenance, with anything in heavens or earth, and cannot possibly have such power?

name: Swearing
translation: When those who gave partners to Allah will see their "partners", they will say: "Our Lord! these are our 'partners,' those whom we used to invoke besides Thee." But they will throw back their word at them (and say): "Indeed ye are liars!"

name: Taqwa
main_Topic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
translation: Take not with Allah another object of worship; or thou (O man!) wilt sit in disgrace and destitution.

name: On Wisdom
translation: These are among the (precepts of) wisdom, which thy Lord has revealed to thee. Take not, with Allah, another object of worship, lest thou shouldst be thrown into Hell, blameworthy and rejected.

name: Angel
subtopic2: attribute to Allah what they hate for themselves
translation: Has then your Lord (O Pagans!) preferred for you sons, and taken for Himself daughters among the angels? Truly ye utter a most dreadful saying!

main_Topic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
translation: Say: "Call on those - besides Him - whom ye fancy: they have neither the power to remove your troubles from you nor to change them."

name: Not Giving Up
translation: Those whom they call upon do desire (for themselves) means of access to their Lord, - even those who are nearest: they hope for His Mercy and fear His Wrath: for the Wrath of thy Lord is something to take heed of.

main_Topic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
translation: Then We roused them, in order to test which of the two parties was best at calculating the term of years they had tarried!

name: Not Giving Up
translation: Say: "I am but a man like yourselves, (but) the inspiration has come to me, that your Allah is one Allah: whoever expects to meet his Lord, let him work righteousness, and, in the worship of his Lord, admit no one as partner.

name: About Shirk
translation: Being true in faith to Allah, and never assigning partners to Him: if anyone assigns partners to Allah, is as if he had fallen from heaven and been snatched up by birds, or the wind had swooped (like a bird on its prey) and thrown him into a far-distant place.

main_Topic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
translation: Those who join not (in worship) partners with their Lord;

name: Oneness of Allah (swt)
translation: If anyone invokes, besides Allah, Any other god, he has no authority therefor; and his reckoning will be only with his Lord! and verily the Unbelievers will fail to win through!

name: Taqwa
translation: Allah has promised, to those among you who believe and work righteous deeds, that He will, of a surety, grant them in the land, inheritance (of power), as He granted it to those before them; that He will establish in authority their religion - the one which He has chosen for them; and that He will change (their state), after the fear in which they (lived), to one of security and peace: 'They will worship Me (alone) and not associate aught with Me. 'If any do reject Faith after this, they are rebellious and wicked.

name: Zina
translation: Those who invoke not, with Allah, any other god, nor slay such life as Allah has made sacred except for just cause, nor commit fornication; - and any that does this (not only) meets punishment.

name: Dawah
translation: And let nothing keep thee back from the Signs of Allah after they have been revealed to thee: and invite (men) to thy Lord, and be not of the company of those who join gods with Allah.

name: About Difficulties
subtopic2: to Himyou shall be brought (gathered) back
translation: And call not, besides Allah, on another god. There is no god but He. Everything (that exists) will perish except His own Face. To Him belongs the Command, and to Him will ye (all) be brought back.

name: Respecting Others
subtopic2: to Himyou shall be brought (gathered) back
non-believing parents trying to persuade a believer to polytheism
translation: We have enjoined on man kindness to parents: but if they (either of them) strive (to force) thee to join with Me (in worship) anything of which thou hast no knowledge, obey them not. Ye have (all) to return to me, and I will tell you (the truth) of all that ye did.

name: Taqwa
translation: Turn ye back in repentance to Him, and fear Him: establish regular prayers, and be not ye among those who join gods with Allah,-

name: Taqwa
translation: Behold, Luqman said to his son by way of instruction: "O my son! join not in worship (others) with Allah: for false worship is indeed the highest wrong-doing."

subtopic2: to Him belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth
translation: He merges Night into Day, and he merges Day into Night, and he has subjected the sun and the moon (to his Law): each one runs its course for a term appointed. Such is Allah your Lord: to Him belongs all Dominion. And those whom ye invoke besides Him have not the least power.

name: Qiyamah
translation: If ye invoke them, they will not listen to your call, and if they were to listen, they cannot answer your (prayer). On the Day of Judgment they will reject your "Partnership". and none, (O man!) can tell thee (the Truth) like the One Who is acquainted with all things.

main_Topic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
translation: Say: "Is it some one other than Allah that ye order me to worship, O ye ignorant ones?"

name: Dawah
main_Topic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
translation: But it has already been revealed to thee,- as it was to those before thee,- "If thou wert to join (gods with Allah), truly fruitless will be thy work (in life), and thou wilt surely be in the ranks of those who lose (all spiritual good)".

name: Dawah
translation: And O my people! How (strange) it is for me to call you to Salvation while ye call me to the Fire!

name: Forgiveness
translation: Ye do call upon me to blaspheme against Allah, and to join with Him partners of whom I have no knowledge; and I call you to the Exalted in Power, Who forgives again and again!

name: Dunya
translation: Without doubt ye do call me to one who is not fit to be called to, whether in this world, or in the Hereafter; our return will be to Allah; and the Transgressors will be Companions of the Fire!

name: On The Universe
translation: Say: "I have been forbidden to invoke those whom ye invoke besides Allah,- seeing that the Clear Signs have come to me from my Lord; and I have been commanded to bow (in Islam) to the Lord of the Worlds."

name: Forgiveness
translation: Say thou: "I am but a man like you: It is revealed to me by Inspiration, that your Allah is one Allah: so stand true to Him, and ask for His Forgiveness." And woe to those who join gods with Allah,-

name: Ungratefulness
main_Topic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
translation: Yet they attribute to some of His servants a share with Him (in his godhead)! truly is man a blasphemous ingrate avowed!
And question thou our messengers whom We sent before thee; did We appoint any deities other than (Allah) Most Gracious, to be worshipped?

name: Truth and Honesty
main_Topic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
translation: Say: "Do ye see what it is ye invoke besides Allah? Show me what it is they have created on earth, or have they a share in the heavens bring me a book (revealed) before this, or any remnant of knowledge (ye may have), if ye are telling the truth!

name: Qiyamah
translation: And who is more astray than one who invokes besides Allah, such as will not answer him to the Day of Judgment, and who (in fact) are unconscious of their call (to them)?

name: About Disbelievers
translation: And when mankind are gathered together (at the Resurrection), they will be hostile to them and reject their worship (altogether)!
Who set up another god beside Allah: Throw him into a severe penalty.

subtopic2: a bringer of glad tidings and a warner
translation: And make not another an object of worship with Allah: I am from Him a Warner to you, clear and open!

name: Disobedience
translation: O Prophet! When believing women come to thee to take the oath of fealty to thee, that they will not associate in worship any other thing whatever with Allah, that they will not steal, that they will not commit adultery (or fornication), that they will not kill their children, that they will not utter slander, intentionally forging falsehood, and that they will not disobey thee in any just matter,- then do thou receive their fealty, and pray to Allah for the forgiveness (of their sins): for Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
It gives guidance to the Right, and we have believed therein: we shall not join (in worship) any (gods) with our Lord.
And the places of worship are for Allah (alone): So invoke not any one along with Allah;

name: Oneness of Allah (swt)
main_Topic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
subtopic2: begetteth not nor is He begotten
translation: He begetteth not, nor is He begotten;

name: Creation
subtopic2: to Himyou shall be brought (gathered) back
translation: To Him will be your return- of all of you. The promise of Allah is true and sure. It is He Who beginneth the process of creation, and repeateth it, that He may reward with justice those who believe and work righteousness; but those who reject Him will have draughts of boiling fluids, and a penalty grievous, because they did reject Him.

name: Creation
translation: Say: "Of your 'partners', can any originate creation and repeat it?" Say: "It is Allah Who originates creation and repeats it: then how are ye deluded away (from the truth)?"

name: About Disbelievers
translation: See they not that Allah, Who created the heavens and the earth, has power to create the like of them (anew)? Only He has decreed a term appointed, of which there is no doubt. But the unjust refuse (to receive it) except with ingratitude.

name: Qiyamah
main_Topic2: almost rent asunder by Allah`s Glory
subtopic2: almost rent asunder by Allah`s Glory
translation: The Day that We roll up the heavens like a scroll rolled up for books (completed),- even as We produced the first creation, so shall We produce a new one: a promise We have undertaken: truly shall We fulfil it.

name: Truth and Honesty
translation: Or, Who originates creation, then repeats it, and who gives you sustenance from heaven and earth? (Can there be another) god besides Allah? Say, "Bring forth your argument, if ye are telling the truth!"

name: Creation
subtopic1: “The Elevated Places” Between Hell and Paradise
main_Topic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
translation: See they not how Allah originates creation, then repeats it: truly that is easy for Allah.

name: Creation
subtopic2: Travel through the earth and see
translation: Say: "Travel through the earth and see how Allah did originate creation; so will Allah produce a later creation: for Allah has power over all things.

name: Qiyamah
subtopic2: to Himyou shall be brought (gathered) back
translation: It is Allah Who begins (the process of) creation; then repeats it; then shall ye be brought back to Him.

name: Creation
subtopic2: to Him applies the highest similitude
translation: It is He Who begins (the process of) creation; then repeats it; and for Him it is most easy. To Him belongs the loftiest similitude (we can think of) in the heavens and the earth: for He is Exalted in Might, full of wisdom.
It is He Who creates from the very beginning, and He can restore (life).

name: Creation
subtopic2: established on the Throne of Authority
translation: Your Guardian-Lord is Allah, Who created the heavens and the earth in six days, and is firmly established on the throne (of authority): He draweth the night as a veil o'er the day, each seeking the other in rapid succession: He created the sun, the moon, and the stars, (all) governed by laws under His command. Is it not His to create and to govern? Blessed be Allah, the Cherisher and Sustainer of the worlds!

name: Creation
translation: Then We made the sperm into a clot of congealed blood; then of that clot We made a (foetus) lump; then we made out of that lump bones and clothed the bones with flesh; then we developed out of it another creature. So blessed be Allah, the best to create!

name: On The Universe
translation: Blessed is He who sent down the criterion to His servant, that it may be an admonition to all creatures;-
Blessed is He who, if that were His will, could give thee better (things) than those,- Gardens beneath which rivers flow; and He could give thee palaces (secure to dwell in).
Blessed is He Who made constellations in the skies, and placed therein a Lamp and a Moon giving light;

name: Rizq
subtopic2: gives you shape and makes your shapes beautiful
all that is on it will perish
almost rent asunder by Allah`s Glory
translation: It is Allah Who has made for you the earth as a resting place, and the sky as a canopy, and has given you shape- and made your shapes beautiful,- and has provided for you Sustenance, of things pure and good;- such is Allah your Lord. So Glory to Allah, the Lord of the Worlds!

name: Qiyamah
main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: to Him belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth
to Himyou shall be brought (gathered) back
all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: And blessed is He to Whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth, and all between them: with Him is the Knowledge of the Hour (of Judgment): and to Him shall ye be brought back.

name: Generosity
subtopic2: full of Majesty and Bounty and Honour
translation: Blessed be the name of thy Lord, full of Majesty, Bounty and Honour.

main_Topic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
subtopic2: to Him belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth
translation: Blessed be He in Whose hands is Dominion; and He over all things hath Power;-

subtopic2: brings to light what is hidden
knows all you reveal and conceal
translation: (Kept them away from the Path), that they should not worship Allah, Who brings to light what is hidden in the heavens and the earth, and knows what ye hide and what ye reveal.

subtopic2: brings to light what is hidden
translation: O my son! (said Luqman), "If there be (but) the weight of a mustard-seed and it were (hidden) in a rock, or (anywhere) in the heavens or on earth, Allah will bring it forth: for Allah understands the finest mysteries, (and) is well-acquainted (with them).

Send not away those who call on their Lord morning and evening, seeking His face. In naught art thou accountable for them, and in naught are they accountable for thee, that thou shouldst turn them away, and thus be (one) of the unjust.

subtopic1: Supplication – Courtesy – Respect – Begging Praying –Beseeching – Humbly and Secretly
main_Topic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
translation: Say: "Who is it that delivereth you from the dark recesses of land and sea, when ye call upon Him in humility and silent terror: 'If He only delivers us from these (dangers), (we vow) we shall truly show our gratitude'?"

name: On Justice
translation: Say: "My Lord hath commanded justice; and that ye set your whole selves (to Him) at every time and place of prayer, and call upon Him, making your devotion sincere as in His sight: such as He created you in the beginning, so shall ye return."

name: Humility
subtopic1: Supplication – Courtesy – Respect – Begging Praying –Beseeching – Humbly and Secretly
main_Topic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
translation: Call on your Lord with humility and in private: for Allah loveth not those who trespass beyond bounds.

name: Corruption
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: Do no mischief on the earth, after it hath been set in order, but call on Him with fear and longing (in your hearts): for the Mercy of Allah is (always) near to those who do good.

main_Topic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
subtopic2: to Him belong the Most Beautiful Names
translation: The most beautiful names belong to Allah: so call on him by them; but shun such men as use profanity in his names: for what they do, they will soon be requited.

name: On The Prayer
translation: Say: "Call upon Allah, or call upon Rahman: by whatever name ye call upon Him, (it is well): for to Him belong the Most Beautiful Names. Neither speak thy Prayer aloud, nor speak it in a low tone, but seek a middle course between."

name: Remembrance of Allah (swt)
translation: And keep thy soul content with those who call on their Lord morning and evening, seeking His Face; and let not thine eyes pass beyond them, seeking the pomp and glitter of this Life; no obey any whose heart We have permitted to neglect the remembrance of Us, one who follows his own desires, whose case has gone beyond all bounds.

name: About Disbelievers
main_Topic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
translation: Call ye, then, upon Allah with sincere devotion to Him, even though the Unbelievers may detest it.

name: Jahannam / Hell
translation: And your Lord says: "Call on Me; I will answer your (Prayer): but those who are too arrogant to serve Me will surely find themselves in Hell - in humiliation!"

name: On The Universe
translation: He is the Living (One): There is no god but He: Call upon Him, giving Him sincere devotion. Praise be to Allah, Lord of the Worlds!

name: Nafs
subtopic2: knows all you reveal and conceal
takes account of every single thing
to Him belongs all in the heavens and on earth
translation: To Allah belongeth all that is in the heavens and on earth. Whether ye show what is in your minds or conceal it, Allah Calleth you to account for it. He forgiveth whom He pleaseth, and punisheth whom He pleaseth, for Allah hath power over all things.

name: Karma
translation: Whether We shall show thee (within thy life-time) part of what we promised them or take to ourselves thy soul (before it is all accomplished),- thy duty is to make (the Message) reach them: it is our part to call them to account.
See they not that We gradually reduce the land (in their control) from its outlying borders? (Where) Allah commands, there is none to put back His Command: and He is swift in calling to account.

main_Topic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
translation: Therefore, by the Lord, We will, of a surety, call them to account,
Or that He may not call them to account in the midst of their goings to and fro, without a chance of their frustrating Him?-
Or that He may not call them to account by a process of slow wastage - for thy Lord is indeed full of kindness and mercy.

name: On Deception
translation: If Allah so willed, He could make you all one people: But He leaves straying whom He pleases, and He guides whom He pleases: but ye shall certainly be called to account for all your actions.

main_Topic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
translation: He does take an account of them (all), and hath numbered them (all) exactly.

name: Qiyamah
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
souls will not be unjustly dealt with
translation: We shall set up scales of justice for the Day of Judgment, so that not a soul will be dealt with unjustly in the least, and if there be (no more than) the weight of a mustard seed, We will bring it (to account): and enough are We to take account.
(It is the practice of those) who preach the Messages of Allah, and fear Him, and fear none but Allah. And enough is Allah to call (men) to account.

name: Strength
subtopic2: Travel through the earth and see
translation: Do they not travel through the earth and see what was the End of those before them? They were even superior to them in strength, and in the traces (they have left) in the land: but Allah did call them to account for their sins, and none had they to defend them against Allah.

name: Strength
translation: That was because there came to them their messengers with Clear (Signs), but they rejected them: So Allah called them to account: for He is Full of Strength, Strict in Punishment.
How many populations that insolently opposed the Command of their Lord and of His messengers, did We not then call to account,- to severe account?- and We imposed on them an exemplary Punishment.

name: Disobedience
subtopic2: comes in between a man and his heart
to Himyou shall be brought (gathered) back
translation: O ye who believe! give your response to Allah and His Messenger, when He calleth you to that which will give you life; and know that Allah cometh in between a man and his heart, and that it is He to Whom ye shall (all) be gathered.

name: Qiyamah
main_Topic2: Trumpet of the day of judgment
subtopic2: created things in due proportion and Truth (for just ends)
Knower of the hidden and open
translation: It is He who created the heavens and the earth in true (proportions): the day He saith, "Be," behold! it is. His word is the truth. His will be the dominion the day the trumpet will be blown. He knoweth the unseen as well as that which is open. For He is the Wise, well acquainted (with all things).

name: Creation
subtopic2: created things in due proportion and Truth (for just ends)
translation: Seest thou not that Allah created the heavens and the earth in Truth? If He so will, He can remove you and put (in your place) a new creation?

name: Qiyamah
subtopic2: created things in due proportion and Truth (for just ends)
translation: We created not the heavens, the earth, and all between them, but for just ends. And the Hour is surely coming (when this will be manifest). So overlook (any human faults) with gracious forgiveness.

subtopic2: created things in due proportion and Truth (for just ends)
exalted above what they ascribe to Him
translation: He has created the heavens and the earth for just ends: Far is He above having the partners they ascribe to Him!

name: Allah has no son
subtopic2: created things in due proportion and Truth (for just ends)
to Him belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth
translation: He to whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth: no son has He begotten, nor has He a partner in His dominion: it is He who created all things, and ordered them in due proportions.

subtopic2: created things in due proportion and Truth (for just ends)
translation: Allah created the heavens and the earth in true (proportions): verily in that is a Sign for those who believe.

name: Qiyamah
subtopic2: created things in due proportion and Truth (for just ends)
translation: Do they not reflect in their own minds? Not but for just ends and for a term appointed, did Allah create the heavens and the earth, and all between them: yet are there truly many among men who deny the meeting with their Lord (at the Resurrection)!

subtopic2: created things in due proportion and Truth (for just ends)
Allah`s spirit is breathed into the fetus
translation: But He fashioned him in due proportion, and breathed into him something of His spirit. And He gave you (the faculties of) hearing and sight and feeling (and understanding): little thanks do ye give!

name: Qiyamah
subtopic2: created things in due proportion and Truth (for just ends)
translation: He created the heavens and the earth in true (proportions): He makes the Night overlap the Day, and the Day overlap the Night: He has subjected the sun and the moon (to His law): Each one follows a course for a time appointed. Is not He the Exalted in Power - He Who forgives again and again?

name: Trials of Life
subtopic2: created things in due proportion and Truth (for just ends)
translation: We created not the heavens, the earth, and all between them, merely in (idle) sport:

subtopic2: created things in due proportion and Truth (for just ends)
motion of objects in the Universe
translation: We created them not except for just ends: but most of them do not understand.

name: Nafs
subtopic2: created things in due proportion and Truth (for just ends)
motion of objects in the Universe
all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
souls will not be unjustly dealt with
translation: Allah created the heavens and the earth for just ends, and in order that each soul may find the recompense of what it has earned, and none of them be wronged.

name: Qiyamah
subtopic2: created things in due proportion and Truth (for just ends)
motion of objects in the Universe
translation: We created not the heavens and the earth and all between them but for just ends, and for a Term Appointed: But those who reject Faith turn away from that whereof they are warned.

name: Creation
subtopic2: created things in due proportion and Truth (for just ends)
translation: Verily, all things have We created in proportion and measure.

name: Hope
subtopic2: created things in due proportion and Truth (for just ends)
gives you shape and makes your shapes beautiful
to Him is the final goal
motion of objects in the Universe
translation: He has created the heavens and the earth in just proportions, and has given you shape, and made your shapes beautiful: and to Him is the final Goal.

subtopic2: created things in due proportion and Truth (for just ends)
almost rent asunder by Allah`s Glory
translation: On high hath He raised its canopy, and He hath given it order and perfection.

name: Human Body
subtopic2: created things in due proportion and Truth (for just ends)
translation: Him Who created thee. Fashioned thee in due proportion, and gave thee a just bias;

main_Topic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
subtopic2: created things in due proportion and Truth (for just ends)
translation: Who hath created, and further, given order and proportion;

name: Nafs
subtopic2: created things in due proportion and Truth (for just ends)
translation: By the Soul, and the proportion and order given to it;
She said: "O my Lord! How shall I have a son when no man hath touched me?" He said: "Even so: Allah createth what He willeth: When He hath decreed a plan, He but saith to it, 'Be,' and it is!

name: Obedience To Parents
subtopic2: to Him belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth
translation: In blasphemy indeed are those that say that Allah is Christ the son of Mary. Say: "Who then hath the least power against Allah, if His will were to destroy Christ the son of Mary, his mother, and all every - one that is on the earth? For to Allah belongeth the dominion of the heavens and the earth, and all that is between. He createth what He pleaseth. For Allah hath power over all things."

name: Creation
translation: And Allah has created every animal from water: of them there are some that creep on their bellies; some that walk on two legs; and some that walk on four. Allah creates what He wills for verily Allah has power over all things.

main_Topic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
subtopic2: exalted above what they ascribe to Him
translation: Thy Lord does create and choose as He pleases: no choice have they (in the matter): Glory to Allah! and far is He above the partners they ascribe (to Him)!

name: Creation
subtopic2: Maker of the heavens and earth
translation: Praise be to Allah, Who created (out of nothing) the heavens and the earth, Who made the angels, messengers with wings,- two, or three, or four (pairs): He adds to Creation as He pleases: for Allah has power over all things.

name: Revenge
subtopic2: to Him belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth
translation: To Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth. He creates what He wills (and plans). He bestows (children) male or female according to His Will (and Plan),

subtopic2: gives you shape and makes your shapes beautiful
pattern according to which Allah made him
translation: In whatever Form He wills, does He put thee together.

name: Angel
translation: Those messengers We endowed with gifts, some above others: To one of them Allah spoke; others He raised to degrees (of honour); to Jesus the son of Mary We gave clear (Signs), and strengthened him with the holy spirit. If Allah had so willed, succeeding generations would not have fought among each other, after clear (Signs) had come to them, but they (chose) to wrangle, some believing and others rejecting. If Allah had so willed, they would not have fought each other; but Allah Fulfilleth His plan.

name: Wife
translation: He said: "O my Lord! How shall I have son, seeing I am very old, and my wife is barren?" "Thus," was the answer, "Doth Allah accomplish what He willeth."

main_Topic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
translation: They will dwell therein for all the time that the heavens and the earth endure, except as thy Lord willeth: for thy Lord is the (sure) accomplisher of what He planneth.

name: Dunya
translation: Allah will establish in strength those who believe, with the word that stands firm, in this world and in the Hereafter; but Allah will leave, to stray, those who do wrong: Allah doeth what He willeth.
Verily Allah will admit those who believe and work righteous deeds, to Gardens, beneath which rivers flow: for Allah carries out all that He plans.

name: Dunya
translation: If any think that Allah will not help him (His Messenger) in this world and the Hereafter, let him stretch out a rope to the ceiling and cut (himself) off: then let him see whether his plan will remove that which enrages (him)!

main_Topic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
translation: Thus have We sent down Clear Signs; and verily Allah doth guide whom He will!

name: Qiyamah
translation: Those who believe (in the Qur'an), those who follow the Jewish (scriptures), and the Sabians, Christians, Magians, and Polytheists,- Allah will judge between them on the Day of Judgment: for Allah is witness of all things.

name: Generosity
translation: Seest thou not that to Allah bow down in worship all things that are in the heavens and on earth,- the sun, the moon, the stars; the hills, the trees, the animals; and a great number among mankind? But a great number are (also) such as are fit for Punishment: and such as Allah shall disgrace,- None can raise to honour: for Allah carries out all that He wills.

main_Topic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
translation: Doer (without let) of all that He intends.

main_Topic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
subtopic2: to Him belongs all in the heavens and on earth
to Him belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth
translation: But to Allah belong all things in the heavens and on earth: And He it is that Encompasseth all things.

name: Trials of Life
translation: Behold! We told thee that thy Lord doth encompass mankind round about: We granted the vision which We showed thee, but as a trial for men,- as also the Cursed Tree (mentioned) in the Qur'an: We put terror (and warning) into them, but it only increases their inordinate transgression!

name: Forgiveness
translation: Those who sustain the Throne (of Allah) and those around it Sing Glory and Praise to their Lord; believe in Him; and implore Forgiveness for those who believe: "Our Lord! Thy Reach is over all things, in Mercy and Knowledge. Forgive, then, those who turn in Repentance, and follow Thy Path; and preserve them from the Penalty of the Blazing Fire!
Ah indeed! Are they in doubt concerning the Meeting with their Lord? Ah indeed! It is He that doth encompass all things!

name: On Knowledge
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
almost rent asunder by Allah`s Glory
translation: Allah is He Who created seven Firmaments and of the earth a similar number. Through the midst of them (all) descends His Command: that ye may know that Allah has power over all things, and that Allah comprehends, all things in (His) Knowledge.

main_Topic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
subtopic2: takes account of every single thing
translation: That He may know that they have (truly) brought and delivered the Messages of their Lord: and He surrounds (all the mysteries) that are with them, and takes account of every single thing.

name: About Disbelievers
translation: Or (another similitude) is that of a rain-laden cloud from the sky: In it are zones of darkness, and thunder and lightning: They press their fingers in their ears to keep out the stunning thunder-clap, the while they are in terror of death. But Allah is ever round the rejecters of Faith!

name: Taqwa
translation: If aught that is good befalls you, it grieves them; but if some misfortune overtakes you, they rejoice at it. But if ye are constant and do right, not the least harm will their cunning do to you; for Allah Compasseth round about all that they do.

main_Topic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
translation: They may hide (Their crimes) from men, but they cannot hide (Them) from Allah, seeing that He is in their midst when they plot by night, in words that He cannot approve: And Allah Doth compass round all that they do.

name: Taqwa
translation: And be not like those who started from their homes insolently and to be seen of men, and to hinder (men) from the path of Allah: For Allah compasseth round about all that they do.

He said: "O my people! is then my family of more consideration with you than Allah? For ye cast Him away behind your backs (with contempt). But verily my Lord encompasseth on all sides all that ye do!

main_Topic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
translation: But Allah doth encompass them from behind!

name: Charity / Sadaqah
subtopic2: enlarges the provision and restricts it
translation: Who is he that will loan to Allah a beautiful loan, which Allah will double unto his credit and multiply many times? It is Allah that giveth (you) Want or plenty, and to Him shall be your return.

name: Livelihood
subtopic2: enlarges the provision and restricts it
translation: Allah doth enlarge, or grant by (strict) measure, the sustenance (which He giveth) to whomso He pleaseth. (The wordly) rejoice in the life of this world: But the life of this world is but little comfort in the Hereafter.

name: Rizq
subtopic2: enlarges the provision and restricts it
for all things He has appointed a due proportion
translation: Verily thy Lord doth provide sustenance in abundance for whom He pleaseth, and He provideth in a just measure. For He doth know and regard all His servants.

name: Rizq
subtopic2: enlarges the provision and restricts it
translation: And those who had envied his position the day before began to say on the morrow: "Ah! it is indeed Allah Who enlarges the provision or restricts it, to any of His servants He pleases! had it not been that Allah was gracious to us, He could have caused the earth to swallow us up! Ah! those who reject Allah will assuredly never prosper."

name: Rizq
subtopic2: enlarges the provision and restricts it
translation: Allah enlarges the sustenance (which He gives) to whichever of His servants He pleases; and He (similarly) grants by (strict) measure, (as He pleases): for Allah has full knowledge of all things.

name: Rizq
main_Topic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
subtopic2: enlarges the provision and restricts it
translation: See they not that Allah enlarges the provision and restricts it, to whomsoever He pleases? Verily in that are Signs for those who believe.

name: Rizq
main_Topic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
subtopic2: enlarges the provision and restricts it
translation: Say: "Verily my Lord enlarges and restricts the Provision to whom He pleases, but most men understand not."

name: Rizq
subtopic2: enlarges the provision and restricts it
translation: Say: "Verily my Lord enlarges and restricts the Sustenance to such of his servants as He pleases: and nothing do ye spend in the least (in His cause) but He replaces it: for He is the Best of those who grant Sustenance.

name: Rizq
subtopic2: enlarges the provision and restricts it
translation: Know they not that Allah enlarges the provision or restricts it, for any He pleases? Verily, in this are Signs for those who believe!

name: Rizq
subtopic2: enlarges the provision and restricts it
to Him belong the keys of the heavens and the earth
translation: To Him belong the keys of the heavens and the earth: He enlarges and restricts. The Sustenance to whom He will: for He knows full well all things.

name: Rizq
subtopic2: enlarges the provision and restricts it
translation: If Allah were to enlarge the provision for His Servants, they would indeed transgress beyond all bounds through the earth; but he sends (it) down in due measure as He pleases. For He is with His Servants Well-acquainted, Watchful.

name: Generosity
subtopic2: enlarges the provision and restricts it
translation: Now, as for man, when his Lord trieth him, giving him honour and gifts, then saith he, (puffed up), "My Lord hath honoured me."

name: Rizq
subtopic2: enlarges the provision and restricts it
translation: But when He trieth him, restricting his subsistence for him, then saith he (in despair), "My Lord hath humiliated me!"

subtopic2: established on the Throne of Authority
translation: Verily your Lord is Allah, who created the heavens and the earth in six days, and is firmly established on the throne (of authority), regulating and governing all things. No intercessor (can plead with Him) except after His leave (hath been obtained). This is Allah your Lord; Him therefore serve ye: will ye not receive admonition?

subtopic2: established on the Throne of Authority
almost rent asunder by Allah`s Glory
translation: Allah is He Who raised the heavens without any pillars that ye can see; is firmly established on the throne (of authority); He has subjected the sun and the moon (to his Law)! Each one runs (its course) for a term appointed. He doth regulate all affairs, explaining the signs in detail, that ye may believe with certainty in the meeting with your Lord.

subtopic2: established on the Throne of Authority
translation: (Allah) Most Gracious is firmly established on the throne (of authority).

name: Creation
subtopic2: established on the Throne of Authority
translation: He Who created the heavens and the earth and all that is between, in six days, and is firmly established on the Throne (of Authority): Allah Most Gracious: ask thou, then, about Him of any acquainted (with such things).

name: Creation
subtopic2: established on the Throne of Authority
translation: It is Allah Who has created the heavens and the earth, and all between them, in six Days, and is firmly established on the Throne (of Authority): ye have none, besides Him, to protect or intercede (for you): will ye not then receive admonition?

name: Creation
subtopic2: established on the Throne of Authority
is with you wheresoever you may be
knowledge of the heavens and the earth
translation: He it is Who created the heavens and the earth in Six Days, and is moreover firmly established on the Throne (of Authority). He knows what enters within the earth and what comes forth out of it, what comes down from heaven and what mounts up to it. And He is with you wheresoever ye may be. And Allah sees well all that ye do.

name: Jinn
subtopic2: exalted above what they ascribe to Him
translation: Yet they make the Jinns equals with Allah, though Allah did create the Jinns; and they falsely, having no knowledge, attribute to Him sons and daughters. Praise and glory be to Him! (for He is) above what they attribute to Him!

subtopic2: exalted above what they ascribe to Him
translation: But when He giveth them a goodly child, they ascribe to others a share in the gift they have received: but Allah is exalted high above the partners they ascribe to Him.

main_Topic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
subtopic2: exalted above what they ascribe to Him
translation: They serve, besides Allah, things that hurt them not nor profit them, and they say: "These are our intercessors with Allah." Say: "Do ye indeed inform Allah of something He knows not, in the heavens or on earth?- Glory to Him! and far is He above the partners they ascribe (to Him)!"

name: Qiyamah
subtopic2: exalted above what they ascribe to Him
translation: (Inevitable) cometh (to pass) the Command of Allah: seek ye not then to hasten it: Glory to Him, and far is He above having the partners they ascribe unto Him!

subtopic2: exalted above what they ascribe to Him
translation: Glory to Him! He is high above all that they say!- Exalted and Great (beyond measure)!

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
subtopic2: exalted above what they ascribe to Him
translation: High above all is Allah, the King, the Truth! Be not in haste with the Qur'an before its revelation to thee is completed, but say, "O my Lord! advance me in knowledge."

name: Corruption
subtopic2: exalted above what they ascribe to Him
Lord of the Throne of Glory Supreme
translation: If there were, in the heavens and the earth, other gods besides Allah, there would have been confusion in both! but glory to Allah, the Lord of the Throne: (High is He) above what they attribute to Him!

name: Allah has no son
main_Topic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
subtopic2: exalted above what they ascribe to Him
translation: No son did Allah beget, nor is there any god along with Him: (if there were many gods), behold, each god would have taken away what he had created, and some would have lorded it over others! Glory to Allah! (He is free) from the (sort of) things they attribute to Him!

name: Allah knows the unseen
subtopic2: exalted above what they ascribe to Him
Knower of the hidden and open
translation: He knows what is hidden and what is open: too high is He for the partners they attribute to Him!

name: Generosity
subtopic2: exalted above what they ascribe to Him
Lord of the Throne of Glory Supreme
translation: Therefore exalted be Allah, the King, the Reality: there is no god but He, the Lord of the Throne of Honour!

name: Allah's Mercy
subtopic2: exalted above what they ascribe to Him
translation: Or, Who guides you through the depths of darkness on land and sea, and Who sends the winds as heralds of glad tidings, going before His Mercy? (Can there be another) god besides Allah?- High is Allah above what they associate with Him!

name: Rizq
subtopic2: exalted above what they ascribe to Him
translation: It is Allah Who has created you: further, He has provided for your sustenance; then He will cause you to die; and again He will give you life. Are there any of your (false) "Partners" who can do any single one of these things? Glory to Him! and high is He above the partners they attribute (to him)!

subtopic2: exalted above what they ascribe to Him
to Him belong all glory and power
translation: Glory to thy Lord, the Lord of Honour and Power! (He is free) from what they ascribe (to Him)!

name: Qiyamah
subtopic2: exalted above what they ascribe to Him
no just estimate have they made of Him
all that is on it will perish
almost rent asunder by Allah`s Glory
translation: No just estimate have they made of Allah, such as is due to Him: On the Day of Judgment the whole of the earth will be but His handful, and the heavens will be rolled up in His right hand: Glory to Him! High is He above the Partners they attribute to Him!

subtopic2: exalted above what they ascribe to Him
Lord of the heavens and earth [Rabb al SamduFat wa al Ar4]
Lord of the Throne of Glory Supreme
translation: Glory to the Lord of the heavens and the earth, the Lord of the Throne (of Authority)! (He is free) from the things they attribute (to him)!

subtopic2: exalted above what they ascribe to Him
translation: Or have they a god other than Allah? Exalted is Allah far above the things they associate with Him!

name: Peace
subtopic2: exalted above what they ascribe to Him
translation: Allah is He, than Whom there is no other god;- the Sovereign, the Holy One, the Source of Peace (and Perfection), the Guardian of Faith, the Preserver of Safety, the Exalted in Might, the Irresistible, the Supreme: Glory to Allah! (High is He) above the partners they attribute to Him.

name: Wife
subtopic2: exalted above what they ascribe to Him
translation: And Exalted is the Majesty of our Lord: He has taken neither a wife nor a son.

name: Livelihood
main_Topic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
translation: No Sustenance do I require of them, nor do I require that they should feed Me.

name: Rizq
translation: For Allah is He Who gives (all) Sustenance,- Lord of Power,- Steadfast (for ever).

name: Pregnancy
subtopic2: for all things He has appointed a due proportion
translation: Allah doth know what every female (womb) doth bear, by how much the wombs fall short (of their time or number) or do exceed. Every single thing is before His sight, in (due) proportion.

name: Livelihood
subtopic2: for all things He has appointed a due proportion
prepares a way out and provides from unimaginable sources
translation: And He provides for him from (sources) he never could imagine. And if any one puts his trust in Allah, sufficient is (Allah) for him. For Allah will surely accomplish his purpose: verily, for all things has Allah appointed a due proportion.

name: Disobedience
mainTopic1: Coloration of Maker – Variegation of Creator
translation: Say: "If ye do love Allah, Follow me: Allah will love you and forgive you your sins: For Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful."

name: Hurting Others
subtopic2: will not suffer the reward to be lost
Allah will remove their ills and improve their condition
translation: And their Lord hath accepted of them, and answered them: "Never will I suffer to be lost the work of any of you, be he male or female: Ye are members, one of another: Those who have left their homes, or been driven out therefrom, or suffered harm in My Cause, or fought or been slain,- verily, I will blot out from them their iniquities, and admit them into Gardens with rivers flowing beneath;- A reward from the presence of Allah, and from His presence is the best of rewards."

name: Forgiveness
subtopic2: to Him belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth
to Him is the final goal
translation: (Both) the Jews and the Christians say: "We are sons of Allah, and his beloved." Say: "Why then doth He punish you for your sins? Nay, ye are but men,- of the men he hath created: He forgiveth whom He pleaseth, and He punisheth whom He pleaseth: and to Allah belongeth the dominion of the heavens and the earth, and all that is between: and unto Him is the final goal (of all)"

name: Forgiveness
translation: But if the thief repents after his crime, and amends his conduct, Allah turneth to him in forgiveness; for Allah is Oft-forgiving, Most Merciful.

name: Forgiveness
subtopic2: to Him belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth
translation: Knowest thou not that to Allah (alone) belongeth the dominion of the heavens and the earth? He punisheth whom He pleaseth, and He forgiveth whom He pleaseth: and Allah hath power over all things.

name: Forgiveness
translation: And remember it was said to them: "Dwell in this town and eat therein as ye wish, but say the word of humility and enter the gate in a posture of humility: We shall forgive you your faults; We shall increase (the portion of) those who do good."

name: Taqwa
translation: O ye who believe! if ye fear Allah, He will grant you a criterion (to judge between right and wrong), remove from you (all) evil (that may afflict) you, and forgive you: for Allah is the Lord of grace unbounded.

name: Forgiveness
translation: O Prophet! say to those who are captives in your hands: "If Allah findeth any good in your hearts, He will give you something better than what has been taken from you, and He will forgive you: for Allah is Oft-forgiving, Most Merciful."

name: Forgiveness
subtopic2: Best of those who show mercy
Most Merciful of those who show mercy
translation: He said: "This day let no reproach be (cast) on you: Allah will forgive you, and He is the Most Merciful of those who show mercy!

name: Forgiveness
translation: They ask thee to hasten on the evil in preference to the good: Yet have come to pass, before them, (many) exemplary punishments! But verily thy Lord is full of forgiveness for mankind for their wrong-doing, and verily thy Lord is (also) strict in punishment.

name: Forgiveness
subtopic2: Maker of the heavens and earth
translation: Their messengers said: "Is there a doubt about Allah, The Creator of the heavens and the earth? It is He Who invites you, in order that He may forgive you your sins and give you respite for a term appointed!" They said: "Ah! ye are no more than human, like ourselves! Ye wish to turn us away from the (gods) our fathers used to worship: then bring us some clear authority."

name: Nafs
translation: He prayed: "O my Lord! I have indeed wronged my soul! Do Thou then forgive me!" So (Allah) forgave him: for He is the Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

name: Taqwa
translation: That He may make your conduct whole and sound and forgive you your sins: He that obeys Allah and His Messenger, has already attained the highest achievement.

name: Forgiveness
translation: For that my Lord has granted me Forgiveness and has enrolled me among those held in honour!

name: Nafs
translation: Say: "O my Servants who have transgressed against their souls! Despair not of the Mercy of Allah: for Allah forgives all sins: for He is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

name: Forgiveness
subtopic2: to Him is the final goal
translation: Who forgiveth sin, accepteth repentance, is strict in punishment, and hath a long reach (in all things). there is no god but He: to Him is the final goal.
He is the One that accepts repentance from His Servants and forgives sins: and He knows all that ye do.

name: Hope
main_Topic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
translation: Whatever misfortune happens to you, is because on the things your hands have wrought, and for many (of them) He grants forgiveness.

name: Business
translation: Or He can cause them to perish because of the (evil) which (the men) have earned; but much doth He forgive.

name: Forgiveness
translation: O our people, hearken to the one who invites (you) to Allah, and believe in him: He will forgive you your faults, and deliver you from a Penalty Grievous.

name: Forgiveness
subtopic2: to Him belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth
translation: To Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth: He forgives whom He wills, and He punishes whom He wills: but Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

name: Taqwa
subtopic2: among them are those who believe
translation: O ye that believe! Fear Allah, and believe in His Messenger, and He will bestow on you a double portion of His Mercy: He will provide for you a Light by which ye shall walk (straight in your path), and He will forgive you (your past): for Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

name: Disobedience
main_Topic2: Obediance to Allah and His messenger
translation: Is it that ye are afraid of spending sums in charity before your private consultation (with him)? If, then, ye do not so, and Allah forgives you, then (at least) establish regular prayer; practise regular charity; and obey Allah and His Messenger. And Allah is well-acquainted with all that ye do.

name: Forgiveness
main_Topic2: Gardens of Bliss and Felicity ( and Delights Naim )
subtopic2: Gardens of Bliss and Felicity ( and Delights Naim )
translation: He will forgive you your sins, and admit you to Gardens beneath which Rivers flow, and to beautiful mansions in Gardens of Eternity: that is indeed the Supreme Achievement.

name: Forgiveness
translation: If ye loan to Allah, a beautiful loan, He will double it to your (credit), and He will grant you Forgiveness: for Allah is most Ready to appreciate (service), Most Forbearing,-

name: Forgiveness
subtopic1: Desting – Fate – Decree – Pre – Destination – Divine
translation: So He may forgive you your sins and give you respite for a stated Term: for when the Term given by Allah is accomplished, it cannot be put forward: if ye only knew.

name: Hardship
subtopic2: to Himyou shall be brought (gathered) back
translation: How can ye reject the faith in Allah?- seeing that ye were without life, and He gave you life; then will He cause you to die, and will again bring you to life; and again to Him will ye return.

name: Hardship
translation: Didst thou not Turn by vision to those who abandoned their homes, though they were thousands (In number), for fear of death? Allah said to them: "Die": Then He restored them to life. For Allah is full of bounty to mankind, but Most of them are ungrateful.

name: On Animals
translation: Or (take) the similitude of one who passed by a hamlet, all in ruins to its roofs. He said: "Oh! how shall Allah bring it (ever) to life, after (this) its death?" but Allah caused him to die for a hundred years, then raised him up (again). He said: "How long didst thou tarry (thus)?" He said: (Perhaps) a day or part of a day." He said: "Nay, thou hast tarried thus a hundred years; but look at thy food and thy drink; they show no signs of age; and look at thy donkey: And that We may make of thee a sign unto the people, Look further at the bones, how We bring them together and clothe them with flesh." When this was shown clearly to him, he said: "I know that Allah hath power over all things."

name: Rizq
main_Topic2: according to best of deeds and more
subtopic2: according to best of deeds and more
translation: Thou causest the night to gain on the day, and thou causest the day to gain on the night; Thou bringest the Living out of the dead, and Thou bringest the dead out of the Living; and Thou givest sustenance to whom Thou pleasest, without measure.

subtopic2: to Himyou shall be brought (gathered) back
translation: Those who listen (in truth), be sure, will accept: as to the dead, Allah will raise them up; then will they be turned unto Him.

name: Qiyamah
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: It is He Who sendeth the winds like heralds of glad tidings, going before His mercy: when they have carried the heavy-laden clouds, We drive them to a land that is dead, make rain to descend thereon, and produce every kind of harvest therewith: thus shall We raise up the dead: perchance ye may remember.

name: Taqwa
translation: Say: "Who is it that sustains you (in life) from the sky and from the earth? or who is it that has power over hearing and sight? And who is it that brings out the living from the dead and the dead from the living? and who is it that rules and regulates all affairs?" They will soon say, "Allah". Say, "will ye not then show piety (to Him)?"
This is so, because Allah is the Reality: it is He Who gives life to the dead, and it is He Who has power over all things.

subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: It is He Who brings out the living from the dead, and brings out the dead from the living, and Who gives life to the earth after it is dead: and thus shall ye be brought out (from the dead).

name: Allah's Mercy
main_Topic2: all that is on it will perish
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: Then contemplate (O man!) the memorials of Allah's Mercy!- how He gives life to the earth after its death: verily the same will give life to the men who are dead: for He has power over all things.

name: Inheritance
translation: Verily We shall give life to the dead, and We record that which they send before and that which they leave behind, and of all things have We taken account in a clear Book (of evidence).

name: Creation
translation: Say, "He will give them life Who created them for the first time! for He is Well-versed in every kind of creation!-

name: Beauty of Nature
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: And among His Signs in this: thou seest the earth barren and desolate; but when We send down rain to it, it is stirred to life and yields increase. Truly, He Who gives life to the (dead) earth can surely give life to (men) who are dead. For He has power over all things.
What! Have they taken (for worship) protectors besides Him? But it is Allah,- He is the Protector, and it is He Who gives life to the dead: It is He Who has power over all things,

name: Creation
translation: See they not that Allah, Who created the heavens and the earth, and never wearied with their creation, is able to give life to the dead? Yea, verily He has power over all things.

name: Rizq
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: As sustenance for (Allah's) Servants;- and We give (new) life therewith to land that is dead: Thus will be the Resurrection.

main_Topic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
translation: Has not He, (the same), the power to give life to the dead?
Then, when it is His Will, He will raise him up (again).
Surely (Allah) is able to bring him back (to life)!

name: Rizq
translation: And We gave you the shade of clouds and sent down to you Manna and quails, saying: "Eat of the good things We have provided for you:" (But they rebelled); to us they did no harm, but they harmed their own souls.

name: Rizq
translation: O ye who believe! Eat of the good things that We have provided for you, and be grateful to Allah, if it is Him ye worship.

name: Qiyamah
translation: The life of this world is alluring to those who reject faith, and they scoff at those who believe. But the righteous will be above them on the Day of Resurrection; for Allah bestows His abundance without measure on whom He will.

name: Rizq
translation: Right graciously did her Lord accept her: He made her grow in purity and beauty: To the care of Zakariya was she assigned. Every time that he entered (Her) chamber to see her, He found her supplied with sustenance. He said: "O Mary! Whence (comes) this to you?" She said: "From Allah: for Allah Provides sustenance to whom He pleases without measure."

name: Rizq
translation: Think not of those who are slain in Allah's way as dead. Nay, they live, finding their sustenance in the presence of their Lord;

name: Rizq
translation: Said Jesus the son of Mary: "O Allah our Lord! Send us from heaven a table set (with viands), that there may be for us - for the first and the last of us - a solemn festival and a sign from thee; and provide for our sustenance, for thou art the best Sustainer (of our needs)."

name: Rizq
translation: The Companions of the Fire will call to the Companions of the Garden: "Pour down to us water or anything that Allah doth provide for your sustenance." They will say: "Both these things hath Allah forbidden to those who rejected Him."

name: Rizq
translation: We divided them into twelve tribes or nations. We directed Moses by inspiration, when his (thirsty) people asked him for water: "Strike the rock with thy staff": out of it there gushed forth twelve springs: Each group knew its own place for water. We gave them the shade of clouds, and sent down to them manna and quails, (saying): "Eat of the good things We have provided for you": (but they rebelled); to Us they did no harm, but they harmed their own souls.

name: Taqwa
translation: Call to mind when ye were a small (band), despised through the land, and afraid that men might despoil and kidnap you; But He provided a safe asylum for you, strengthened you with His aid, and gave you Good things for sustenance: that ye might be grateful.

name: Qiyamah
translation: We settled the Children of Israel in a beautiful dwelling-place, and provided for them sustenance of the best: it was after knowledge had been granted to them, that they fell into schisms. Verily Allah will judge between them as to the schisms amongst them, on the Day of Judgment.

name: Tawakkul
translation: He said: "O my people! see ye whether I have a Clear (Sign) from my Lord, and He hath given me sustenance (pure and) good as from Himself? I wish not, in opposition to you, to do that which I forbid you to do. I only desire (your) betterment to the best of my power; and my success (in my task) can only come from Allah. In Him I trust, and unto Him I look.

name: Rizq
translation: And Allah has made for you mates (and companions) of your own nature, and made for you, out of them, sons and daughters and grandchildren, and provided for you sustenance of the best: will they then believe in vain things, and be ungrateful for Allah's favours?-

name: Zakat
translation: Allah sets forth the Parable (of two men: one) a slave under the dominion of another; He has no power of any sort; and (the other) a man on whom We have bestowed goodly favours from Ourselves, and he spends thereof (freely), privately and publicly: are the two equal? (By no means;) praise be to Allah. But most of them understand not.

name: Rizq
translation: Kill not your children for fear of want: We shall provide sustenance for them as well as for you. Verily the killing of them is a great sin.

name: Taqwa
translation: We have honoured the sons of Adam; provided them with transport on land and sea; given them for sustenance things good and pure; and conferred on them special favours, above a great part of our creation.

name: Rizq
translation: (Saying): "Eat of the good things We have provided for your sustenance, but commit no excess therein, lest My Wrath should justly descend on you: and those on whom descends My Wrath do perish indeed!

name: Taqwa
main_Topic2: all beings in the heavens and earth declare His glory
translation: Enjoin prayer on thy people, and be constant therein. We ask thee not to provide sustenance: We provide it for thee. But the (fruit of) the Hereafter is for righteousness.

name: Rizq
main_Topic2: according to best of deeds and more
subtopic2: according to best of deeds and more
translation: That Allah may reward them according to the best of their deeds, and add even more for them out of His Grace: for Allah doth provide for those whom He will, without measure.

name: Rizq
mainTopic1: Allah is Sufficient for me; on Him do the Reliant Rely
translation: How many are the creatures that carry not their own sustenance? It is Allah who feeds (both) them and you: for He hears and knows (all things).

name: Rizq
translation: Say: "Who gives you sustenance, from the heavens and the earth?" Say: "It is Allah; and certain it is that either we or ye are on right guidance or in manifest error!"

name: Rizq
subtopic2: Remembrance of Allah`s favours and grace _ commanded
translation: O men! Call to mind the grace of Allah unto you! is there a creator, other than Allah, to give you sustenance from heaven or earth? There is no god but He: how then are ye deluded away from the Truth?

name: Rizq
translation: He it is Who showeth you his Signs, and sendeth down sustenance for you from the sky: but only those receive admonition who turn (to Allah).

name: Rizq
translation: He that works evil will not be requited but by the like thereof: and he that works a righteous deed - whether man or woman - and is a Believer- such will enter the Garden (of Bliss): Therein will they have abundance without measure.

name: Rizq
translation: Gracious is Allah to His servants: He gives Sustenance to whom He pleases: and He has power and can carry out His Will.

name: Rizq
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: And in the alternation of Night and Day, and the fact that Allah sends down Sustenance from the sky, and revives therewith the earth after its death, and in the change of the winds,- are Signs for those that are wise.

name: On Wisdom
translation: We did aforetime grant to the Children of Israel the Book the Power of Command, and Prophethood; We gave them, for Sustenance, things good and pure; and We favoured them above the nations.

name: Livelihood
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: It is He Who has made the earth manageable for you, so traverse ye through its tracts and enjoy of the Sustenance which He furnishes: but unto Him is the Resurrection.

name: Rizq
