subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Then will the true promise draw nigh (of fulfilment): then behold! the eyes of the Unbelievers will fixedly stare in horror: "Ah! Woe to us! we were indeed heedless of this; nay, we truly did wrong!"

name: Qiyamah
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: O mankind! fear your Lord! for the convulsion of the Hour (of Judgment) will be a thing terrible!

name: Qiyamah
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: The Day ye shall see it, every mother giving suck shall forget her suckling-babe, and every pregnant female shall drop her load (unformed): thou shalt see mankind as in a drunken riot, yet not drunk: but dreadful will be the Wrath of Allah.

name: Qiyamah
main_Topic2: Trumpet of the day of judgment
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: And the Day that the Trumpet will be sounded - then will be smitten with terror those who are in the heavens, and those who are on earth, except such as Allah will please (to exempt): and all shall come to His (Presence) as beings conscious of their lowliness.

main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: If thou couldst but see when they will quake with terror; but then there will be no escape (for them), and they will be seized from a position (quite) near.

name: Qiyamah
main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Then how shall ye, if ye deny (Allah), guard yourselves against a Day that will make children hoary-headed?-

name: Qiyamah
main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: At length, when the sight is dazed,

name: Qiyamah
main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: One Day everything that can be in commotion will be in violent commotion,

name: Qiyamah
main_Topic2: Trumpet of the day of judgment
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Followed by oft-repeated (commotions):

name: Qiyamah
main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Hearts that Day will be in agitation;

name: Qiyamah
main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Cast down will be (their owners') eyes.

name: Qiyamah
main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: (It is) a Day whereon men will be like moths scattered about,

name: Qiyamah
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: (These are) the ones who wait and watch about you: if ye do gain a victory from Allah, they say: "Were we not with you?"- but if the unbelievers gain a success, they say (to them): "Did we not gain an advantage over you, and did we not guard you from the believers?" but Allah will judge betwixt you on the Day of Judgment. And never will Allah grant to the unbelievers a way (to triumphs) over the believers.

name: Kaabah
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Do ye make the giving of drink to pilgrims, or the maintenance of the Sacred Mosque, equal to (the pious service of) those who believe in Allah and the Last Day, and strive with might and main in the cause of Allah? They are not comparable in the sight of Allah: and Allah guides not those who do wrong.

name: Taqwa
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Those who believe in Allah and the Last Day ask thee for no exemption from fighting with their goods and persons. And Allah knoweth well those who do their duty.

main_Topic2: Fighting (and striving) in the ca`use of Allah
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
asking for it for wrong reasons
translation: Only those ask thee for exemption who believe not in Allah and the Last Day, and whose hearts are in doubt, so that they are tossed in their doubts to and fro.

name: Zina
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: The woman and the man guilty of adultery or fornication,- flog each of them with a hundred stripes: Let not compassion move you in their case, in a matter prescribed by Allah, if ye believe in Allah and the Last Day: and let a party of the Believers witness their punishment.

name: Prophet Musa (as)
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Moses said: "I have indeed called upon my Lord and your Lord (for protection) from every arrogant one who believes not in the Day of Account!"

name: Qiyamah
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Closer and closer to mankind comes their Reckoning: yet they heed not and they turn away.

name: Qiyamah
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Warn them of the Day that is (ever) drawing near, when the hearts will (come) right up to the throats to choke (them); No intimate friend nor intercessor will the wrong-doers have, who could be listened to.

name: Qiyamah
main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: The (Judgment) ever approaching draws nigh:

name: Qiyamah
main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: No (soul) but Allah can lay it bare.

name: Qiyamah
main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: But We see it (quite) near.

main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: They say: "Our Lord! hasten to us our sentence (even) before the Day of Account!"

subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Such is the Promise made, to you for the Day of Account!

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Thus have We sent by inspiration to thee an Arabic Qur'an: that thou mayest warn the Mother of Cities and all around her,- and warn (them) of the Day of Assembly, of which there is no doubt: (when) some will be in the Garden, and some in the Blazing Fire.

name: Qiyamah
main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: That will be- that Day - a Day of Distress,-

name: About Disbelievers
main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Far from easy for those without Faith.

name: Peace
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Enter ye therein in Peace and Security; this is a Day of Eternal Life!

name: Qiyamah
main_Topic2: all that is on it will perish
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
all that is on it will perish
translation: The Day when the Earth will be rent asunder, from (men) hurrying out: that will be a gathering together,- quite easy for Us.

name: Qiyamah
main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: The (Day) of Noise and Clamour:

name: Qiyamah
main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: What is the (Day) of Noise and Clamour?

name: Qiyamah
main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: And what will explain to thee what the (Day) of Noise and Clamour is?

name: Qiyamah
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: And the mountains will be like carded wool.

subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Will have his home in a (bottomless) Pit.

subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: And what will explain to thee what this is?

subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: (It is) a Fire Blazing fiercely!

subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Such will be their entertainment on the Day of Requital!

name: Qiyamah
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: The Day when they will hear a (mighty) Blast in (very) truth: that will be the Day of Resurrection.

name: Qiyamah
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: I do call to witness the Resurrection Day;

name: Qiyamah
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: He questions: "When is the Day of Resurrection?"

name: Qiyamah
main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Then it will be a single (compelling) cry; and behold, they will begin to see!

main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: They will say, "Ah! Woe to us! This is the Day of Judgment!"

main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: (A voice will say,) "This is the Day of Sorting Out, whose truth ye (once) denied!"

name: Taqwa
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Bring ye up, it shall be said, "The wrong-doers and their wives, and the things they worshipped-

name: Taqwa
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Besides Allah, and lead them to the Way to the (Fierce) Fire!

name: Taqwa
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: But stop them, for they must be asked:

name: Taqwa
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: What is the matter with you that ye help not each other?'

name: Taqwa
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Nay, but that day they shall submit (to Judgment);

name: Taqwa
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: And they will turn to one another, and question one another.

name: Taqwa
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: They will say: "It was ye who used to come to us from the right hand (of power and authority)!"

name: Taqwa
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: They will reply: "Nay, ye yourselves had no Faith!

name: Taqwa
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Nor had we any authority over you. Nay, it was ye who were a people in obstinate rebellion!

name: Taqwa
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: So now has been proved true, against us, the word of our Lord that we shall indeed (have to) taste (the punishment of our sins).

name: Taqwa
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: We led you astray: for truly we were ourselves astray.

name: Taqwa
main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Truly, that Day, they will (all) share in the Penalty.

name: Taqwa
main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Verily that is how We shall deal with Sinners.

name: Taqwa
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: For they, when they were told that there is no god except Allah, would puff themselves up with Pride,

name: Taqwa
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: And say: "What! shall we give up our gods for the sake of a Poet possessed?"

name: Truth and Honesty
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Nay! he has come with the (very) Truth, and he confirms (the Message of) the messengers (before him).

name: Taqwa
main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Ye shall indeed taste of the Grievous Penalty;-

name: Taqwa
main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: But it will be no more than the retribution of (the Evil) that ye have wrought;-

main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Then they will turn to one another and question one another.

subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
inhabitant there is viewed by former companion in Paradise
translation: One of them will start the talk and say: "I had an intimate companion (on the earth),

subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
inhabitant there is viewed by former companion in Paradise
translation: Who used to say, 'what! art thou amongst those who bear witness to the Truth (of the Message)?

subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
inhabitant there is viewed by former companion in Paradise
translation: When we die and become dust and bones, shall we indeed receive rewards and punishments?'

subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
inhabitant there is viewed by former companion in Paradise
translation: (A voice) said: "Would ye like to look down?"

subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
inhabitant there is viewed by former companion in Paradise
translation: He looked down and saw him in the midst of the Fire.

subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
inhabitant there is viewed by former companion in Paradise
translation: He said: "By Allah! thou wast little short of bringing me to perdition!

subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
inhabitant there is viewed by former companion in Paradise
translation: Had it not been for the Grace of my Lord, I should certainly have been among those brought (there)!

subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
inhabitant there is viewed by former companion in Paradise
translation: Is it (the case) that we shall not die,

subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
inhabitant there is viewed by former companion in Paradise
translation: Except our first death, and that we shall not be punished?

subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Verily this is the supreme achievement!

main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: For the like of this let all strive, who wish to strive.

name: Jahannam / Hell
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Is that the better entertainment or the Tree of Zaqqum?

name: Trials of Life
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: For We have truly made it (as) a trial for the wrong-doers.

subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: For it is a tree that springs out of the bottom of Hell-Fire:

name: Shaitan / Satan
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: The shoots of its fruit-stalks are like the heads of devils:

subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Truly they will eat thereof and fill their bellies therewith.

subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Then on top of that they will be given a mixture made of boiling water.

subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Then shall their return be to the (Blazing) Fire.

subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Truly they found their fathers on the wrong Path;

subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: So they (too) were rushed down on their footsteps!

main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: And truly before them, many of the ancients went astray;-

main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: But We sent aforetime, among them, (messengers) to admonish them;-

main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Then see what was the end of those who were admonished (but heeded not),-

main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Verily the Day of sorting out is the time appointed for all of them,-

name: Revenge
main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: The Day when no protector can avail his client in aught, and no help can they receive,

name: Qiyamah
main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: For the Day of Sorting out.

name: Qiyamah
main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: And what will explain to thee what is the Day of Sorting out?

main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Ah woe, that Day, to the Rejecters of Truth!

main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: That will be a Day of Sorting out! We shall gather you together and those before (you)!

name: Qiyamah
main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: When the souls are sorted out, (being joined, like with like);

subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: On that Day will men proceed in companies sorted out, to be shown the deeds that they (had done).

name: Qiyamah
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: All will certainly be gathered together for the meeting appointed for a Day well-known.

name: Nafs
main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: (It will be) the Day when no soul shall have power (to do) aught for another: For the command, that Day, will be (wholly) with Allah.

name: Qiyamah
main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: That Day will Man be told (all) that he put forward, and all that he put back.

name: Nafs
main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Nay, man will be evidence against himself,

main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Even though he were to put up his excuses.

name: Qiyamah
main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: And no friend will ask after a friend,

main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Though they will be put in sight of each other,- the sinner's desire will be: Would that he could redeem himself from the Penalty of that Day by (sacrificing) his children,

main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: His wife and his brother,

main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: His kindred who sheltered him,

main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: And all, all that is on earth,- so it could deliver him:

name: Jahannam / Hell
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: By no means! for it would be the Fire of Hell!-

name: Qiyamah
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: That Day shall a man flee from his own brother,

name: Qiyamah
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: And from his mother and his father,

name: Qiyamah
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: And from his wife and his children.

subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Each one of them, that Day, will have enough concern (of his own) to make him indifferent to the others.

name: Nafs
main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: The day it arrives, no soul shall speak except by His leave: of those (gathered) some will be wretched and some will be blessed.

main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: That will be a Day when they shall not be able to speak.

main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Nor will it be open to them to put forth pleas.

name: Qiyamah
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: It will be no more than a single Blast, when lo! they will all be brought up before Us!

main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: These (today) only wait for a single mighty Blast, which (when it comes) will brook no delay.

name: Qiyamah
main_Topic2: Trumpet of the day of judgment
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Then, when one blast is sounded on the Trumpet,

name: Qiyamah
main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: But verily, it will be but a single (Compelling) Cry,

name: Qiyamah
main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: When, behold, they will be in the (full) awakening (to Judgment).

name: Leadership
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
souls will not be unjustly dealt with
translation: One day We shall call together all human beings with their (respective) Imams: those who are given their record in their right hand will read it (with pleasure), and they will not be dealt with unjustly in the least.

name: Qiyamah
main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
souls will not be unjustly dealt with
translation: Then, on that Day, not a soul will be wronged in the least, and ye shall but be repaid the meeds of your past Deeds.

name: Qiyamah
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
souls will not be unjustly dealt with
all that is on it will perish
translation: And the Earth will shine with the Glory of its Lord: the Record (of Deeds) will be placed (open); the prophets and the witnesses will be brought forward and a just decision pronounced between them; and they will not be wronged (in the least).

name: Nafs
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
souls will not be unjustly dealt with
translation: And to every soul will be paid in full (the fruit) of its Deeds; and (Allah) knoweth best all that they do.

name: Qiyamah
main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
the Caller will call out from a place quite near
translation: And listen for the Day when the Caller will call out from a place quiet near,-

name: Qiyamah
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
the Caller will call out from a place quite near
translation: Therefore, (O Prophet,) turn away from them. The Day that the Caller will call (them) to a terrible affair,

name: Qiyamah
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: At length, when there comes the Deafening Noise,-

main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Therefore, when there comes the great, overwhelming (Event),-

main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: The Day when man shall remember (all) that he strove for,

subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: And Hell-Fire shall be placed in full view for (all) to see,-

subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Then, for such as had transgressed all bounds,

name: Dunya
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: And had preferred the life of this world,

subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: The Abode will be Hell-Fire;

name: Nafs
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: And for such as had entertained the fear of standing before their Lord's (tribunal) and had restrained (their) soul from lower desires,

name: Jannah
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Their abode will be the Garden.

name: Qiyamah
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Has the story reached thee of the overwhelming (Event)?

main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Some faces, that Day, will be humiliated,

main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Labouring (hard), weary,-

subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: The while they enter the Blazing Fire,-

name: Jahannam / Hell
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: The while they are given, to drink, of a boiling hot spring,

name: Jannah
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: No food will there be for them but a bitter Dhari'

subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Which will neither nourish nor satisfy hunger.

main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: (Other) faces that Day will be joyful,

subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Pleased with their striving,-

subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: In a Garden on high,

subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Where they shall hear no (word) of vanity:

subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Therein will be a bubbling spring:

subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Goblets placed (ready),

subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: And cushions set in rows,

subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: And rich carpets (all) spread out.

main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: The Sure Reality!

main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: What is the Sure Reality?

main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: And what will make thee realise what the Sure Reality is?

name: Qiyamah
main_Topic2: Trumpet of the day of judgment
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: The Trumpet will (just) be sounded, when all that are in the heavens and on earth will swoon, except such as it will please Allah (to exempt). Then will a second one be sounded, when, behold, they will be standing and looking on!

name: Qiyamah
main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: So leave them alone until they encounter that Day of theirs, wherein they shall (perforce) swoon (with terror),-

main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
tonques hands feet hearing sight skins will bear witness
translation: On the Day when their tongues, their hands, and their feet will bear witness against them as to their actions.

main_Topic2: Hands and feet will bear witness against sinners
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
tonques hands feet hearing sight skins will bear witness
translation: That Day shall We set a seal on their mouths. But their hands will speak to us, and their feet bear witness, to all that they did.

main_Topic2: Eyes ( ear and skills ) will bear witness against sinners
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
tonques hands feet hearing sight skins will bear witness
translation: At length, when they reach the (Fire), their hearing, their sight, and their skins will bear witness against them, as to (all) their deeds.

main_Topic2: Eyes ( ear and skills ) will bear witness against sinners
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
tonques hands feet hearing sight skins will bear witness
translation: They will say to their skins: "Why bear ye witness against us?" They will say: "Allah hath given us speech,- (He) Who giveth speech to everything: He created you for the first time, and unto Him were ye to return.

subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
tonques hands feet hearing sight skins will bear witness
translation: Ye did not seek to hide yourselves, lest your hearing, your sight, and your skins should bear witness against you! But ye did think that Allah knew not many of the things that ye used to do!

main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
veil is removed from your sight
translation: (It will be said:) "Thou wast heedless of this; now have We removed thy veil, and sharp is thy sight this Day!"

subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: And verily Judgment and Justice must indeed come to pass.

main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Verily, the Doom of thy Lord will indeed come to pass;-

main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: There is none can avert it;-

name: Qiyamah
main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: On that Day shall the (Great) Event come to pass.

subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Until there came to us (the Hour) that is certain.

name: Qiyamah
main_Topic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
subtopic2: all mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
translation: Assuredly, what ye are promised must come to pass.
Ye did indeed wish for death before ye met him: Now ye have seen him with your own eyes, (And ye flinch!)

Muhammad is no more than a messenger: many Were the messenger that passed away before him. If he died or were slain, will ye then Turn back on your heels? If any did turn back on his heels, not the least harm will he do to Allah; but Allah (on the other hand) will swiftly reward those who (serve Him) with gratitude.

name: Nafs
subtopic1: Desting – Fate – Decree – Pre – Destination – Divine
translation: Nor can a soul die except by Allah's leave, the term being fixed as by writing. If any do desire a reward in this life, We shall give it to him; and if any do desire a reward in the Hereafter, We shall give it to him. And swiftly shall We reward those that (serve us with) gratitude.

name: Verses on Killing
translation: O ye who believe! Be not like the Unbelievers, who say of their brethren, when they are travelling through the Earth or engaged in fighting: "If they had stayed with us, they would not have died, or been slain." This that Allah may make it a cause of sighs and regrets in their hearts. It is Allah that gives Life and Death, and Allah sees well all that ye do.

name: Forgiveness
translation: And if ye are slain, or die, in the way of Allah, forgiveness and mercy from Allah are far better than all they could amass.
After that, at length ye will die
(In Falsehood will they be) Until, when death comes to one of them, he says: "O my Lord! send me back (to life),-
Truly thou wilt die (one day), and truly they (too) will die (one day).

name: About Difficulties
translation: What! Do those who seek after evil ways think that We shall hold them equal with those who believe and do righteous deeds,- that equal will be their life and their death? Ill is the judgment that they make.
And the stupor of death will bring Truth (before his eyes): "This was the thing which thou wast trying to escape!"
Then why do ye not (intervene) when (the soul of the dying man) reaches the throat,-
And ye the while (sit) looking on,-
But We are nearer to him than ye, and yet see not,-
Then why do ye not,- If you are exempt from (future) account,-

name: Truth and Honesty
translation: Call back the soul, if ye are true (in the claim of independence)?

name: Truth and Honesty
translation: Say: "O ye that stand on Judaism! If ye think that ye are friends to Allah, to the exclusion of (other) men, then express your desire for Death, if ye are truthful!"

name: Qiyamah
translation: Some faces, that Day, will beam (in brightness and beauty);-

name: Qiyamah
translation: Looking towards their Lord;

name: Qiyamah
translation: And some faces, that Day, will be sad and dismal,

name: Qiyamah
translation: In the thought that some back-breaking calamity was about to be inflicted on them;

name: Qiyamah
translation: Yea, when (the soul) reaches to the collar-bone (in its exit),

name: Qiyamah
translation: And there will be a cry, "Who is a magician (to restore him)?"

name: Qiyamah
translation: And he will conclude that it was (the Time) of Parting;

name: Qiyamah
translation: And one leg will be joined with another:

name: Qiyamah
translation: That Day the Drive will be (all) to thy Lord!

name: About the grave
translation: Then He causeth him to die, and putteth him in his grave;

name: About the grave
translation: Until ye visit the graves.

name: Qiyamah
translation: Every soul shall have a taste of death: And only on the Day of Judgment shall you be paid your full recompense. Only he who is saved far from the Fire and admitted to the Garden will have attained the object (of Life): For the life of this world is but goods and chattels of deception.

name: Revenge
translation: Nor will they there taste Death, except the first death; and He will preserve them from the Penalty of the Blazing Fire,-

name: Zakat
translation: If the debtor is in a difficulty, grant him time Till it is easy for him to repay. But if ye remit it by way of charity, that is best for you if ye only knew.

name: Shaitan / Satan
translation: (The Pagans), leaving Him, call but upon female deities: They call but upon satan the persistent rebel!

name: Nafs
translation: It was not We that wronged them: They wronged their own souls: the deities, other than Allah, whom they invoked, profited them no whit when there issued the decree of thy Lord: Nor did they add aught (to their lot) but perdition!

Be not then in doubt as to what these men worship. They worship nothing but what their fathers worshipped before (them): but verily We shall pay them back (in full) their portion without (the least) abatement.

name: Contentment
translation: And they set up (idols) as equal to Allah, to mislead (men) from the Path! Say: "Enjoy (your brief power)! But verily ye are making straightway for Hell!"

name: On Lying
translation: These our people have taken for worship gods other than Him: why do they not bring forward an authority clear (and convincing) for what they do? Who doth more wrong than such as invent a falsehood against Allah?

name: Nafs
translation: Yet have they taken, besides him, gods that can create nothing but are themselves created; that have no control of hurt or good to themselves; nor can they control death nor life nor resurrection.
Yet they take (for worship) gods other than Allah, (hoping) that they might be helped!
They have not the power to help them: but they will be brought up (before Our Judgment-seat) as a troop (to be condemned).

name: Oneness of Allah (swt)
translation: Has he made the gods (all) into one Allah? Truly this is a wonderful thing!
Then shall it be said to them: "Where are the (deities) to which ye gave part-worship-

name: About Disbelievers
translation: In derogation of Allah? They will reply: "They have left us in the lurch: Nay, we invoked not, of old, anything (that had real existence)." Thus does Allah leave the Unbelievers to stray.
The (deities) they used to invoke aforetime will leave them in the lurch, and they will perceive that they have no way of escape.

Why then was no help forthcoming to them from those whom they worshipped as gods, besides Allah, as a means of access (to Allah)? Nay, they left them in the lurch: but that was their falsehood and their invention.
And they have said (to each other), 'Abandon not your gods: Abandon neither Wadd nor Suwa', neither Yaguth nor Ya'uq, nor Nasr';-

name: Taqwa
subtopic2: if foes cease, then you must cease
translation: Except those who join a group between whom and you there is a treaty (of peace), or those who approach you with hearts restraining them from fighting you as well as fighting their own people. If Allah had pleased, He could have given them power over you, and they would have fought you: Therefore if they withdraw from you but fight you not, and (instead) send you (Guarantees of) peace, then Allah Hath opened no way for you (to war against them).

name: Peace
subtopic2: killing only during hostilities in progress
translation: Others you will find that wish to gain your confidence as well as that of their people: Every time they are sent back to temptation, they succumb thereto: if they withdraw not from you nor give you (guarantees) of peace besides restraining their hands, seize them and slay them wherever ye get them: In their case We have provided you with a clear argument against them.

name: Grief
translation: So lose not heart, nor fall into despair: For ye must gain mastery if ye are true in Faith.
(With profit) to whoever among you wills to go straight:

name: Allah's Mercy
translation: We admitted them to Our mercy: for they were of the righteous ones.

name: Prophet Dhul Kifl (as)
translation: And commemorate Isma'il, Elisha, and Zul-Kifl: Each of them was of the Company of the Good.
So We listened to him: and delivered him from distress: and thus do We deliver those who have faith.
Had not Grace from his Lord reached him, he would indeed have been cast off on the naked shore, in disgrace.
Thus did his Lord choose him and make him of the Company of the Righteous.

main_Topic2: Difficulty ( there is relief with every )
translation: Therefore, when thou art free (from thine immediate task), still labour hard,

subtopic2: ask Muhammad to invoke Allah`s wrath upon them as proof
translation: Say: "If what ye would see hastened were in my power, the matter would be settled at once between you and me. But Allah knoweth best those who do wrong."

subtopic2: ask Muhammad to invoke Allah`s wrath upon them as proof
translation: Remember how they said: "O Allah if this is indeed the Truth from Thee, rain down on us a shower of stones form the sky, or send us a grievous penalty."

subtopic2: ask Muhammad to invoke Allah`s wrath upon them as proof
translation: At length will be said to the wrong-doers: 'Taste ye the enduring punishment! ye get but the recompense of what ye earned!'

name: Taqwa
subtopic2: bear what they say in patience
translation: Therefore be patient with what they say, and celebrate (constantly) the praises of thy Lord, before the rising of the sun, and before its setting; yea, celebrate them for part of the hours of the night, and at the sides of the day: that thou mayest have (spiritual) joy.

name: Jahannam / Hell
subtopic2: Allah brings their scheming to nought
translation: The Unbelievers spend their wealth to hinder (man) from the path of Allah, and so will they continue to spend; but in the end they will have (only) regrets and sighs; at length they will be overcome: and the Unbelievers will be gathered together to Hell;-

name: Dawah
subtopic2: protect them if they ask you to
translation: If one amongst the Pagans ask thee for asylum, grant it to him, so that he may hear the word of Allah; and then escort him to where he can be secure. That is because they are men without knowledge.

name: Verses on Killing
translation: Let not the unbelievers think that they can get the better (of the godly): they will never frustrate (them).

name: Jahannam / Hell
mainTopic1: Coloration of Maker – Variegation of Creator
subtopic2: if foes cease, then you must cease
translation: In order that Allah may separate the impure from the pure, put the impure, one on another, heap them together, and cast them into Hell. They will be the ones to have lost.

name: Nafs
subtopic2: should not visit or take care of mosques
disbelievers should not visit or take care of
translation: It is not for such as join gods with Allah, to visit or maintain the mosques of Allah while they witness against their own souls to infidelity. The works of such bear no fruit: In Fire shall they dwell.

name: Hypocrites
translation: O Prophet! strive hard against the unbelievers and the Hypocrites, and be firm against them. Their abode is Hell,- an evil refuge indeed.

name: Dawah
translation: Therefore listen not to the Unbelievers, but strive against them with the utmost strenuousness, with the (Qur'an).

name: Hypocrites
translation: O Prophet! Strive hard against the Unbelievers and the Hypocrites, and be firm against them. Their abode is Hell,- an evil refuge (indeed).

name: On Lying
translation: In their hearts is a disease; and Allah has increased their disease: And grievous is the penalty they (incur), because they are false (to themselves).

name: Nafs
translation: Those in whose hearts is a disease - thou seest how eagerly they run about amongst them, saying: "We do fear lest a change of fortune bring us disaster." Ah! perhaps Allah will give (thee) victory, or a decision according to His will. Then will they repent of the thoughts which they secretly harboured in their hearts.

name: Tawakkul
translation: Lo! the hypocrites say, and those in whose hearts is a disease: "These people,- their religion has misled them." But if any trust in Allah, behold! Allah is Exalted in might, Wise.

name: Taqwa
translation: But those in whose hearts is a disease,- it will add doubt to their doubt, and they will die in a state of Unbelief.

name: Trials of Life
translation: That He may make the suggestions thrown in by Satan, but a trial for those in whose hearts is a disease and who are hardened of heart: verily the wrong-doers are in a schism far (from the Truth):
Is it that there is a disease in their hearts? or do they doubt, or are they in fear, that Allah and His Messenger will deal unjustly with them? Nay, it is they themselves who do wrong.

name: Neighbor
subtopic2: hypocrites will be slain in Medina during the "War of the Confederates"
translation: Truly, if the Hypocrites, and those in whose hearts is a disease, and those who stir up sedition in the City, desist not, We shall certainly stir thee up against them: Then will they not be able to stay in it as thy neighbours for any length of time:

name: About Difficulties
translation: Those who believe say, "Why is not a sura sent down (for us)?" But when a sura of basic or categorical meaning is revealed, and fighting is mentioned therein, thou wilt see those in whose hearts is a disease looking at thee with a look of one in swoon at the approach of death. But more fitting for them-
Or do those in whose hearts is a disease, think that Allah will not bring to light all their rancour?

name: Shaitan / Satan
subtopic2: learning of it through divination forbidden
translation: O ye who believe! Intoxicants and gambling, (dedication of) stones, and (divination by) arrows, are an abomination,- of Satan's handwork: eschew such (abomination), that ye may prosper.

name: Divorce
translation: A divorce is only permissible twice: after that, the parties should either hold Together on equitable terms, or separate with kindness. It is not lawful for you, (Men), to take back any of your gifts (from your wives), except when both parties fear that they would be unable to keep the limits ordained by Allah. If ye (judges) do indeed fear that they would be unable to keep the limits ordained by Allah, there is no blame on either of them if she give something for her freedom. These are the limits ordained by Allah; so do not transgress them if any do transgress the limits ordained by Allah, such persons wrong (Themselves as well as others).

name: Divorce
translation: So if a husband divorces his wife (irrevocably), He cannot, after that, re-marry her until after she has married another husband and He has divorced her. In that case there is no blame on either of them if they re-unite, provided they feel that they can keep the limits ordained by Allah. Such are the limits ordained by Allah, which He makes plain to those who understand.

name: Provision
translation: There is no blame on you if ye divorce women before consummation or the fixation of their dower; but bestow on them (A suitable gift), the wealthy according to his means, and the poor according to his means;- A gift of a reasonable amount is due from those who wish to do the right thing.

name: Taqwa
translation: And if ye divorce them before consummation, but after the fixation of a dower for them, then the half of the dower (Is due to them), unless they remit it or (the man's half) is remitted by him in whose hands is the marriage tie; and the remission (of the man's half) is the nearest to righteousness. And do not forget Liberality between yourselves. For Allah sees well all that ye do.

name: Widows
translation: For divorced women Maintenance (should be provided) on a reasonable (scale). This is a duty on the righteous.

name: Divorce
translation: O ye who believe! When ye marry believing women, and then divorce them before ye have touched them, no period of 'Iddat have ye to count in respect of them: so give them a present. And set them free in a handsome manner.

name: Zina
translation: O Prophet! When ye do divorce women, divorce them at their prescribed periods, and count (accurately), their prescribed periods: And fear Allah your Lord: and turn them not out of their houses, nor shall they (themselves) leave, except in case they are guilty of some open lewdness, those are limits set by Allah: and any who transgresses the limits of Allah, does verily wrong his (own) soul: thou knowest not if perchance Allah will bring about thereafter some new situation.

name: Taqwa
translation: Such of your women as have passed the age of monthly courses, for them the prescribed period, if ye have any doubts, is three months, and for those who have no courses (it is the same): for those who carry (life within their wombs), their period is until they deliver their burdens: and for those who fear Allah, He will make their path easy.

name: Taqwa
translation: That is the Command of Allah, which He has sent down to you: and if any one fears Allah, He will remove his ills, from him, and will enlarge his reward.

name: Nafs
translation: And give the women (on marriage) their dower as a free gift; but if they, of their own good pleasure, remit any part of it to you, Take it and enjoy it with right good cheer.

name: Zina
subtopic2: consort with wives in a goodly manner
translation: O ye who believe! Ye are forbidden to inherit women against their will. Nor should ye treat them with harshness, that ye may Take away part of the dower ye have given them,-except where they have been guilty of open lewdness; on the contrary live with them on a footing of kindness and equity. If ye take a dislike to them it may be that ye dislike a thing, and Allah brings about through it a great deal of good.

name: Women's Rights
translation: But if ye decide to take one wife in place of another, even if ye had given the latter a whole treasure for dower, Take not the least bit of it back: Would ye take it by slander and manifest wrong?

name: Women's Rights
translation: And how could ye take it when ye have gone in unto each other, and they have Taken from you a solemn covenant?

name: Faith
subtopic2: with women of the People of the Book
translation: This day are (all) things good and pure made lawful unto you. The food of the People of the Book is lawful unto you and yours is lawful unto them. (Lawful unto you in marriage) are (not only) chaste women who are believers, but chaste women among the People of the Book, revealed before your time,- when ye give them their due dowers, and desire chastity, not lewdness, nor secret intrigues if any one rejects faith, fruitless is his work, and in the Hereafter he will be in the ranks of those who have lost (all spiritual good).

name: Taqwa
subtopic1: Apostasy ”Black Sliding” Renegation Turn Back FromReligion.
translation: And if any of your wives deserts you to the Unbelievers, and ye have an accession (by the coming over of a woman from the other side), then pay to those whose wives have deserted the equivalent of what they had spent (on their dower). And fear Allah, in Whom ye believe.

name: Inheritance
translation: Behold! Joseph said to his father: "O my father! I did see eleven stars and the sun and the moon: I saw them prostrate themselves to me!"
They said: "A confused medley of dreams: and we are not skilled in the interpretation of dreams."

But the man who had been released, one of the two (who had been in prison) and who now bethought him after (so long) a space of time, said: "I will tell you the truth of its interpretation: send ye me (therefore)."
(Joseph) said: "For seven years shall ye diligently sow as is your wont: and the harvests that ye reap, ye shall leave them in the ear,- except a little, of which ye shall eat.
Then will come after that (period) seven dreadful (years), which will devour what ye shall have laid by in advance for them,- (all) except a little which ye shall have (specially) guarded.
Then will come after that (period) a year in which the people will have abundant water, and in which they will press (wine and oil).
They ask thee concerning Zul-qarnain. Say, "I will rehearse to you something of his story."
Verily We established his power on earth, and We gave him the ways and the means to all ends.
One (such) way he followed,

Until, when he reached the setting of the sun, he found it set in a spring of murky water: Near it he found a People: We said: "O Zul-qarnain! (thou hast authority,) either to punish them, or to treat them with kindness."
He said: "Whoever doth wrong, him shall we punish; then shall he be sent back to his Lord; and He will punish him with a punishment unheard-of (before).
But whoever believes, and works righteousness,- he shall have a goodly reward, and easy will be his task as We order it by our Command.
Then followed he (another) way,
Until, when he came to the rising of the sun, he found it rising on a people for whom We had provided no covering protection against the sun.
(He left them) as they were: We completely understood what was before him.
Then followed he (another) way,
Until, when he reached (a tract) between two mountains, he found, beneath them, a people who scarcely understood a word.

name: Corruption
translation: They said: "O Zul-qarnain! the Gog and Magog (People) do great mischief on earth: shall we then render thee tribute in order that thou mightest erect a barrier between us and them?

name: Strength
translation: He said: "(The power) in which my Lord has established me is better (than tribute): Help me therefore with strength (and labour): I will erect a strong barrier between you and them:

Bring me blocks of iron. At length, when he had filled up the space between the two steep mountain-sides, He said, "Blow (with your bellows)" Then, when he had made it (red) as fire, he said: "Bring me, that I may pour over it, molten lead."
Thus were they made powerless to scale it or to dig through it.
And We shall turn to whatever deeds they did (in this life), and We shall make such deeds as floating dust scattered about.
By the (Winds) that scatter broadcast;

name: Qiyamah
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: Becoming dust scattered abroad,
And other faces that Day will be dust-stained,
And raise the dust in clouds the while,
That was a people that hath passed away. They shall reap the fruit of what they did, and ye of what ye do! Of their merits there is no question in your case!
That was a people that hath passed away. They shall reap the fruit of what they did, and ye of what ye do! Of their merits there is no question in your case:

name: Nafs
translation: And if any one earns sin. he earns it against His own soul: for Allah is full of knowledge and wisdom.

name: Slander
translation: But if any one earns a fault or a sin and throws it on to one that is innocent, He carries (on himself) (Both) a falsehood and a flagrant sin.
Thus do we make the wrong-doers turn to each other, because of what they earn.

subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: And Allah sends down rain from the skies, and gives therewith life to the earth after its death: verily in this is a Sign for those who listen.

subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: And among His Signs, He shows you the lightning, by way both of fear and of hope, and He sends down rain from the sky and with it gives life to the earth after it is dead: verily in that are Signs for those who are wise.

subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: A Sign for them is the earth that is dead: We do give it life, and produce grain therefrom, of which ye do eat.

subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: That sends down (from time to time) rain from the sky in due measure;- and We raise to life therewith a land that is dead; even so will ye be raised (from the dead);-

main_Topic2: all that is on it will perish
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: Have We not made the earth (as a place) to draw together.

name: About the grave
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: The living and the dead,

name: Taqwa
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: Why were there not, among the generations before you, persons possessed of balanced good sense, prohibiting (men) from mischief in the earth - except a few among them whom We saved (from harm)? But the wrong-doers pursued the enjoyment of the good things of life which were given them, and persisted in sin.

name: Corruption
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: (The brothers) said: "By Allah! well ye know that we came not to make mischief in the land, and we are no thieves!"

name: Corruption
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: Who make mischief in the land, and mend not (their ways).

name: Corruption
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: There were in the city nine men of a family, who made mischief in the land, and would not reform.

name: Corruption
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: Then, is it to be expected of you, if ye were put in authority, that ye will do mischief in the land, and break your ties of kith and kin?

name: Generosity
main_Topic2: all that is on it will perish
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: Do they not look at the earth,- how many noble things of all kinds We have produced therein?

name: Qiyamah
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: One Day We shall remove the mountains, and thou wilt see the earth as a level stretch, and We shall gather them, all together, nor shall We leave out any one of them.

name: Qiyamah
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: They ask thee concerning the Mountains: say, "My Lord will uproot them and scatter them as dust;

name: Qiyamah
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: He will leave them as plains smooth and level;

name: Qiyamah
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: Nothing crooked or curved wilt thou see in their place.

name: Qiyamah
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: And the mountains will fly hither and thither.

main_Topic2: all that is on it will perish
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: When the earth shall be shaken to its depths,

subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: And the mountains shall be crumbled to atoms,

name: Qiyamah
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: And the earth is moved, and its mountains, and they are crushed to powder at one stroke,-

name: Qiyamah
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: And the mountains will be like wool,

name: Qiyamah
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: One Day the earth and the mountains will be in violent commotion. And the mountains will be as a heap of sand poured out and flowing down.

name: Qiyamah
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: When the mountains are scattered (to the winds) as dust;

name: Qiyamah
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: And the mountains shall vanish, as if they were a mirage.

subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: When the mountains vanish (like a mirage);

name: Qiyamah
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: When the oceans boil over with a swell;

name: Qiyamah
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: When the Oceans are suffered to burst forth;

name: Qiyamah
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: And when the Graves are turned upside down;-

main_Topic2: all that is on it will perish
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: And when the earth is flattened out,

main_Topic2: all that is on it will perish
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: And casts forth what is within it and becomes (clean) empty,

name: Qiyamah
main_Topic2: all that is on it will perish
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: And hearkens to (the Command of) its Lord,- and it must needs (do so);- (then will come Home the full reality).

name: Qiyamah
main_Topic2: all that is on it will perish
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: Nay! When the earth is pounded to powder,

name: Qiyamah
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: When the earth is shaken to her (utmost) convulsion,

name: Qiyamah
main_Topic2: all that is on it will perish
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: And the earth throws up her burdens (from within),

name: Qiyamah
main_Topic2: all that is on it will perish
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: And man cries (distressed): 'What is the matter with her?'-

name: Qiyamah
main_Topic2: all that is on it will perish
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: On that Day will she declare her tidings:

name: Qiyamah
main_Topic2: all that is on it will perish
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: For that thy Lord will have given her inspiration.

subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: And We split the earth in fragments,

main_Topic2: all that is on it will perish
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: And by the Earth which opens out (for the gushing of springs or the sprouting of vegetation),-

name: On Animals
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: He Who has, made for you the earth like a carpet spread out; has enabled you to go about therein by roads (and channels); and has sent down water from the sky. With it have We produced diverse pairs of plants each separate from the others.

main_Topic2: all that is on it will perish
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: (Yea, the same that) has made for you the earth (like a carpet) spread out, and has made for you roads (and channels) therein, in order that ye may find guidance (on the way);

main_Topic2: all that is on it will perish
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: It is He Who has spread out the earth for (His) creatures:

subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: And Allah has made the earth for you as a carpet (spread out),

subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: That ye may go about therein, in spacious roads.'

main_Topic2: all that is on it will perish
subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: By the Earth and its (wide) expanse:

subtopic2: all that is on it will perish
translation: Assuredly Allah did help you in many battle-fields and on the day of Hunain: Behold! your great numbers elated you, but they availed you naught: the land, for all that it is wide, did constrain you, and ye turned back in retreat.
So the earthquake took them unawares, and they lay prostrate in their homes in the morning!

name: On Justice
translation: But the earthquake took them unawares, and they lay prostrate in their homes before the morning!

name: Revenge
translation: Those before them did also plot (against Allah's Way): but Allah took their structures from their foundations, and the roof fell down on them from above; and the Wrath seized them from directions they did not perceive.

name: Taqwa
translation: Nor walk on the earth with insolence: for thou canst not rend the earth asunder, nor reach the mountains in height.

Do ye then feel secure that He will not cause you to be swallowed up beneath the earth when ye are on land, or that He will not send against you a violent tornado (with showers of stones) so that ye shall find no one to carry out your affairs for you?
Do ye feel secure that He Who is in heaven will not cause you to be swallowed up by the earth when it shakes (as in an earthquake)?

name: People of Thamud
translation: But the Thamud,- they were destroyed by a terrible Storm of thunder and lightning!
Eat ye and drink ye to your heart's content: for that ye worked (Righteousness).
Thus do We certainly reward the Doers of Good.
Ah woe, that Day, to the Rejecters of Truth!

name: Contentment
translation: (O ye unjust!) Eat ye and enjoy yourselves (but) a little while, for that ye are Sinners.

name: On Animals
translation: Seest thou not how thy Lord dealt with the Companions of the Elephant?
Did He not make their treacherous plan go astray?
Then did He make them like an empty field of stalks and straw, (of which the corn) has been eaten up.

name: Prophet Elijah (as)
subtopic2: in the ranks  of the Righteous
translation: And Zakariya and John, and Jesus and Elias: all in the ranks of the righteous:

name: Prophet Elijah (as)
translation: So also was Elias among those sent (by Us).

name: Taqwa
translation: Behold, he said to his people, "Will ye not fear (Allah)?
But they rejected him, and they will certainly be called up (for punishment),-
Except the sincere and devoted Servants of Allah (among them).
And We left (this blessing) for him among generations (to come) in later times:

name: Peace
translation: Peace and salutation to such as Elias!
Thus indeed do We reward those who do right.
For he was one of our believing Servants.

name: On The Universe
translation: And Isma'il and Elisha, and Jonas, and Lot: and to all We gave favour above the nations:

name: Nikkah
translation: And Allah did create you from dust; then from a sperm-drop; then He made you in pairs. And no female conceives, or lays down (her load), but with His knowledge. Nor is a man long-lived granted length of days, nor is a part cut off from his life, but is in a Decree (ordained). All this is easy to Allah.

name: Human Body
translation: It is He Who has created you from dust then from a sperm-drop, then from a leech-like clot; then does he get you out (into the light) as a child: then lets you (grow and) reach your age of full strength; then lets you become old,- though of you there are some who die before;- and lets you reach a Term appointed; in order that ye may learn wisdom.
Was he not a drop of sperm emitted (in lowly form)?
Then did he become a leech-like clot; then did (Allah) make and fashion (him) in due proportion.
And of him He made two sexes, male and female.

name: Swearing
translation: But if it gets known that these two were guilty of the sin (of perjury), let two others stand forth in their places,- nearest in kin from among those who claim a lawful right: let them swear by Allah: "We affirm that our witness is truer than that of those two, and that we have not trespassed (beyond the truth): if we did, behold! the wrong be upon us!"

name: Taqwa
translation: That is most suitable: that they may give the evidence in its true nature and shape, or else they would fear that other oaths would be taken after their oaths. But fear Allah, and listen (to His counsel): for Allah guideth not a rebellious people:

name: Good Character
translation: And those who launch a charge against chaste women, and produce not four witnesses (to support their allegations),- flog them with eighty stripes; and reject their evidence ever after: for such men are wicked transgressors;-

name: Truth and Honesty
translation: And for those who launch a charge against their spouses, and have (in support) no evidence but their own,- their solitary evidence (can be received) if they bear witness four times (with an oath) by Allah that they are solemnly telling the truth;

name: Marriage
translation: But it would avert the punishment from the wife, if she bears witness four times (with an oath) By Allah, that (her husband) is telling a lie;

name: Truth and Honesty
translation: And the fifth (oath) should be that she solemnly invokes the wrath of Allah on herself if (her accuser) is telling the truth.

name: About Disbelievers
translation: Hast thou not turned Thy vision to those who were given a portion of the Book? they believe in sorcery and Evil, and say to the Unbelievers that they are better guided in the (right) way Than the believers!

name: Jahannam / Hell
translation: They are (men) whom Allah hath cursed: And those whom Allah Hath cursed, thou wilt find, have no one to help.
Have they a share in dominion or power? Behold, they give not a farthing to their fellow-men?

name: Jahannam / Hell
translation: Some of them believed, and some of them averted their faces from him: And enough is Hell for a burning fire.

name: Jahannam / Hell
translation: But those who have earned evil will have a reward of like evil: ignominy will cover their (faces): No defender will they have from (the wrath of) Allah: Their faces will be covered, as it were, with pieces from the depth of the darkness of night: they are companions of the Fire: they will abide therein (for aye)!
There will every soul prove (the fruits of) the deeds it sent before: they will be brought back to Allah their rightful Lord, and their invented falsehoods will leave them in the lurch.

name: Shaitan / Satan
translation: Shall I inform you, (O people!), on whom it is that the evil ones descend?
They descend on every lying, wicked person,

name: On Lying
translation: (Into whose ears) they pour hearsay vanities, and most of them are liars.

name: Swearing
translation: And the Poets,- It is those straying in Evil, who follow them:

name: Remembrance of Allah (swt)
translation: Seest thou not that they wander distracted in every valley?-
And that they say what they practise not?-
Like those who lately preceded them, they have tasted the evil result of their conduct; and (in the Hereafter there is) for them a grievous Penalty;-
The end of both will be that they will go into the Fire, dwelling therein for ever. Such is the reward of the wrong-doers.

subtopic2: not external but a taint of the soul
translation: They would only say: "Our eyes have been intoxicated: Nay, we have been bewitched by sorcery."
He that doeth good shall have ten times as much to his credit: He that doeth evil shall only be recompensed according to his evil: no wrong shall be done unto (any of) them.
Repel evil with that which is best: We are well acquainted with the things they say.

name: Good Character
translation: Nor can goodness and Evil be equal. Repel (Evil) with what is better: Then will he between whom and thee was hatred become as it were thy friend and intimate!
In the long run evil in the extreme will be the End of those who do evil; for that they rejected the Signs of Allah, and held them up to ridicule.

name: Shaitan / Satan
translation: Seest thou not that We have set the Evil Ones on against the unbelievers, to incite them with fury?

name: Shaitan / Satan
translation: No evil ones have brought down this (Revelation):

name: Shaitan / Satan
subtopic2: companions of those who withdraw from the remembrance of Allah
translation: Such (evil ones) really hinder them from the Path, but they think that they are being guided aright!

subtopic2: companions of those who withdraw from the remembrance of Allah
translation: At length, when (such a one) comes to Us, he says (to his evil companion): "Would that between me and thee were the distance of East and West!" Ah! evil is the companion (indeed)!

name: Business
subtopic2: companions of those who withdraw from the remembrance of Allah
translation: When ye have done wrong, it will avail you nothing, that Day, that ye shall be partners in Punishment!

name: Shaitan / Satan
translation: Likewise did We make for every Messenger an enemy,- evil ones among men and jinns, inspiring each other with flowery discourses by way of deception. If thy Lord had so planned, they would not have done it: so leave them and their inventions alone.

name: Shaitan / Satan
translation: And (moreover) We have guarded them from every cursed devil:

name: Shaitan / Satan
subtopic2: Heaven ( lower ) adorned with lights ( bedecked with stars )
flaming fire to repel evil ones
translation: (For beauty) and for guard against all obstinate rebellious evil spirits,

subtopic2: Heaven ( lower ) adorned with lights ( bedecked with stars )
flaming fire to repel evil ones
translation: Repulsed, for they are under a perpetual penalty,

subtopic2: Heaven ( lower ) adorned with lights ( bedecked with stars )
flaming fire to repel evil ones
translation: Except such as snatch away something by stealth, and they are pursued by a flaming fire, of piercing brightness.

name: Shaitan / Satan
translation: When she was delivered, she said: "O my Lord! Behold! I am delivered of a female child!"- and Allah knew best what she brought forth- "And no wise is the male Like the female. I have named her Mary, and I commend her and her offspring to Thy protection from the Evil One, the Rejected."
Seeing that it is He that has created you in diverse stages?
And in the End He will return you into the (earth), and raise you forth (again at the Resurrection)?

name: On Knowledge
subtopic2: a bringer of glad tidings and a warner
translation: No knowledge have I of the Chiefs on high, when they discuss (matters) among themselves.

name: People of the Book
translation: Say: "O people of the Book! exceed not in your religion the bounds (of what is proper), trespassing beyond the truth, nor follow the vain desires of people who went wrong in times gone by,- who misled many, and strayed (themselves) from the even way.
Nor did they (usually) forbid one another the iniquities which they committed: evil indeed were the deeds which they did.

name: Nafs
translation: Thou seest many of them turning in friendship to the Unbelievers. Evil indeed are (the works) which their souls have sent forward before them (with the result), that Allah's wrath is on them, and in torment will they abide.
If only they had believed in Allah, in the Prophet, and in what hath been revealed to him, never would they have taken them for friends and protectors, but most of them are rebellious wrong-doers.

main_Topic2: Eyes ( ear and skills ) will bear witness against sinners
translation: But this thought of yours which ye did entertain concerning your Lord, hath brought you to destruction, and (now) have ye become of those utterly lost!

name: Nafs
translation: But no, by the Lord, they can have no (real) Faith, until they make thee judge in all disputes between them, and find in their souls no resistance against Thy decisions, but accept them with the fullest conviction.
And behold! I inspired the disciples to have faith in Me and Mine Messenger: they said, 'We have faith, and do thou bear witness that we bow to Allah as Muslims'.

name: Faith
main_Topic2: Gardens of Bliss and Felicity ( and Delights Naim )
subtopic2: Gardens of Bliss and Felicity ( and Delights Naim )
translation: Those who believe, and work righteousness,- their Lord will guide them because of their faith: beneath them will flow rivers in gardens of bliss.

name: Respecting Other Religions
translation: If it had been thy Lord's will, they would all have believed,- all who are on earth! wilt thou then compel mankind, against their will, to believe!

name: Nafs
translation: No soul can believe, except by the will of Allah, and He will place doubt (or obscurity) on those who will not understand.

name: Taqwa
translation: Whoever works righteousness, man or woman, and has Faith, verily, to him will We give a new Life, a life that is good and pure and We will bestow on such their reward according to the best of their actions.

name: Creation
subtopic2: pattern according to which Allah made him
pattern on which they were made
translation: So set thou thy face steadily and truly to the Faith: (establish) Allah's handiwork according to the pattern on which He has made mankind: no change (let there be) in the work (wrought) by Allah: that is the standard Religion: but most among mankind understand not.

name: Guidance
translation: These are clear evidences to men and a Guidance and Mercy to those of assured Faith.

name: Disobedience
subtopic2: Allah has endeared it to you ( and has made it beautiful in your hearts )
translation: And know that among you is Allah's Messenger: were he, in many matters, to follow your (wishes), ye would certainly fall into misfortune: But Allah has endeared the Faith to you, and has made it beautiful in your hearts, and He has made hateful to you Unbelief, wickedness, and rebellion: such indeed are those who walk in righteousness;-

subtopic2: Allah has endeared it to you ( and has made it beautiful in your hearts )
translation: A Grace and Favour from Allah; and Allah is full of Knowledge and Wisdom.

name: Truth and Honesty
translation: They impress on thee as a favour that they have embraced Islam. Say, "Count not your Islam as a favour upon me: Nay, Allah has conferred a favour upon you that He has guided you to the faith, if ye be true and sincere.

name: About Disbelievers
translation: As to those who reject Faith, it is the same to them whether thou warn them or do not warn them; they will not believe.

subtopic2: their hearing and seeing is covered over
translation: Allah hath set a seal on their hearts and on their hearing, and on their eyes is a veil; great is the penalty they (incur).
Then would those who are followed clear themselves of those who follow (them): They would see the penalty, and all relations between them would be cut off.

name: Jahannam / Hell
translation: And those who followed would say: "If only We had one more chance, We would clear ourselves of them, as they have cleared themselves of us." Thus will Allah show them (The fruits of) their deeds as (nothing but) regrets. Nor will there be a way for them out of the Fire.

name: About Disbelievers
subtopic2: fuel for the Fire (Companions of the Fire)
translation: Those who reject Faith,- neither their possessions nor their (numerous) progeny will avail them aught against Allah: They are themselves but fuel for the Fire.

name: Jahannam / Hell
subtopic2: fuel for the Fire (Companions of the Fire)
translation: Say to those who reject Faith: "Soon will ye be vanquished and gathered together to Hell,-an evil bed indeed (to lie on)!

name: Verses on Killing
translation: As to those who deny the Signs of Allah and in defiance of right, slay the prophets, and slay those who teach just dealing with mankind, announce to them a grievous penalty.

name: Dunya
translation: They are those whose works will bear no fruit in this world and in the Hereafter nor will they have anyone to help.

name: About Disbelievers
translation: Those who reject Faith,- neither their possessions nor their (numerous) progeny will avail them aught against Allah: They will be companions of the Fire,-dwelling therein (for ever).

name: Verses on Killing
translation: Allah hath heard the taunt of those who say: "Truly, Allah is indigent and we are rich!"- We shall certainly record their word and (their act) of slaying the prophets in defiance of right, and We shall say: "Taste ye the penalty of the Scorching Fire!

name: Truth and Honesty
