On the Day that the Punishment shall cover them from above them and from below them, and (a Voice) shall say: "Taste ye (the fruits) of your deeds!"

As to those who are rebellious and wicked, their abode will be the Fire: every time they wish to get away therefrom, they will be forced thereinto, and it will be said to them: "Taste ye the Penalty of the Fire, the which ye were wont to reject as false."

name: Jahannam / Hell
translation: This is the Hell of which ye were (repeatedly) warned!

name: About Disbelievers
translation: Embrace ye the (fire) this Day, for that ye (persistently) rejected (Truth).
Yea, such! but - for the wrong-doers will be an evil place of (Final) Return!-

name: Jahannam / Hell
translation: Hell!- they will burn therein, - an evil bed (indeed, to lie on)!-

name: Jahannam / Hell
subtopic2: burning despair and ice cold darkness in
translation: Yea, such! - then shall they taste it,- a boiling fluid, and a fluid dark, murky, intensely cold!-
And other Penalties of a similar kind, to match them!
Here is a troop rushing headlong with you! No welcome for them! truly, they shall burn in the Fire!
(The followers shall cry to the misleaders:) "Nay, ye (too)! No welcome for you! It is ye who have brought this upon us! Now evil is (this) place to stay in!"
They will say: "Our Lord! whoever brought this upon us,- Add to him a double Penalty in the Fire!"
And they will say: "What has happened to us that we see not men whom we used to number among the bad ones?
Did we treat them (as such) in ridicule, or have (our) eyes failed to perceive them?
Truly that is just and fitting,- the mutual recriminations of the People of the Fire!

name: Qiyamah
translation: On the Day of Judgment wilt thou see those who told lies against Allah;- their faces will be turned black; Is there not in Hell an abode for the Haughty?
When the yokes (shall be) round their necks, and the chains; they shall be dragged along-
In the boiling fetid fluid: then in the Fire shall they be burned;
That was because ye were wont to rejoice on the earth in things other than the Truth, and that ye were wont to be insolent.

name: Jahannam / Hell
translation: Enter ye the gates of Hell, to dwell therein: and evil is (this) abode of the arrogant!

name: Qiyamah
translation: The sinners will be in the Punishment of Hell, to dwell therein (for aye):

name: Qiyamah
translation: Nowise will the (Punishment) be lightened for them, and in despair will they be there overwhelmed.

name: Revenge
translation: Verily the tree of Zaqqum

name: Revenge
translation: Will be the food of the Sinful,-

name: Revenge
translation: Like molten brass; it will boil in their insides.

name: Revenge
translation: Like the boiling of scalding water.

name: Revenge
translation: (A voice will cry: "Seize ye him and drag him into the midst of the Blazing Fire!

name: Revenge
translation: Then pour over his head the Penalty of Boiling Water,

name: Revenge
translation: Taste thou (this)! Truly wast thou mighty, full of honour!

name: Revenge
translation: Truly this is what ye used to doubt!

name: Jahannam / Hell
translation: In front of them is Hell: and of no profit to them is anything they may have earned, nor any protectors they may have taken to themselves besides Allah: for them is a tremendous Penalty.

name: Jahannam / Hell
translation: (The sentence will be:) "Throw, throw into Hell every contumacious Rejecter (of Allah)!-
Who forbade what was good, transgressed all bounds, cast doubts and suspicions;

name: Qiyamah
translation: And they became divided only after Knowledge reached them,- through selfish envy as between themselves. Had it not been for a Word that went forth before from thy Lord, (tending) to a Term appointed, the matter would have been settled between them: But truly those who have inherited the Book after them are in suspicious (disquieting) doubt concerning it.

name: On Anger
translation: But those who dispute concerning Allah after He has been accepted,- futile is their dispute in the Sight of their Lord: on them will be a Penalty terrible.

name: Jahannam / Hell
translation: The Day they will be dragged through the Fire on their faces, (they will hear:) "Taste ye the touch of Hell!"

name: Jahannam / Hell
translation: This is the Hell which the Sinners deny:

name: Jahannam / Hell
translation: In its midst and in the midst of boiling hot water will they wander round!
The Companions of the Left Hand,- what will be the Companions of the Left Hand?
(They will be) in the midst of a Fierce Blast of Fire and in Boiling Water,
And in the shades of Black Smoke:

name: Generosity
translation: Nothing (will there be) to refresh, nor to please:
For that they were wont to be indulged, before that, in wealth (and luxury),

name: On Sin
translation: And persisted obstinately in wickedness supreme!

name: Atheism
translation: And they used to say, "What! when we die and become dust and bones, shall we then indeed be raised up again?-
(We) and our fathers of old?

name: Qiyamah
translation: Say: "Yea, those of old and those of later times,
Then will ye truly,- O ye that go wrong, and treat (Truth) as Falsehood!-
Ye will surely taste of the Tree of Zaqqum.
Then will ye fill your insides therewith,
And drink Boiling Water on top of it:
Indeed ye shall drink like diseased camels raging with thirst!
And burning in Hell-Fire.

name: About Disbelievers
translation: This Day shall no ransom be accepted of you, nor of those who rejected Allah. Your abode is the Fire: that is the proper place to claim you: and an evil refuge it is!"

mainTopic1: Coloration of Maker – Variegation of Creator
translation: (The stern command will say): "Seize ye him, and bind ye him,
And burn ye him in the Blazing Fire.
Further, make him march in a chain, whereof the length is seventy cubits!
This was he that would not believe in Allah Most High.
So no friend hath he here this Day.
Nor hath he any food except the corruption from the washing of wounds,
Which none do eat but those in sin.
Plucking out (his being) right to the skull!-

name: Dawah
translation: Inviting (all) such as turn their backs and turn away their faces (from the Right).

name: Business
translation: And collect (wealth) and hide it (from use)!

name: Disobedience
translation: Unless I proclaim what I receive from Allah and His Messages: for any that disobey Allah and His Messenger,- for them is Hell: they shall dwell therein for ever.
With Us are Fetters (to bind them), and a Fire (to burn them),
And a Food that chokes, and a Penalty Grievous.

name: Jahannam / Hell
translation: Soon will I cast him into Hell-Fire!

name: Jahannam / Hell
translation: And what will explain to thee what Hell-Fire is?
Naught doth it permit to endure, and naught doth it leave alone!-
Darkening and changing the colour of man!

name: Jahannam / Hell
translation: What led you into Hell Fire?

name: On The Prayer
mainTopic1: Coloration of Maker – Variegation of Creator
translation: They will say: "We were not of those who prayed;
But we used to talk vanities with vain talkers;
And we used to deny the Day of Judgment,

name: On Animals
translation: Then will no intercession of (any) intercessors profit them.

name: About Disbelievers
translation: For the Rejecters we have prepared chains, yokes, and a blazing Fire.
(It will be said:) "Depart ye to that which ye used to reject as false!
Depart ye to a Shadow (of smoke ascending) in three columns,
(Which yields) no shade of coolness, and is of no use against the fierce Blaze.
Indeed it throws about sparks (huge) as Forts,
And the Wicked - they will be in the Fire,
Which they will enter on the Day of Judgment,
And they will not be able to keep away therefrom.
Further, they will enter the Fire of Hell.
Further, it will be said to them: "This is the (reality) which ye rejected as false!
On them will be Fire vaulted over (all round).
Ye shall certainly see Hell-Fire!
Again, ye shall see it with certainty of sight!

name: Jahannam / Hell
translation: Truly Hell is as a place of ambush,
For the transgressors a place of destination:
They will dwell therein for ages.
Nothing cool shall they taste therein, nor any drink,
Save a boiling fluid and a fluid, dark, murky, intensely cold,
A fitting recompense (for them).
For that they used not to fear any account (for their deeds),
And all things have We preserved on record.
So taste ye (the fruits of your deeds); for no increase shall We grant you, except in Punishment.

name: Qiyamah
translation: Nay they deny the hour (of the judgment to come): but We have prepared a blazing fire for such as deny the hour:

name: Qiyamah
translation: When it sees them from a place far off, they will hear its fury and its ranging sigh.
When they are cast therein, they will hear the (terrible) drawing in of its breath even as it blazes forth,

name: Qiyamah
translation: When the Blazing Fire is kindled to fierce heat;
Therefore do I warn you of a Fire blazing fiercely;
None shall reach it but those most unfortunate ones
Who give the lie to Truth and turn their backs.

name: Backbiting
translation: By no means! He will be sure to be thrown into That which Breaks to Pieces,

name: Backbiting
translation: And what will explain to thee That which Breaks to Pieces?

name: Backbiting
translation: (It is) the Fire of (the Wrath of) Allah kindled (to a blaze),

name: Backbiting
translation: The which doth mount (Right) to the Hearts:

name: Backbiting
translation: It shall be made into a vault over them,

name: Backbiting
translation: In columns outstretched.

name: Nafs
translation: If We had so willed, We could certainly have brought every soul its true guidance: but the Word from Me will come true, "I will fill Hell with Jinns and men all together."

name: Jahannam / Hell
translation: That I will certainly fill Hell with thee and those that follow thee,- every one.

name: Taqwa
translation: But if ye cannot- and of a surety ye cannot- then fear the Fire whose fuel is men and stones,- which is prepared for those who reject Faith.

name: Jahannam / Hell
translation: One Day We will ask Hell, "Art thou filled to the full?" It will say, "Are there any more (to come)?"

In gulps will he sip it, but never will he be near swallowing it down his throat: death will come to him from every quarter, yet will he not die: and in front of him will be a chastisement unrelenting.

name: Jahannam / Hell
translation: Verily he who comes to his Lord as a sinner (at Judgment),- for him is Hell: therein shall he neither die nor live.

name: Ungratefulness
translation: But those who reject (Allah) - for them will be the Fire of Hell: No term shall be determined for them, so they should die, nor shall its Penalty be lightened for them. Thus do We reward every ungrateful one!
Soon will he cry for perdition,
Such is the requital of the enemies of Allah,- the Fire: therein will be for them the Eternal Home: a (fit) requital, for that they were wont to reject Our Signs.

name: Remembrance of Allah (swt)
translation: And Hell, that Day, is brought (face to face),- on that Day will man remember, but how will that remembrance profit him?
Verily We have sent thee in truth as a bearer of glad tidings and a warner: But of thee no question shall be asked of the Companions of the Blazing Fire.

name: Livelihood
translation: And there are men who say: "Our Lord! Give us good in this world and good in the Hereafter, and defend us from the torment of the Fire!"

name: Jahannam / Hell
translation: Is the man who follows the good pleasure of Allah Like the man who draws on himself the wrath of Allah, and whose abode is in Hell?- A woeful refuge!

name: Intention
subtopic2: deliberate killing of believer and punishment
translation: If a man kills a believer intentionally, his recompense is Hell, to abide therein (For ever): And the wrath and the curse of Allah are upon him, and a dreadful penalty is prepared for him.

name: Good Character
translation: In most of their secret talks there is no good: But if one exhorts to a deed of charity or justice or conciliation between men, (Secrecy is permissible): To him who does this, seeking the good pleasure of Allah, We shall soon give a reward of the highest (value).

name: Jahannam / Hell
translation: Except the way of Hell, to dwell therein for ever. And this to Allah is easy.

name: About Disbelievers
subtopic2: fuel for the Fire (Companions of the Fire)
translation: Those who reject faith and deny our signs will be companions of Hell-fire.

name: Jannah
translation: Their wish will be to get out of the Fire, but never will they get out therefrom: their penalty will be one that endures.

name: About Disbelievers
subtopic2: fuel for the Fire (Companions of the Fire)
translation: But those who reject Faith and belie our Signs,- they shall be companions of Hell-fire.

If thou couldst but see when they are confronted with the Fire! They will say: "Would that we were but sent back! Then would we not reject the signs of our Lord, but would be amongst those who believe!"

name: Nafs
subtopic2: is not play and transient delight
translation: Leave alone those who take their religion to be mere play and amusement, and are deceived by the life of this world. But proclaim (to them) this (truth): that every soul delivers itself to ruin by its own acts: it will find for itself no protector or intercessor except Allah: if it offered every ransom, (or reparation), none will be accepted: such is (the end of) those who deliver themselves to ruin by their own acts: they will have for drink (only) boiling water, and for punishment, one most grievous: for they persisted in rejecting Allah.

name: About Arrogance
translation: But those who reject Our signs and treat them with arrogance,- they are companions of the Fire, to dwell therein (for ever).

name: Jahannam / Hell
translation: For them there is Hell, as a couch (below) and folds and folds of covering above: such is Our requital of those who do wrong.

name: Jahannam / Hell
translation: If any do turn his back to them on such a day - unless it be in a stratagem of war, or to retreat to a troop (of his own)- he draws on himself the wrath of Allah, and his abode is Hell,- an evil refuge (indeed)!

name: Nafs
translation: On the Day when heat will be produced out of that (wealth) in the fire of Hell, and with it will be branded their foreheads, their flanks, and their backs, their flanks, and their backs.- "This is the (treasure) which ye buried for yourselves: taste ye, then, the (treasures) ye buried!"

name: Jahannam / Hell
translation: Know they not that for those who oppose Allah and His Messenger, is the Fire of Hell?- wherein they shall dwell. That is the supreme disgrace.

name: Forgiveness
translation: It is not fitting, for the Prophet and those who believe, that they should pray for forgiveness for Pagans, even though they be of kin, after it is clear to them that they are companions of the Fire.
Their abode is the Fire, because of the (evil) they earned.

name: Vanity
translation: They are those for whom there is nothing in the Hereafter but the Fire: vain are the designs they frame therein, and of no effect and the deeds that they do!

name: Qiyamah
translation: He will go before his people on the Day of Judgment, and lead them into the Fire (as cattle are led to water): But woeful indeed will be the place to which they are led!
Those who are wretched shall be in the Fire: There will be for them therein (nothing but) the heaving of sighs and sobs:
And incline not to those who do wrong, or the Fire will seize you; and ye have no protectors other than Allah, nor shall ye be helped.

name: Jahannam / Hell
translation: For those who respond to their Lord, are (all) good things. But those who respond not to Him,- Even if they had all that is in the heavens and on earth, and as much more, (in vain) would they offer it for ransom. For them will the reckoning be terrible: their abode will be Hell,- what a bed of misery!

name: Jahannam / Hell
translation: And thou wilt see the sinners that day bound together in fetters;-

name: On Lying
subtopic2: attribute to Allah what they hate for themselves
translation: They attribute to Allah what they hate (for themselves), and their tongues assert the falsehood that all good things are for themselves: without doubt for them is the Fire, and they will be the first to be hastened on into it!

name: Jahannam / Hell
translation: (Allah) said: "Go thy way; if any of them follow thee, verily Hell will be the recompense of you (all)- an ample recompense.
And the Sinful shall see the fire and apprehend that they have to fall therein: no means will they find to turn away therefrom.

name: Jahannam / Hell
translation: And We shall present Hell that day for Unbelievers to see, all spread out,-

name: Shaitan / Satan
translation: So, by thy Lord, without doubt, We shall gather them together, and (also) the Evil Ones (with them); then shall We bring them forth on their knees round about Hell;
And certainly We know best those who are most worthy of being burned therein.

name: Jahannam / Hell
translation: And We shall drive the sinners to Hell, like thirsty cattle driven down to water,-

subtopic2: do not follow or obey or worship
translation: About the (Evil One) it is decreed that whoever turns to him for friendship, him will he lead astray, and he will guide him to the Penalty of the Fire.

name: Qiyamah
translation: (Disdainfully) bending his side, in order to lead (men) astray from the Path of Allah: for him there is disgrace in this life, and on the Day of Judgment We shall make him taste the Penalty of burning (Fire).
But those who strive against Our Signs, to frustrate them,- they will be Companions of the Fire.

name: About Disbelievers
translation: When Our Clear Signs are rehearsed to them, thou wilt notice a denial on the faces of the Unbelievers! they nearly attack with violence those who rehearse Our Signs to them. Say, "Shall I tell you of something (far) worse than these Signs? It is the Fire (of Hell)! Allah has promised it to the Unbelievers! and evil is that destination!"

name: Qiyamah
translation: And when they are cast, bound together into a constricted place therein, they will plead for destruction there and then!

name: Jahannam / Hell
translation: Those who will be gathered to Hell (prone) on their faces,- they will be in an evil plight, and, as to Path, most astray.
And to those straying in Evil, the Fire will be placed in full view;
Then they will be thrown headlong into the (Fire),- they and those straying in Evil,
And if any do evil, their faces will be thrown headlong into the Fire: "Do ye receive a reward other than that which ye have earned by your deeds?"

name: Qiyamah
translation: And we made them (but) leaders inviting to the Fire; and on the Day of Judgment no help shall they find.

name: Jahannam / Hell
translation: And who does more wrong than he who invents a lie against Allah or rejects the Truth when it reaches him? Is there not a home in Hell for those who reject Faith?

name: Cursing
translation: Verily Allah has cursed the Unbelievers and prepared for them a Blazing Fire,-
The Day that their faces will be turned upside down in the Fire, they will say: "Woe to us! Would that we had obeyed Allah and obeyed the Messenger!"
So on that Day no power shall they have over each other, for profit or harm: and We shall say to the wrong-doers, "Taste ye the Penalty of the Fire,- the which ye were wont to deny!"

name: Shaitan / Satan
translation: Verily Satan is an enemy to you: so treat him as an enemy. He only invites his adherents, that they may become Companions of the Blazing Fire.
Except such as are (themselves) going to the blazing Fire!

name: Inheritance
translation: When some trouble toucheth man, he crieth unto his Lord, turning to Him in repentance: but when He bestoweth a favour upon him as from Himself, (man) doth forget what he cried and prayed for before, and he doth set up rivals unto Allah, thus misleading others from Allah's Path. Say, "Enjoy thy blasphemy for a little while: verily thou art (one) of the Companions of the Fire!"
Is, then, one against whom the decree of Punishment is justly due (equal to one who eschews Evil)? Wouldst thou, then, deliver one (who is) in the Fire?

name: Truth and Honesty
translation: Who, then, doth more wrong than one who utters a lie concerning Allah, and rejects the Truth when it comes to him; is there not in Hell an abode for blasphemers?

name: About Disbelievers
subtopic2: fuel for the Fire (Companions of the Fire)
translation: Thus was the Decree of thy Lord proved true against the Unbelievers; that truly they are Companions of the Fire!

name: Qiyamah
translation: In front of the Fire will they be brought, morning and evening: And (the sentence will be) on the Day that Judgment will be established: "Cast ye the People of Pharaoh into the severest Penalty!"

name: About Arrogance
translation: Behold, they will dispute with each other in the Fire! The weak ones (who followed) will say to those who had been arrogant, "We but followed you: Can ye then take (on yourselves) from us some share of the Fire?

name: Jahannam / Hell
translation: Those in the Fire will say to the Keepers of Hell: "Pray to your Lord to lighten us the Penalty for a day (at least)!"
On the Day that the enemies of Allah will be gathered together to the Fire, they will be marched in ranks.

name: Patience
translation: If, then, they have patience, the Fire will be a home for them! and if they beg to be received into favour, into favour will they not (then) be received.
It will also be said: "This Day We will forget you as ye forgot the meeting of this Day of yours! and your abode is the Fire, and no helpers have ye!

name: Inheritance
translation: And on the Day that the Unbelievers will be placed before the Fire, (It will be said to them): "Ye received your good things in the life of the world, and ye took your pleasure out of them: but today shall ye be recompensed with a Penalty of humiliation: for that ye were arrogant on earth without just cause, and that ye (ever) transgressed."

name: About Disbelievers
translation: And on the Day that the Unbelievers will be placed before the Fire, (they will be asked,) "Is this not the Truth?" they will say, "Yea, by our Lord!" (One will say:) "Then taste ye the Penalty, for that ye were wont to deny (Truth)!"

name: About Disbelievers
translation: And if any believe not in Allah and His Messenger, We have prepared, for those who reject Allah, a Blazing Fire!

name: Jahannam / Hell
translation: That Day shall they be thrust down to the Fire of Hell, irresistibly.
This:, it will be said, Is the Fire,- which ye were wont to deny!
Is this then a fake, or is it ye that do not see?

name: Patience
translation: Burn ye therein: the same is it to you whether ye bear it with patience, or not: Ye but receive the recompense of your (own) deeds.
Of no profit whatever to them, against Allah, will be their riches nor their sons: they will be Companions of the Fire, to dwell therein (for aye)!

name: Prophet Nuh (as)
translation: Allah sets forth, for an example to the Unbelievers, the wife of Noah and the wife of Lut: they were (respectively) under two of our righteous servants, but they were false to their (husbands), and they profited nothing before Allah on their account, but were told: "Enter ye the Fire along with (others) that enter!"

name: Jahannam / Hell
translation: For those who reject their Lord (and Cherisher) is the Penalty of Hell: and evil is (such), Destination.
They will say: "Yes indeed; a Warner did come to us, but we rejected him and said, 'Allah never sent down any (Message): ye are nothing but an egregious delusion!'"

subtopic2: fuel for the Fire (Companions of the Fire)
translation: They will further say: "Had we but listened or used our intelligence, we should not (now) be among the Companions of the Blazing Fire!"
Because of their sins they were drowned (in the flood), and were made to enter the Fire (of Punishment): and they found- in lieu of Allah- none to help them.

name: Jahannam / Hell
subtopic2: fuel for the Fire (Companions of the Fire)
translation: But those who swerve,- they are (but) fuel for Hell-fire'-
And he will enter a Blazing Fire.

name: Jahannam / Hell
translation: Those who persecute (or draw into temptation) the Believers, men and women, and do not turn in repentance, will have the Penalty of Hell: They will have the Penalty of the Burning Fire.

name: Jahannam / Hell
translation: Those who reject (Truth), among the People of the Book and among the Polytheists, will be in Hell-Fire, to dwell therein (for aye). They are the worst of creatures.

name: Truth and Honesty
translation: Say: "If the last Home, with Allah, be for you specially, and not for anyone else, then seek ye for death, if ye are sincere."

name: Remembrance of Allah (swt)
translation: So when ye have accomplished your holy rites, celebrate the praises of Allah, as ye used to celebrate the praises of your fathers,- yea, with far more Heart and soul. There are men who say: "Our Lord! Give us (Thy bounties) in this world!" but they will have no portion in the Hereafter.

name: Prophet Jesus (as)
translation: If anyone desires a religion other than Islam (submission to Allah), never will it be accepted of him; and in the Hereafter He will be in the ranks of those who have lost (All spiritual good).

name: Zulm
translation: Say: "O my people! Do whatever ye can: I will do (my part): soon will ye know who it is whose end will be (best) in the Hereafter: certain it is that the wrong-doers will not prosper."

name: Dunya
translation: As in the case of those before you: they were mightier than you in power, and more flourishing in wealth and children. They had their enjoyment of their portion: and ye have of yours, as did those before you; and ye indulge in idle talk as they did. They!- their work are fruitless in this world and in the Hereafter, and they will lose (all spiritual good).

name: Taqwa
translation: But verily the reward of the Hereafter is the best, for those who believe, and are constant in righteousness.

name: Dunya
translation: For them is a penalty in the life of this world, but harder, truly, is the penalty of the Hereafter: and defender have they none against Allah.

name: Dunya
translation: This because they love the life of this world better than the Hereafter: and Allah will not guide those who reject Faith.
But those who were blind in this world, will be blind in the hereafter, and most astray from the Path.

name: Trials of Life
translation: There are among men some who serve Allah, as it were, on the verge: if good befalls them, they are, therewith, well content; but if a trial comes to them, they turn on their faces: they lose both this world and the Hereafter: that is loss for all to see!

name: Dunya
translation: Those who slander chaste women, indiscreet but believing, are cursed in this life and in the Hereafter: for them is a grievous Penalty,-

name: On Knowledge
translation: Still less can their knowledge comprehend the Hereafter: Nay, they are in doubt and uncertainty thereanent; nay, they are blind thereunto!

name: Dunya
translation: So Allah gave them a taste of humiliation in the present life, but greater is the punishment of the Hereafter, if they only knew!

name: Qiyamah
translation: And leave alone the Hereafter.
And who believe in the Revelation sent to thee, and sent before thy time, and (in their hearts) have the assurance of the Hereafter.

name: On The Prayer
translation: And this is a Book which We have sent down, bringing blessings, and confirming (the revelations) which came before it: that thou mayest warn the mother of cities and all around her. Those who believe in the Hereafter believe in this (Book), and they are constant in guarding their prayers.
To such (deceit) let the hearts of those incline, who have no faith in the hereafter: let them delight in it, and let them earn from it what they may.

name: About Disbelievers
translation: Those who would hinder (men) from the path of Allah and would seek in it something crooked: they were those who denied the Hereafter.

name: About Disbelievers
translation: Those who would hinder (men) from the path of Allah and would seek in it something crooked: these were they who denied the Hereafter!
Those who do wish for the (things of) the Hereafter, and strive therefor with all due striving, and have Faith,- they are the ones whose striving is acceptable (to Allah).

name: Dunya
translation: These are the people who buy the life of this world at the price of the Hereafter: their penalty shall not be lightened nor shall they be helped.

name: Taqwa
translation: What is the life of this world but play and amusement? But best is the home in the hereafter, for those who are righteous. Will ye not then understand?

name: Dunya
translation: Wealth and sons are allurements of the life of this world: But the things that endure, good deeds, are best in the sight of thy Lord, as rewards, and best as (the foundation for) hopes.

name: Trials of Life
translation: Nor strain thine eyes in longing for the things We have given for enjoyment to parties of them, the splendour of the life of this world, through which We test them: but the provision of thy Lord is better and more enduring.

name: Taqwa
translation: But those who had been granted (true) knowledge said: "Alas for you! The reward of Allah (in the Hereafter) is best for those who believe and work righteousness: but this none shall attain, save those who steadfastly persevere (in good)."

name: Dunya
translation: What is the life of this world but amusement and play? but verily the Home in the Hereafter,- that is life indeed, if they but knew.

name: Dunya
translation: To any that desires the tilth of the Hereafter, We give increase in his tilth, and to any that desires the tilth of this world, We grant somewhat thereof, but he has no share or lot in the Hereafter.
But the Hereafter is better and more enduring.
And verily the Hereafter will be better for thee than the present.

name: Karma
subtopic2: Travel through the earth and see
translation: Many were the Ways of Life that have passed away before you: travel through the earth, and see what was the end of those who rejected Truth.

name: Guidance
translation: There is, in their stories, instruction for men endued with understanding. It is not a tale invented, but a confirmation of what went before it,- a detailed exposition of all things, and a guide and a mercy to any such as believe.

name: Prophet Musa (as)
translation: We sent Moses with Our signs (and the command). "Bring out thy people from the depths of darkness into light, and teach them to remember the Days of Allah." Verily in this there are Signs for such as are firmly patient and constant,- grateful and appreciative.

name: Nafs
translation: Remember ye slew a man and fell into a dispute among yourselves as to the crime: But Allah was to bring forth what ye did hide.

name: Sodomy
translation: For ye practise your lusts on men in preference to women: ye are indeed a people transgressing beyond bounds.

name: Taqwa
translation: And his people came rushing towards him, and they had been long in the habit of practising abominations. He said: "O my people! Here are my daughters: they are purer for you (if ye marry)! Now fear Allah, and cover me not with shame about my guests! Is there not among you a single right-minded man?"
They said: "Well dost thou know we have no need of thy daughters: indeed thou knowest quite well what we want!"
The inhabitants of the city came in (mad) joy (at news of the young men).

name: On The Universe
translation: Of all the creatures in the world, will ye approach males,
And leave those whom Allah has created for you to be your mates? Nay, ye are a people transgressing (all limits)!

name: Sodomy
translation: (We also sent) Lut (as a messenger): behold, He said to his people, "Do ye do what is shameful though ye see (its iniquity)?

name: On Women
translation: Would ye really approach men in your lusts rather than women? Nay, ye are a people (grossly) ignorant!

name: Sodomy
translation: And (remember) Lut: behold, he said to his people: "Ye do commit lewdness, such as no people in Creation (ever) committed before you.

name: Truth and Honesty
translation: Do ye indeed approach men, and cut off the highway?- and practise wickedness (even) in your councils? But his people gave no answer but this: they said: "Bring us the Wrath of Allah if thou tellest the truth."

name: On Animals
translation: Behold, there were brought before him, at eventide coursers of the highest breeding, and swift of foot;

name: Remembrance of Allah (swt)
translation: And he said, "Truly do I love the love of good, with a view to the glory of my Lord,"- until (the sun) was hidden in the veil (of night):
Bring them back to me. then began he to pass his hand over (their) legs and their necks.

name: On Animals
translation: By the (Steeds) that run, with panting (breath),
And strike sparks of fire,
And push home the charge in the morning,
And penetrate forthwith into the midst (of the foe) en masse;-

name: Provision
translation: It is no fault on your part to enter houses not used for living in, which serve some (other) use for you: And Allah has knowledge of what ye reveal and what ye conceal.

name: Jinn
translation: O ye assembly of Jinns and men! If it be ye can pass beyond the zones of the heavens and the earth, pass ye! not without authority shall ye be able to pass!

name: Taqwa
translation: And its enlightenment as to its wrong and its right;-

name: About Difficulties
translation: Truly man was created very impatient;-

name: Beauty of Nature
subtopic2: created in the best of moulds
translation: We have indeed created man in the best of moulds,
By (the mystery of) the creation of male and female;-

name: Taqwa
translation: O mankind! reverence your Guardian-Lord, who created you from a single person, created, of like nature, His mate, and from them twain scattered (like seeds) countless men and women;- reverence Allah, through whom ye demand your mutual (rights), and (reverence) the wombs (That bore you): for Allah ever watches over you.

name: Human Body
translation: Created man, out of a (mere) clot of congealed blood:

name: Human Body
translation: He has created man from a sperm-drop; and behold this same (man) becomes an open disputer!

name: Pregnancy
translation: Then We placed him as (a drop of) sperm in a place of rest, firmly fixed;

name: Qur'an on Love
translation: Doth not man see that it is We Who created him from sperm? yet behold! he (stands forth) as an open adversary!

name: Adversity
translation: Verily We created Man from a drop of mingled sperm, in order to try him: So We gave him (the gifts), of Hearing and Sight.
From a sperm-drop: He hath created him, and then mouldeth him in due proportions;

name: Shaitan / Satan
translation: (Allah) said: "What prevented thee from prostrating when I commanded thee?" He said: "I am better than he: Thou didst create me from fire, and him from clay."

name: Pregnancy
translation: Man We did create from a quintessence (of clay);

name: Creation
translation: He Who has made everything which He has created most good: He began the creation of man with (nothing more than) clay,
(Iblis) said: "I am better than he: thou createdst me from fire, and him thou createdst from clay."

name: Human Body
translation: He created man from sounding clay like unto pottery,

name: Creation
translation: Just ask their opinion: are they the more difficult to create, or the (other) beings We have created? Them have We created out of a sticky clay!

name: Creation
translation: Among His Signs in this, that He created you from dust; and then,- behold, ye are men scattered (far and wide)!
He is created from a drop emitted-
And if it had been Our Will, We could have transformed them (to remain) in their places; then should they have been unable to move about, nor could they have returned (after error).
And Allah has produced you from the earth growing (gradually),

name: Nikkah
translation: And among His Signs is this, that He created for you mates from among yourselves, that ye may dwell in tranquillity with them, and He has put love and mercy between your (hearts): verily in that are Signs for those who reflect.

name: On Animals
subtopic2: vilest are those who don`t use reason
translation: For the worst of beasts in the sight of Allah are the deaf and the dumb,- those who understand not.

name: About Disbelievers
subtopic2: vilest are those who don`t use reason
translation: For the worst of beasts in the sight of Allah are those who reject Him: They will not believe.
Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?-
In them will be fair (Companions), good, beautiful;-
Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?-
Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?-
And He has set up on the earth mountains standing firm, lest it should shake with you; and rivers and roads; that ye may guide yourselves;
Of the people there are some who say: "We believe in Allah and the Last Day;" but they do not (really) believe.

name: Nafs
translation: Fain would they deceive Allah and those who believe, but they only deceive themselves, and realise (it) not!

name: Corruption
translation: When it is said to them: "Make not mischief on the earth," they say: "Why, we only Want to make peace!"

name: Corruption
translation: Of a surety, they are the ones who make mischief, but they realise (it) not.
When it is said to them: "Believe as the others believe:" They say: "Shall we believe as the fools believe?" Nay, of a surety they are the fools, but they do not know.

name: Shaitan / Satan
translation: When they meet those who believe, they say: "We believe;" but when they are alone with their evil ones, they say: "We are really with you: We (were) only jesting."
Allah will throw back their mockery on them, and give them rope in their trespasses; so they will wander like blind ones (To and fro).

name: Guidance
translation: These are they who have bartered Guidance for error: But their traffic is profitless, and they have lost true direction,

name: Eid
translation: Deaf, dumb, and blind, they will not return (to the path).

The lightning all but snatches away their sight; every time the light (Helps) them, they walk therein, and when the darkness grows on them, they stand still. And if Allah willed, He could take away their faculty of hearing and seeing; for Allah hath power over all things.

name: Hypocrites
translation: When it is said to them: "Come to what Allah hath revealed, and to the Messenger": Thou seest the Hypocrites avert their faces from thee in disgust.

name: Swearing
translation: How then, when they are seized by misfortune, because of the deeds which they hands have sent forth? Then their come to thee, swearing by Allah: "We meant no more than good-will and conciliation!"

name: Nafs
translation: Those men,-Allah knows what is in their hearts; so keep clear of them, but admonish them, and speak to them a word to reach their very souls.

name: Taqwa
translation: To the Hypocrites give the glad tidings that there is for them (but) a grievous penalty;-

name: Remembrance of Allah (swt)
translation: The Hypocrites - they think they are over-reaching Allah, but He will over-reach them: When they stand up to prayer, they stand without earnestness, to be seen of men, but little do they hold Allah in remembrance;
(They are) distracted in mind even in the midst of it,- being (sincerely) for neither one group nor for another whom Allah leaves straying,- never wilt thou find for him the way.

name: Hypocrites
translation: The Hypocrites will be in the lowest depths of the Fire: no helper wilt thou find for them;-

name: Forgiveness
translation: Whether thou ask for their forgiveness, or not, (their sin is unforgivable): if thou ask seventy times for their forgiveness, Allah will not forgive them: because they have rejected Allah and His Messenger: and Allah guideth not those who are perversely rebellious.
They say, "We believe in Allah and in the messenger, and we obey": but even after that, some of them turn away: they are not (really) Believers.

name: Disobedience
translation: When they are summoned to Allah and His messenger, in order that He may judge between them, behold some of them decline (to come).
But if the right is on their side, they come to him with all submission.

name: Hypocrites
translation: And Allah most certainly knows those who believe, and as certainly those who are Hypocrites.

name: Taqwa
translation: O Prophet! Fear Allah, and hearken not to the Unbelievers and the Hypocrites: verily Allah is full of Knowledge and Wisdom.

name: Cursing
subtopic2: hypocrites will be slain in Medina during the "War of the Confederates"
translation: They shall have a curse on them: whenever they are found, they shall be seized and slain (without mercy).

name: On Knowledge
translation: And among them are men who listen to thee, but in the end, when they go out from thee, they say to those who have received Knowledge, "What is it he said just then?" Such are men whose hearts Allah has sealed, and who follow their own lusts.

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
translation: Behold, We turned towards thee a company of Jinns (quietly) listening to the Qur'an: when they stood in the presence thereof, they said, "Listen in silence!" When the (reading) was finished, they returned to their people, to warn (them of their sins).

name: Prophet Musa (as)
translation: They said, "O our people! We have heard a Book revealed after Moses, confirming what came before it: it guides (men) to the Truth and to a Straight Path.

name: Hypocrites
translation: One Day will the Hypocrites- men and women - say to the Believers: "Wait for us! Let us borrow (a Light) from your Light!" It will be said: "Turn ye back to your rear! then seek a Light (where ye can)!" So a wall will be put up betwixt them, with a gate therein. Within it will be Mercy throughout, and without it, all alongside, will be (Wrath and) Punishment!
Allah has prepared for them a severe Penalty: evil indeed are their deeds.

name: Swearing
translation: They have made their oaths a screen (for their misdeeds): thus they obstruct (men) from the Path of Allah: therefore shall they have a humiliating Penalty.

name: Swearing
translation: One day will Allah raise them all up (for Judgment): then will they swear to Him as they swear to you: And they think that they have something (to stand upon). No, indeed! they are but liars!

name: Remembrance of Allah (swt)
translation: The Evil One has got the better of them: so he has made them lose the remembrance of Allah. They are the Party of the Evil One. Truly, it is the Party of the Evil One that will perish!

name: Hypocrites
translation: Hast thou not observed the Hypocrites say to their misbelieving brethren among the People of the Book? - "If ye are expelled, we too will go out with you, and we will never hearken to any one in your affair; and if ye are attacked (in fight) we will help you". But Allah is witness that they are indeed liars.

name: Generosity
translation: If they are expelled, never will they go out with them; and if they are attacked (in fight), they will never help them; and if they do help them, they will turn their backs; so they will receive no help.
Of a truth ye are stronger (than they) because of the terror in their hearts, (sent) by Allah. This is because they are men devoid of understanding.

They will not fight you (even) together, except in fortified townships, or from behind walls. Strong is their fighting (spirit) amongst themselves: thou wouldst think they were united, but their hearts are divided: that is because they are a people devoid of wisdom.

name: Hypocrites
translation: When the Hypocrites come to thee, they say, "We bear witness that thou art indeed the Messenger of Allah." Yea, Allah knoweth that thou art indeed His Messenger, and Allah beareth witness that the Hypocrites are indeed liars.

name: Swearing
translation: They have made their oaths a screen (for their misdeeds): thus they obstruct (men) from the Path of Allah: truly evil are their deeds.

name: Qur'an on Love
translation: That is because they believed, then they rejected Faith: So a seal was set on their hearts: therefore they understand not.

name: About Arrogance
translation: And when it is said to them, "Come, the Messenger of Allah will pray for your forgiveness", they turn aside their heads, and thou wouldst see them turning away their faces in arrogance.

name: Forgiveness
translation: It is equal to them whether thou pray for their forgiveness or not. Allah will not forgive them. Truly Allah guides not rebellious transgressors.

name: Shaitan / Satan
translation: Hast thou not turned Thy vision to those who declare that they believe in the revelations that have come to thee and to those before thee? Their (real) wish is to resort together for judgment (in their disputes) to the Evil One, though they were ordered to reject him. But Satan's wish is to lead them astray far away (from the right).

name: Shaitan / Satan
translation: Satan makes them promises, and creates in them false desires; but satan's promises are nothing but deception.

name: Shaitan / Satan
translation: When the suffering reached them from us, why then did they not learn humility? On the contrary their hearts became hardened, and Satan made their (sinful) acts seem alluring to them.
And he swore to them both, that he was their sincere adviser.

name: Shaitan / Satan
translation: Said (the father): "My (dear) little son! relate not thy vision to thy brothers, lest they concoct a plot against thee: for Satan is to man an avowed enemy!

name: Shaitan / Satan
translation: And of the two, to that one whom he consider about to be saved, he said: "Mention me to thy lord." But Satan made him forget to mention him to his lord: and (Joseph) lingered in prison a few (more) years.
Not so Iblis: he refused to be among those who prostrated themselves.
(Allah) said: "O Iblis! what is your reason for not being among those who prostrated themselves?"
(Allah) said: "Then get thee out from here; for thou art rejected, accursed.

name: Cursing
translation: And the curse shall be on thee till the day of Judgment.

name: Qiyamah
translation: (Iblis) said: "O my Lord! give me then respite till the Day the (dead) are raised."

name: Qiyamah
translation: (Allah) said: "Respite is granted thee

name: Qiyamah
translation: Till the Day of the Time appointed.
(Iblis) said: "O my Lord! because Thou hast put me in the wrong, I will make (wrong) fair-seeming to them on the earth, and I will put them all in the wrong,-

name: Shaitan / Satan
translation: Except Thy servants among them, sincere and purified (by Thy Grace).

name: Shaitan / Satan
translation: He replied: "Sawest thou (what happened) when we betook ourselves to the rock? I did indeed forget (about) the Fish: none but Satan made me forget to tell (you) about it: it took its course through the sea in a marvellous way!"

name: Shaitan / Satan
translation: He did lead me astray from the Message (of Allah) after it had come to me! Ah! the Evil One is but a traitor to man!
And the whole hosts of Iblis together.

name: Shaitan / Satan
translation: And he entered the city at a time when its people were not watching: and he found there two men fighting,- one of his own religion, and the other, of his foes. Now the man of his own religion appealed to him against his foe, and Moses struck him with his fist and made an end of him. He said: "This is a work of Evil (Satan): for he is an enemy that manifestly misleads!"

name: Truth and Honesty
translation: And on them did Satan prove true his idea, and they followed him, all but a party that believed.

name: Taqwa
subtopic2: do not follow or obey or worship
translation: Did I not enjoin on you, O ye Children of Adam, that ye should not worship Satan; for that he was to you an enemy avowed?-

name: Shaitan / Satan
translation: Commemorate Our Servant Job. Behold he cried to his Lord: "The Evil One has afflicted me with distress and suffering!"

name: Shaitan / Satan
translation: Not so Iblis: he was haughty, and became one of those who reject Faith.

name: About Arrogance
translation: (Allah) said: "O Iblis! What prevents thee from prostrating thyself to one whom I have created with my hands? Art thou haughty? Or art thou one of the high (and mighty) ones?"

name: Qiyamah
translation: (Allah) said: "Then get thee out from here: for thou art rejected, accursed.

name: Qiyamah
translation: (Iblis) said: "O my Lord! Give me then respite till the Day the (dead) are raised."

name: Qiyamah
translation: (Allah) said: "Respite then is granted thee-

name: Qiyamah
translation: Till the Day of the Time Appointed.

name: Shaitan / Satan
translation: (Iblis) said: "Then, by Thy power, I will put them all in the wrong,-
Except Thy Servants amongst them, sincere and purified (by Thy Grace).
(Allah) said: "Then it is just and fitting- and I say what is just and fitting-

name: Shaitan / Satan
translation: Let not the Evil One hinder you: for he is to you an enemy avowed.
And all abomination shun!
And We raised him to a lofty station.

name: On Justice
translation: Do they then seek after a judgment of (the days of) ignorance? But who, for a people whose faith is assured, can give better judgment than Allah?

name: Listening to Qur'an
translation: Nay, verily the record of the Righteous is (preserved) in 'Illiyin.
And what will explain to thee what 'Illiyun is?
(There is) a Register (fully) inscribed,

name: Zina
subtopic2: four witnesses required in order to "convict"
translation: If any of your women are guilty of lewdness, Take the evidence of four (Reliable) witnesses from amongst you against them; and if they testify, confine them to houses until death do claim them, or Allah ordain for them some (other) way.

name: About Disbelievers
translation: Of no effect is the repentance of those who continue to do evil, until death faces one of them, and he says, "Now have I repented indeed;" nor of those who die rejecting Faith: for them have We prepared a punishment most grievous.
And there are among them illiterates, who know not the Book, but (see therein their own) desires, and they do nothing but conjecture.

name: Wife
translation: Behold! a woman of 'Imran said: "O my Lord! I do dedicate unto Thee what is in my womb for Thy special service: So accept this of me: For Thou hearest and knowest all things."

name: Remembrance of Allah (swt)
translation: Nor say of anything, "I shall be sure to do so and so tomorrow"-

name: Women's Rights
translation: From what is left by parents and those nearest related there is a share for men and a share for women, whether the property be small or large,-a determinate share.

name: Rizq
translation: But if at the time of division other relatives, or orphans or poor, are present, feed them out of the (property), and speak to them words of kindness and justice.

name: Taqwa
translation: Let those (disposing of an estate) have the same fear in their minds as they would have for their own if they had left a helpless family behind: Let them fear Allah, and speak words of appropriate (comfort).

name: Inheritance
translation: And ye devour inheritance - all with greed,

name: Inheritance
translation: To those who inherit the earth in succession to its (previous) possessors, is it not a guiding, (lesson) that, if We so willed, We could punish them (too) for their sins, and seal up their hearts so that they could not hear?

name: Hurting Others
translation: They said: "We have had (nothing but) trouble, both before and after thou camest to us." He said: "It may be that your Lord will destroy your enemy and make you inheritors in the earth; that so He may try you by your deeds."

name: Inheritance
subtopic2: according to best of deeds and more
translation: Before this We wrote in the Psalms, after the Message (given to Moses): My servants the righteous, shall inherit the earth."

name: Business
translation: He it is That has made you inheritors in the earth: if, then, any do reject (Allah), their rejection (works) against themselves: their rejection but adds to the odium for the Unbelievers in the sight of their Lord: their rejection but adds to (their own) undoing.

name: Inheritance
translation: Thus (was their end)! And We made other people inherit (those things)!

name: Qiyamah
translation: O ye who believe! Spend out of (the bounties) We have provided for you, before the Day comes when no bargaining (Will avail), nor friendship nor intercession. Those who reject Faith they are the wrong-doers.

name: Taqwa
translation: Give this warning to those in whose (hearts) is the fear that they will be brought (to judgment) before their Lord: except for Him they will have no protector nor intercessor: that they may guard (against evil).

And behold! ye come to us bare and alone as We created you for the first time: ye have left behind you all (the favours) which We bestowed on you: We see not with you your intercessors whom ye thought to be partners in your affairs: so now all relations between you have been cut off, and your (pet) fancies have left you in the lurch!
Now, then, we have none to intercede (for us),

name: Qiyamah
translation: No intercessor will they have among their "Partners" and they will (themselves) reject their "Partners".
What! Do they take for intercessors others besides Allah? Say: "Even if they have no power whatever and no intelligence?"
And those whom they invoke besides Allah have no power of intercession;- only he who bears witness to the Truth, and they know (him).

name: Prophet Isaac (as)
translation: And We bestowed on him Isaac and, as an additional gift, (a grandson), Jacob, and We made righteous men of every one (of them).

name: Prophet Isaac (as)
translation: And We gave him the good news of Isaac - a prophet,- one of the Righteous.

name: Prophet Isaac (as)
translation: We blessed him and Isaac: but of their progeny are (some) that do right, and (some) that obviously do wrong, to their own souls.
And We left (this blessing) for him among generations (to come) in later times:

name: Prophet Ibrahim (as)
translation: Peace and salutation to Abraham!

name: Dawah
translation: So if they dispute with thee, say: "I have submitted My whole self to Allah and so have those who follow me." And say to the People of the Book and to those who are unlearned: "Do ye (also) submit yourselves?" If they do, they are in right guidance, but if they turn back, Thy duty is to convey the Message; and in Allah's sight are (all) His servants.
And further (thus): 'set thy face towards religion with true piety, and never in any wise be of the Unbelievers;
Nor canst thou be a guide to the blind, (to prevent them) from straying: only those wilt thou get to listen who believe in Our Signs, and they will bow in Islam.
And I am commanded to be the first of those who bow to Allah in Islam.
Turn ye to our Lord (in repentance) and bow to His (Will), before the Penalty comes on you: after that ye shall not be helped.

name: Dawah
translation: Who is better in speech than one who calls (men) to Allah, works righteousness, and says, "I am of those who bow in Islam"?
To you be your Way, and to me mine.

name: Shaitan / Satan
subtopic2: do not follow or obey or worship
translation: O ye who believe! Enter into Islam whole-heartedly; and follow not the footsteps of the evil one; for he is to you an avowed enemy.

name: On Lying
translation: Who doth greater wrong than one who invents falsehood against Allah, even as he is being invited to Islam? And Allah guides not those who do wrong.
And thou dost see the people enter Allah's Religion in crowds,

name: Guidance
translation: It is He Who hath sent His Messenger with guidance and the Religion of Truth, to proclaim it over all religion, even though the Pagans may detest (it).

name: Guidance
subtopic2: sent by allah with Guidance and the Religion of Truth
translation: It is He Who has sent His Messenger with Guidance and the Religion of Truth, that he may proclaim it over all religion, even though the Pagans may detest (it).

name: Qiyamah
translation: But set thou thy face to the right Religion before there come from Allah the Day which there is no chance of averting: on that Day shall men be divided (in two).

subtopic2: on the right way of Religion
translation: Then We put thee on the (right) Way of Religion: so follow thou that (Way), and follow not the desires of those who know not.

name: About Disbelievers
translation: Again and again will those who disbelieve, wish that they had bowed (to Allah's will) in Islam.

name: Truth and Honesty
translation: Also mention in the Book (the story of) Isma'il: He was (strictly) true to what he promised, and he was a messenger (and) a prophet.

name: Prophet Yaqub (as)
translation: (One that) will (truly) represent me, and represent the posterity of Jacob; and make him, O my Lord! one with whom Thou art well-pleased!

name: Obedience To Parents
translation: They said: "Truly Joseph and his brother are loved more by our father than we: But we are a goodly body! really our father is obviously wandering (in his mind)!

name: Obedience To Parents
translation: They said: "O our father! why dost thou not trust us with Joseph,- seeing we are indeed his sincere well-wishers?

name: Grief
translation: (Jacob) said: "Really it saddens me that ye should take him away: I fear lest the wolf should devour him while ye attend not to him."

name: Obedience To Parents
translation: Then they came to their father in the early part of the night, weeping.

name: Truth and Honesty
translation: They said: "O our father! We went racing with one another, and left Joseph with our things; and the wolf devoured him.... But thou wilt never believe us even though we tell the truth."

name: Obedience To Parents
translation: Now when they returned to their father, they said: "O our father! No more measure of grain shall we get (unless we take our brother): So send our brother with us, that we may get our measure; and we will indeed take every care of him."

(Jacob) said: "Never will I send him with you until ye swear a solemn oath to me, in Allah's name, that ye will be sure to bring him back to me unless ye are yourselves hemmed in (and made powerless). And when they had sworn their solemn oath, he said: "Over all that we say, be Allah the witness and guardian!"

name: Prophet Yaqub (as)
translation: And when they entered in the manner their father had enjoined, it did not profit them in the least against (the plan of) Allah: It was but a necessity of Jacob's soul, which he discharged. For he was, by our instruction, full of knowledge (and experience): but most men know not.

name: Grief
translation: And he turned away from them, and said: "How great is my grief for Joseph!" And his eyes became white with sorrow, and he fell into silent melancholy.
They said: "By Allah! (never) wilt thou cease to remember Joseph until thou reach the last extremity of illness, or until thou die!"

name: Grief
translation: He said: "I only complain of my distraction and anguish to Allah, and I know from Allah that which ye know not...

name: Obedience To Parents
translation: Go with this my shirt, and cast it over the face of my father: he will come to see (clearly). Then come ye (here) to me together with all your family.

name: Obedience To Parents
translation: When the caravan left (Egypt), their father said: "I do indeed scent the presence of Joseph: Nay, think me not a dotard."
They said: "By Allah! truly thou art in thine old wandering mind."
Then when the bearer of the good news came, He cast (the shirt) over his face, and he forthwith regained clear sight. He said: "Did I not say to you, 'I know from Allah that which ye know not?'"

name: Forgiveness
translation: They said: "O our father! ask for us forgiveness for our sins, for we were truly at fault."

name: Obedience To Parents
translation: Then when they entered the presence of Joseph, he provided a home for his parents with himself, and said: "Enter ye Egypt (all) in safety if it please Allah."

name: Obedience To Parents
translation: And We made the son of Mary and his mother as a Sign: We gave them both shelter on high ground, affording rest and security and furnished with springs.

name: Prophet Jesus (as)
translation: When (Jesus) the son of Mary is held up as an example, behold, thy people raise a clamour thereat (in ridicule)!

name: Prophet Jesus (as)
translation: And they say, "Are our gods best, or he?" This they set forth to thee, only by way of disputation: yea, they are a contentious people.

name: Prophet Jesus (as)
translation: He was no more than a servant: We granted Our favour to him, and We made him an example to the Children of Israel.

name: Nafs
translation: We gave Moses the Book and followed him up with a succession of messengers; We gave Jesus the son of Mary Clear (Signs) and strengthened him with the holy spirit. Is it that whenever there comes to you a messenger with what ye yourselves desire not, ye are puffed up with pride?- Some ye called impostors, and others ye slay!
He shall speak to the people in childhood and in maturity. And he shall be (of the company) of the righteous.
Relate in the Book (the story of) Mary, when she withdrew from her family to a place in the East.
He said: "Nay, I am only a messenger from thy Lord, (to announce) to thee the gift of a holy son.
She said: "How shall I have a son, seeing that no man has touched me, and I am not unchaste?"

name: Pregnancy
translation: He said: "So (it will be): Thy Lord saith, 'that is easy for Me: and (We wish) to appoint him as a Sign unto men and a Mercy from Us': It is a matter (so) decreed."

name: Qiyamah
translation: And there is none of the People of the Book but must believe in him before his death; and on the Day of Judgment he will be a witness against them;-
Our Lord! we believe in what Thou hast revealed, and we follow the Messenger; then write us down among those who bear witness.
He said: "I am indeed a servant of Allah: He hath given me revelation and made me a prophet;

name: On The Universe
translation: Allah said: "I will send it down unto you: But if any of you after that resisteth faith, I will punish him with a penalty such as I have not inflicted on any one among all the peoples."

name: Qiyamah
translation: Behold! Allah said: "O Jesus! I will take thee and raise thee to Myself and clear thee (of the falsehoods) of those who blaspheme; I will make those who follow thee superior to those who reject faith, to the Day of Resurrection: Then shall ye all return unto me, and I will judge between you of the matters wherein ye dispute.

name: Prophet Jesus (as)
translation: For Allah, He is my Lord and your Lord: so worship ye Him: this is a Straight Way.

name: Respecting Others
translation: (He) hath made me kind to my mother, and not overbearing or miserable;

name: Peace
translation: So peace is on me the day I was born, the day that I die, and the day that I shall be raised up to life (again)!

name: On Knowledge
translation: That they said (in boast), "We killed Christ Jesus the son of Mary, the Messenger of Allah";- but they killed him not, nor crucified him, but so it was made to appear to them, and those who differ therein are full of doubts, with no (certain) knowledge, but only conjecture to follow, for of a surety they killed him not:-

name: On Wisdom
translation: When Jesus came with Clear Signs, he said: "Now have I come to you with Wisdom, and in order to make clear to you some of the (points) on which ye dispute: therefore fear Allah and obey me.

name: Nafs
translation: To the Jews We prohibited such things as We have mentioned to thee before: We did them no wrong, but they were used to doing wrong to themselves.

name: Cursing
translation: Say: "Shall I point out to you something much worse than this, (as judged) by the treatment it received from Allah? those who incurred the curse of Allah and His wrath, those of whom some He transformed into apes and swine, those who worshipped evil;- these are (many times) worse in rank, and far more astray from the even path!"

name: Disobedience
translation: Of the Jews there are those who displace words from their (right) places, and say: "We hear and we disobey"; and "Hear what is not Heard"; and "Ra'ina"; with a twist of their tongues and a slander to Faith. If only they had said: "What hear and we obey"; and "Do hear"; and "Do look at us"; it would have been better for them, and more proper; but Allah hath cursed them for their Unbelief; and but few of them will believe.

name: Cursing
translation: O ye People of the Book! believe in what We have (now) revealed, confirming what was (already) with you, before We change the face and fame of some (of you) beyond all recognition, and turn them hindwards, or curse them as We cursed the Sabbath-breakers, for the decision of Allah Must be carried out.

Thou wilt indeed find them, of all people, most greedy of life,-even more than the idolaters: Each one of them wishes He could be given a life of a thousand years: But the grant of such life will not save him from (due) punishment. For Allah sees well all that they do.

name: Verses on Killing
translation: When it is said to them, "Believe in what Allah Hath sent down, "they say, "We believe in what was sent down to us:" yet they reject all besides, even if it be Truth confirming what is with them. Say: "Why then have ye slain the prophets of Allah in times gone by, if ye did indeed believe?"

name: Riba (interest)
subtopic2: Jews took it even though forbidden to
translation: That they took usury, though they were forbidden; and that they devoured men's substance wrongfully;- we have prepared for those among them who reject faith a grievous punishment.

name: Trials of Life
translation: O Messenger! let not those grieve thee, who race each other into unbelief: (whether it be) among those who say "We believe" with their lips but whose hearts have no faith; or it be among the Jews,- men who will listen to any lie,- will listen even to others who have never so much as come to thee. They change the words from their (right) times and places: they say, "If ye are given this, take it, but if not, beware!" If any one's trial is intended by Allah, thou hast no authority in the least for him against Allah. For such - it is not Allah's will to purify their hearts. For them there is disgrace in this world, and in the Hereafter a heavy punishment.

name: On Lying
translation: (They are fond of) listening to falsehood, of devouring anything forbidden. If they do come to thee, either judge between them, or decline to interfere. If thou decline, they cannot hurt thee in the least. If thou judge, judge in equity between them. For Allah loveth those who judge in equity.

subtopic2: write the Book with their own hands
translation: Then woe to those who write the Book with their own hands, and then say:"This is from Allah," to traffic with it for miserable price!- Woe to them for what their hands do write, and for the gain they make thereby.

name: Nafs
translation: That ye believe in Allah and His Messenger, and that ye strive (your utmost) in the Cause of Allah, with your property and your persons: That will be best for you, if ye but knew!

name: Taqwa
translation: O ye who believe! Do your duty to Allah, seek the means of approach unto Him, and strive with might and main in his cause: that ye may prosper.

name: Shaitan / Satan
translation: Some He hath guided: Others have (by their choice) deserved the loss of their way; in that they took the evil ones, in preference to Allah, for their friends and protectors, and think that they receive guidance.

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
translation: Say: "If the whole of mankind and Jinns were to gather together to produce the like of this Qur'an, they could not produce the like thereof, even if they backed up each other with help and support.

name: Jinn
translation: And they have invented a blood-relationship between Him and the Jinns: but the Jinns know (quite well) that they have indeed to appear (before his Judgment-Seat)!

name: Shaitan / Satan
translation: And We have destined for them intimate companions (of like nature), who made alluring to them what was before them and behind them; and the sentence among the previous generations of Jinns and men, who have passed away, is proved against them; for they are utterly lost.

name: Qiyamah
translation: On that Day no question will be asked of man or Jinn as to his sin.

name: Jinn
translation: Among Jinns and among men.

name: Jinn
translation: And the Jinn race, We had created before, from the fire of a scorching wind.

name: Jinn
translation: And He created Jinns from fire free of smoke:

name: Shaitan / Satan
translation: And of the evil ones, were some who dived for him, and did other work besides; and it was We Who guarded them.

They worked for him as he desired, (making) arches, images, basons as large as reservoirs, and (cooking) cauldrons fixed (in their places): "Work ye, sons of David, with thanks! but few of My servants are grateful!"

name: Jinn
translation: Then, when We decreed (Solomon's) death, nothing showed them his death except a little worm of the earth, which kept (slowly) gnawing away at his staff: so when he fell down, the Jinns saw plainly that if they had known the unseen, they would not have tarried in the humiliating Penalty (of their Task).
As also others bound together in fetters.

name: Nafs
subtopic2: bringers of glad tidings and warners
translation: O ye assembly of Jinns and men! came there not unto you messengers from amongst you, setting forth unto you My signs, and warning you of the meeting of this Day of yours? They will say: "We bear witness against ourselves." It was the life of this world that deceived them. So against themselves will they bear witness that they rejected Faith.
If any does not hearken to the one who invites (us) to Allah, he cannot frustrate (Allah's Plan) on earth, and no protectors can he have besides Allah: such men (wander) in manifest error.

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
translation: Say: It has been revealed to me that a company of Jinns listened (to the Qur'an). They said, 'We have really heard a wonderful Recital!
There were some foolish ones among us, who used to utter extravagant lies against Allah;

name: Jinn
translation: But we do think that no man or spirit should say aught that untrue against Allah.

name: Adversity
translation: So We listened to him: We removed the distress that was on him, and We restored his people to him, and doubled their number,- as a Grace from Ourselves, and a thing for commemoration, for all who serve Us.
(The command was given:) "Strike with thy foot: here is (water) wherein to wash, cool and refreshing, and (water) to drink."

name: Allah's Mercy
translation: And We gave him (back) his people, and doubled their number,- as a Grace from Ourselves, and a thing for commemoration, for all who have Understanding.
There did Zakariya pray to his Lord, saying: "O my Lord! Grant unto me from Thee a progeny that is pure: for Thou art He that heareth prayer!
(His prayer was answered): "O Zakariya! We give thee good news of a son: His name shall be Yahya: on none by that name have We conferred distinction before."

name: Wife
translation: He said: "O my Lord! How shall I have a son, when my wife is barren and I have grown quite decrepit from old age?"
He said: "So (it will be) thy Lord saith, 'that is easy for Me: I did indeed create thee before, when thou hadst been nothing!'"
(Zakariya) said: "O my Lord! give me a Sign." "Thy Sign," was the answer, "Shall be that thou shalt speak to no man for three nights, although thou art not dumb."
So Zakariya came out to his people from him chamber: He told them by signs to celebrate Allah's praises in the morning and in the evening.

name: On Wisdom
translation: (To his son came the command): "O Yahya! take hold of the Book with might": and We gave him Wisdom even as a youth,

name: Taqwa
translation: And piety (for all creatures) as from Us, and purity: He was devout,

name: Respecting Others
translation: And kind to his parents, and he was not overbearing or rebellious.

name: Peace
translation: So Peace on him the day he was born, the day that he dies, and the day that he will be raised up to life (again)!
So also was Jonah among those sent (by Us).
When he ran away (like a slave from captivity) to the ship (fully) laden,
He (agreed to) cast lots, and he was condemned:

name: On Animals
translation: Then the big Fish did swallow him, and he had done acts worthy of blame.
Had it not been that he (repented and) glorified Allah,

name: About Difficulties
translation: He would certainly have remained inside the Fish till the Day of Resurrection.
But We cast him forth on the naked shore in a state of sickness,
And We caused to grow, over him, a spreading plant of the gourd kind.
And We sent him (on a mission) to a hundred thousand (men) or more.

name: Contentment
translation: And they believed; so We permitted them to enjoy (their life) for a while.

name: Faith
translation: Why was there not a single township (among those We warned), which believed,- so its faith should have profited it,- except the people of Jonah? When they believed, We removed from them the penalty of ignominy in the life of the present, and permitted them to enjoy (their life) for a while.

name: Forgiveness
translation: And remember We said: "Enter this town, and eat of the plenty therein as ye wish; but enter the gate with humility, in posture and in words, and We shall forgive you your faults and increase (the portion of) those who do good."
Verily in Joseph and his brethren are signs (or symbols) for seekers (after Truth).

name: Obedience To Parents
translation: Slay ye Joseph or cast him out to some (unknown) land, that so the favour of your father may be given to you alone: (there will be time enough) for you to be righteous after that!

name: Verses on Killing
translation: Said one of them: "Slay not Joseph, but if ye must do something, throw him down to the bottom of the well: he will be picked up by some caravan of travellers."
Send him with us tomorrow to enjoy himself and play, and we shall take every care of him.
They said: "If the wolf were to devour him while we are (so large) a party, then should we indeed (first) have perished ourselves!"

So they did take him away, and they all agreed to throw him down to the bottom of the well: and We put into his heart (this Message): 'Of a surety thou shalt (one day) tell them the truth of this their affair while they know (thee) not'

Then there came a caravan of travellers: they sent their water-carrier (for water), and he let down his bucket (into the well)... He said: "Ah there! Good news! Here is a (fine) young man!" So they concealed him as a treasure! But Allah knoweth well all that they do!
The (Brethren) sold him for a miserable price, for a few dirhams counted out: in such low estimation did they hold him!

name: On Wisdom
translation: When Joseph attained His full manhood, We gave him power and knowledge: thus do We reward those who do right.

name: Sodomy
translation: And (with passion) did she desire him, and he would have desired her, but that he saw the evidence of his Lord: thus (did We order) that We might turn away from him (all) evil and shameful deeds: for he was one of Our servants, sincere and purified.

name: Generosity
translation: When she heard of their malicious talk, she sent for them and prepared a banquet for them: she gave each of them a knife: and she said (to Joseph), "Come out before them." When they saw him, they did extol him, and (in their amazement) cut their hands: they said, "Allah preserve us! no mortal is this! this is none other than a noble angel!"

name: Nafs
translation: She said: "There before you is the man about whom ye did blame me! I did seek to seduce him from his (true) self but he did firmly save himself guiltless!.... and now, if he doth not my bidding, he shall certainly be cast into prison, and (what is more) be of the company of the vilest!"

He said: "O my Lord! the prison is more to my liking than that to which they invite me: Unless Thou turn away their snare from me, I should (in my youthful folly) feel inclined towards them and join the ranks of the ignorant."
So his Lord hearkened to him (in his prayer), and turned away from him their snare: Verily He heareth and knoweth (all things).
Then it occurred to the men, after they had seen the signs, (that it was best) to imprison him for a time.

name: Rizq
translation: He said: "Before any food comes (in due course) to feed either of you, I will surely reveal to you the truth and meaning of this ere it befall you: that is part of the (duty) which my Lord hath taught me. I have (I assure you) abandoned the ways of a people that believe not in Allah and that (even) deny the Hereafter.

name: On Women
translation: So the king said: "Bring ye him unto me." But when the messenger came to him, (Joseph) said: "Go thou back to thy lord, and ask him, 'What is the state of mind of the ladies who cut their hands'? For my Lord is certainly well aware of their snare."

name: On Deception
translation: This (say I), in order that He may know that I have never been false to him in his absence, and that Allah will never guide the snare of the false ones.

name: Nafs
translation: Nor do I absolve my own self (of blame): the (human) soul is certainly prone to evil, unless my Lord do bestow His Mercy: but surely my Lord is Oft-forgiving, Most Merciful.

name: Nafs
translation: So the king said: "Bring him unto me; I will take him specially to serve about my own person." Therefore when he had spoken to him, he said: "Be assured this day, thou art, before our own presence, with rank firmly established, and fidelity fully proved!
(Joseph) said: "Set me over the store-houses of the land: I will indeed guard them, as one that knows (their importance)."
Then came Joseph's brethren: they entered his presence, and he knew them, but they knew him not.

name: Obedience To Parents
translation: And when he had furnished them forth with provisions (suitable) for them, he said: "Bring unto me a brother ye have, of the same father as yourselves, (but a different mother): see ye not that I pay out full measure, and that I do provide the best hospitality?
Now if ye bring him not to me, ye shall have no measure (of corn) from me, nor shall ye (even) come near me.

name: Obedience To Parents
translation: They said: "We shall certainly seek to get our wish about him from his father: Indeed we shall do it."

And (Joseph) told his servants to put their stock-in-trade (with which they had bartered) into their saddle-bags, so they should know it only when they returned to their people, in order that they might come back.
Now when they came into Joseph's presence, he received his (full) brother to stay with him. He said (to him): "Behold! I am thy (own) brother; so grieve not at aught of their doings."

name: Stealing
translation: At length when he had furnished them forth with provisions (suitable) for them, he put the drinking cup into his brother's saddle-bag. Then shouted out a crier: "O ye (in) the caravan! behold! ye are thieves, without doubt!"
They said, turning towards them: "What is it that ye miss?"
They said: "We miss the great beaker of the king; for him who produces it, is (the reward of) a camel load; I will be bound by it."
