To him dost thou attend;
Though it is no blame to thee if he grow not (in spiritual understanding).
But as to him who came to thee striving earnestly,
And with fear (in his heart),

name: Good Character
translation: Of him wast thou unmindful.
In order that ye (O men) may believe in Allah and His Messenger, that ye may assist and honour Him, and celebrate His praise morning and evening.

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
subtopic2: brought back to the Place of Return
translation: Verily He Who ordained the Qur'an for thee, will bring thee back to the Place of Return. Say: "My Lord knows best who it is that brings true guidance, and who is in manifest error."
(Allah has knowledge) of the (Prophet's) cry, "O my Lord! Truly these are people who will not believe!"
True, there is for thee by day prolonged occupation with ordinary duties:

name: Remembrance of Allah (swt)
translation: But keep in remembrance the name of thy Lord and devote thyself to Him whole-heartedly.

name: Truth and Honesty
translation: Or do they say, "He forged it"? say: "Bring then a Sura like unto it, and call (to your aid) anyone you can besides Allah, if it be ye speak the truth!"

name: On Knowledge
translation: Nay, they charge with falsehood that whose knowledge they cannot compass, even before the elucidation thereof hath reached them: thus did those before them make charges of falsehood: but see what was the end of those who did wrong!
Or do they say, "He fabricated the (Message)"? Nay, they have no faith!
It is not the word of a poet: little it is ye believe!
Nor is it the word of a soothsayer: little admonition it is ye receive.
And if the messenger were to invent any sayings in Our name,
We should certainly seize him by his right hand,
And We should certainly then cut off the artery of his heart:
Nor could any of you withhold him (from Our wrath).

subtopic2: does not ask rewards of people
translation: Say: "No reward do I ask of you for this (Qur'an), nor am I a pretender.

subtopic2: does not ask rewards of people
translation: Or is it that thou dost ask them for a reward, so that they are burdened with a load of debt?-

subtopic2: does not speak of his own desire
translation: Nor does he say (aught) of (his own) Desire.
But if they turn away, thy duty is only to preach the clear Message.

name: Qiyam Al-Layl
subtopic1: Guidance’s Book to Return to Ward God
translation: O thou folded in garments!

subtopic1: Guidance’s Book to Return to Ward God
translation: O thou wrapped up (in the mantle)!

name: Good Character
translation: And thou (standest) on an exalted standard of character.

name: Truth and Honesty
translation: Is it a matter of wonderment to men that We have sent Our inspiration to a man from among themselves?- that he should warn mankind (of their danger), and give the good news to the Believers that they have before their Lord the lofty rank of truth. (But) say the Unbelievers: "This is indeed an evident sorcerer!"

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
translation: We do relate unto thee the most beautiful of stories, in that We reveal to thee this (portion of the) Qur'an: before this, thou too was among those who knew it not.

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
translation: And We have bestowed upon thee the Seven Oft-repeated (verses) and the Grand Qur'an.
It is no less than inspiration sent down to him:

name: On Lying
translation: The (Prophet's) (mind and) heart in no way falsified that which he saw.
Soon shall We send down to thee a weighty Message.
Verily We have granted thee a manifest Victory:
And that Allah may help thee with powerful help.

name: Grief
translation: And do thou be patient, for thy patience is but from Allah; nor grieve over them: and distress not thyself because of their plots.

name: Nafs
translation: Thou wouldst only, perchance, fret thyself to death, following after them, in grief, if they believe not in this Message.

name: Nafs
translation: It may be thou frettest thy soul with grief, that they do not become Believers.

name: Grief
translation: But grieve not over them, nor distress thyself because of their plots.

subtopic2: has no power except as Allah wills
translation: Say: "It is not in my power to cause you harm, or to bring you to right conduct."

name: Mothers
translation: So hearken not to those who deny (the Truth).

name: Generosity
translation: That this is verily the word of an honoured messenger;
Who seeth thee standing forth (in prayer),
And thy movements among those who prostrate themselves,

name: Helping Others
translation: Stand (to prayer) by night, but not all night,-
Half of it,- or a little less,

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
translation: Or a little more; and recite the Qur'an in slow, measured rhythmic tones.

name: Hurting Others
translation: Among them are men who molest the Prophet and say, "He is (all) ear." Say, "He listens to what is best for you: he believes in Allah, has faith in the Believers, and is a Mercy to those of you who believe." But those who molest the Messenger will have a grievous penalty.

name: Hope
subtopic1: Guidance’s Book to Return to Ward God
translation: Nay, they say, "(these are) medleys of dream! - Nay, He forged it! - Nay, He is (but) a poet! Let him then bring us a Sign like the ones that were sent to (Prophets) of old!"

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
translation: We have not instructed the (Prophet) in Poetry, nor is it meet for him: this is no less than a Message and a Qur'an making things clear:
Or do they say:- "A Poet! we await for him some calamity (hatched) by Time!"

subtopic2: proclaim the praises of your Lord
translation: Therefore proclaim thou the praises (of thy Lord): for by the Grace of thy Lord, thou art no (vulgar) soothsayer, nor art thou one possessed.
Your Companion is neither astray nor being misled.
Or do they say, "He is possessed"? Nay, he has brought them the Truth, but most of them hate the Truth.
And (O people!) your companion is not one possessed;

subtopic2: is not responsible for arranging your affairs
translation: But thy people reject this, though it is the truth. Say: "Not mine is the responsibility for arranging your affairs;

name: Nafs
subtopic2: is not responsible for arranging your affairs
translation: Say: "O ye men! Now Truth hath reached you from your Lord! those who receive guidance, do so for the good of their own souls; those who stray, do so to their own loss: and I am not (set) over you to arrange your affairs."

name: Disobedience
subtopic2: is not responsible for arranging your affairs
translation: Then if they disobey thee, say: "I am free (of responsibility) for what ye do!"

name: Nafs
subtopic2: is not responsible for arranging your affairs
translation: Verily We have revealed the Book to thee in Truth, for (instructing) mankind. He, then, that receives guidance benefits his own soul: but he that strays injures his own soul. Nor art thou set over them to dispose of their affairs.

name: Dawah
subtopic2: is not responsible for arranging your affairs
translation: And those who take as protectors others besides Him,- Allah doth watch over them; and thou art not the disposer of their affairs.

subtopic2: Messenger to the People of the Book
translation: An messenger from Allah, rehearsing scriptures kept pure and holy:
(His) sight never swerved, nor did it go wrong!

name: Disobedience
main_Topic2: Obediance to Allah and His messenger
translation: Say: "Obey Allah and His Messenger": But if they turn back, Allah loveth not those who reject Faith.
On a Straight Way.
So hold thou fast to the Revelation sent down to thee; verily thou art on a Straight Way.
Thou art indeed one of the messengers,
Nay, verily for thee is a Reward unfailing:

name: Hurting Others
translation: Those who annoy Allah and His Messenger - Allah has cursed them in this World and in the Hereafter, and has prepared for them a humiliating Punishment.

name: Taqwa
translation: And thou wast not (able) to recite a Book before this (Book came), nor art thou (able) to transcribe it with thy right hand: In that case, indeed, would the talkers of vanities have doubted.

name: Swearing
translation: They swear their strongest oaths by Allah, that if a (special) sign came to them, by it they would believe. Say: "Certainly (all) signs are in the power of Allah: but what will make you (Muslims) realise that (even) if (special) signs came, they will not believe."?

name: Listening to Qur'an
subtopic2: among them are those who believe
translation: And when it is recited to them, they say: "We believe therein, for it is the Truth from our Lord: indeed we have been Muslims (bowing to Allah's Will) from before this.
Shall We then treat the People of Faith like the People of Sin?
Amongst us are some that submit their wills (to Allah), and some that swerve from justice. Now those who submit their wills - they have sought out (the path) of right conduct:
And He it is Who makes the Night as a Robe for you, and Sleep as Repose, and makes the Day (as it were) a Resurrection.
He it is That hath made you the night that ye may rest therein, and the day to make things visible (to you). Verily in this are signs for those who listen (to His Message).
It is He Who gives life and death, and to Him (is due) the alternation of Night and Day: will ye not then understand?
It is Allah Who alternates the Night and the Day: verily in these things is an instructive example for those who have vision!
See they not that We have made the Night for them to rest in and the Day to give them light? Verily in this are Signs for any people that believe!

name: Qiyamah
translation: Say: See ye? If Allah were to make the night perpetual over you to the Day of Judgment, what god is there other than Allah, who can give you enlightenment? Will ye not then hearken?

name: Qiyamah
translation: Say: See ye? If Allah were to make the day perpetual over you to the Day of Judgment, what god is there other than Allah, who can give you a night in which ye can rest? Will ye not then see?
And by the Night as it retreateth,
And by the Dawn as it shineth forth,-
And the Night as it dissipates;
And the Dawn as it breathes away the darkness;-
The Night and its Homing;
By the break of Day
By the Nights twice five;
By the even and odd (contrasted);
And by the Night when it passeth away;-
Is there (not) in these an adjuration (or evidence) for those who understand?
By the Night as it conceals it;
By the Night as it conceals (the light);
By the Day as it appears in glory;
By the Glorious Morning Light,
And by the Night when it is still,-

name: Peace
translation: Peace!... This until the rise of morn!
We sent it down during a Blessed Night: for We (ever) wish to warn (against Evil).
In the (Night) is made distinct every affair of wisdom,

name: About Difficulties
translation: By command, from Our Presence. For We (ever) send (revelations),
We have indeed revealed this (Message) in the Night of Power:
And what will explain to thee what the night of power is?
The Night of Power is better than a thousand months.
The leaders of his people said: "Ah! we see thee evidently wandering (in mind)."
I but fulfil towards you the duties of my Lord's mission: Sincere is my advice to you, and I know from Allah something that ye know not.

name: Prophet Nuh (as)
translation: We sent Noah to his people (with a mission): "I have come to you with a Clear Warning:

name: On Lying
translation: But the chiefs of the Unbelievers among his people said: "We see (in) thee nothing but a man like ourselves: Nor do we see that any follow thee but the meanest among us, in judgment immature: Nor do we see in you (all) any merit above us: in fact we think ye are liars!"
And O my people! who would help me against Allah if I drove them away? Will ye not then take heed?

name: Nafs
translation: I tell you not that with me are the treasures of Allah, nor do I know what is hidden, nor claim I to be an angel. Nor yet do I say, of those whom your eyes do despise that Allah will not grant them (all) that is good: Allah knoweth best what is in their souls: I should, if I did, indeed be a wrong-doer.

name: Truth and Honesty
translation: They said: "O Noah! thou hast disputed with us, and (much) hast thou prolonged the dispute with us: now bring upon us what thou threatenest us with, if thou speakest the truth!?"
He said: "Truly, Allah will bring it on you if He wills,- and then, ye will not be able to frustrate it!
Or do they say, "He has forged it"? Say: "If I had forged it, on me were my sin! and I am free of the sins of which ye are guilty!

name: Prophet Nuh (as)
translation: It was revealed to Noah: "None of thy people will believe except those who have believed already! So grieve no longer over their (evil) deeds.
But construct an Ark under Our eyes and Our inspiration, and address Me no (further) on behalf of those who are in sin: for they are about to be overwhelmed (in the Flood).

Forthwith he (starts) constructing the Ark: Every time that the chiefs of his people passed by him, they threw ridicule on him. He said: "If ye ridicule us now, we (in our turn) can look down on you with ridicule likewise!
But soon will ye know who it is on whom will descend a penalty that will cover them with shame,- on whom will be unloosed a penalty lasting:

name: Prophet Nuh (as)
translation: He said: "O Noah! He is not of thy family: For his conduct is unrighteous. So ask not of Me that of which thou hast no knowledge! I give thee counsel, lest thou act like the ignorant!"

name: Forgiveness
translation: Noah said: "O my Lord! I do seek refuge with Thee, lest I ask Thee for that of which I have no knowledge. And unless thou forgive me and have Mercy on me, I should indeed be lost!"

name: Prophet Nuh (as)
translation: The word came: "O Noah! Come down (from the Ark) with peace from Us, and blessing on thee and on some of the peoples (who will spring) from those with thee: but (there will be other) peoples to whom We shall grant their pleasures (for a time), but in the end will a grievous penalty reach them from Us."

name: Prophet Nuh (as)
translation: O ye that are sprung from those whom We carried (in the Ark) with Noah! Verily he was a devotee most grateful.

name: Prophet Nuh (as)
translation: (Remember) Noah, when he cried (to Us) aforetime: We listened to his (prayer) and delivered him and his family from great distress.
We helped him against people who rejected Our Signs: truly they were a people given to Evil: so We drowned them (in the Flood) all together.

name: Qiyamah
translation: Again, on the Day of Judgment, will ye be raised up.
And We send down water from the sky according to (due) measure, and We cause it to soak in the soil; and We certainly are able to drain it off (with ease).

name: Mothers
translation: (And some said): "He is only a man possessed: wait (and have patience) with him for a time."
(Noah) said: "O my Lord! help me: for that they accuse me of falsehood!"
And made his progeny to endure (on this earth);
And We left (this blessing) for him among generations to come in later times:

name: On The Universe
translation: Peace and salutation to Noah among the nations!
Thus indeed do we reward those who do right.
For he was one of our believing Servants.
Then he called on his Lord: "I am one overcome: do Thou then help (me)!"

name: Prophet Nuh (as)
translation: We sent Noah to his People (with the Command): "Do thou warn thy People before there comes to them a grievous Penalty."
He said: "O my People! I am to you a Warner, clear and open:

name: Dawah
translation: He said: "O my Lord! I have called to my People night and day:

name: Ego
translation: But my call only increases (their) flight (from the Right).

name: Forgiveness
translation: And every time I have called to them, that Thou mightest forgive them, they have (only) thrust their fingers into their ears, covered themselves up with their garments, grown obstinate, and given themselves up to arrogance.

name: Dawah
translation: So I have called to them aloud;
Further I have spoken to them in public and secretly in private,
He will send rain to you in abundance;

name: Creation
translation: What is the matter with you, that ye place not your hope for kindness and long-suffering in Allah,-

name: Disobedience
translation: Noah said: "O my Lord! They have disobeyed me, but they follow (men) whose wealth and children give them no increase but only Loss.

name: Prophet Nuh (as)
translation: And Noah, said: "O my Lord! Leave not of the Unbelievers, a single one on earth!

name: About Disbelievers
translation: For, if Thou dost leave (any of) them, they will but mislead Thy devotees, and they will breed none but wicked ungrateful ones.

name: Swearing
translation: They swear their strongest oaths by Allah, that Allah will not raise up those who die: Nay, but it is a promise (binding) on Him in truth: but most among mankind realise it not.

name: Swearing
translation: They swore their strongest oaths by Allah that if a warner came to them, they would follow his guidance better than any (other) of the Peoples: But when a warner came to them, it has only increased their flight (from righteousness),-

name: Swearing
translation: Heed not the type of despicable men,- ready with oaths,

name: Dunya
translation: There is nothing but our life in this world! We shall die and we live! But we shall never be raised up again!

name: Prophet Nuh (as)
translation: So were the People of Noah before them for they wickedly transgressed.
When it is said to them, "What is it that your Lord has revealed?" they say, "Tales of the ancients!"

name: Qiyamah
translation: Then, on the Day of Judgment, He will cover them with shame, and say: "Where are My 'partners' concerning whom ye used to dispute (with the godly)?" Those endued with knowledge will say: "This Day, indeed, are the Unbelievers covered with shame and misery,-
But the evil results of their deeds overtook them, and that very (Wrath) at which they had scoffed hemmed them in.

name: Guidance
translation: If thou art anxious for their guidance, yet Allah guideth not such as He leaves to stray, and there is none to help them.

name: On Lying
translation: (They must be raised up), in order that He may manifest to them the truth of that wherein they differ, and that the rejecters of Truth may realise that they had indeed (surrendered to) Falsehood.
Do then those who devise evil (plots) feel secure that Allah will not cause the earth to swallow them up, or that the Wrath will not seize them from directions they little perceive?-

Do they not look at Allah's creation, (even) among (inanimate) things,- How their (very) shadows turn round, from the right and the left, prostrating themselves to Allah, and that in the humblest manner?
Invent not similitudes for Allah: for Allah knoweth, and ye know not.

name: About Disbelievers
translation: One Day We shall raise from all Peoples a Witness: then will no excuse be accepted from Unbelievers, nor will they receive any favours.
When the wrong-doers (actually) see the Penalty, then will it in no way be mitigated, nor will they then receive respite.
That Day shall they (openly) show (their) submission to Allah; and all their inventions shall leave them in the lurch.

name: Corruption
translation: Those who reject Allah and hinder (men) from the Path of Allah - for them will We add Penalty to Penalty; for that they used to spread mischief.

name: Qiyamah
translation: And be not like a woman who breaks into untwisted strands the yarn which she has spun, after it has become strong. Nor take your oaths to practise deception between yourselves, lest one party should be more numerous than another: for Allah will test you by this; and on the Day of Judgment He will certainly make clear to you (the truth of) that wherein ye disagree.

name: Swearing
translation: And take not your oaths, to practise deception between yourselves, with the result that someone's foot may slip after it was firmly planted, and ye may have to taste the evil (consequences) of having hindered (men) from the Path of Allah, and a Mighty Wrath descend on you.

name: Nafs
main_Topic2: Obediance to Allah and His messenger
translation: If We had ordered them to sacrifice their lives or to leave their homes, very few of them would have done it: But if they had done what they were (actually) told, it would have been best for them, and would have gone farthest to strengthen their (faith);

name: Orphan
translation: To orphans restore their property (When they reach their age), nor substitute (your) worthless things for (their) good ones; and devour not their substance (by mixing it up) with your own. For this is indeed a great sin.

name: Rizq
translation: To those weak of understanding Make not over your property, which Allah hath made a means of support for you, but feed and clothe them therewith, and speak to them words of kindness and justice.

name: Orphan
translation: Nay, nay! but ye honour not the orphans!

name: Orphan
translation: Therefore, treat not the orphan with harshness,

name: Orphan
translation: Then such is the (man) who repulses the orphan (with harshness),

name: Orphan
translation: Those who unjustly eat up the property of orphans, eat up a Fire into their own bodies: They will soon be enduring a Blazing Fire!

name: Orphan
translation: Come not nigh to the orphan's property except to improve it, until he attains the age of full strength; and fulfil (every) engagement, for (every) engagement will be enquired into (on the Day of Reckoning).
A (declaration) of immunity from Allah and His Messenger, to those of the Pagans with whom ye have contracted mutual alliances:-

name: About Disbelievers
translation: Go ye, then, for four months, backwards and forwards, (as ye will), throughout the land, but know ye that ye cannot frustrate Allah (by your falsehood) but that Allah will cover with shame those who reject Him.

name: Hajj & Umrah
translation: And an announcement from Allah and His Messenger, to the people (assembled) on the day of the Great Pilgrimage,- that Allah and His Messenger dissolve (treaty) obligations with the Pagans. If then, ye repent, it were best for you; but if ye turn away, know ye that ye cannot frustrate Allah. And proclaim a grievous penalty to those who reject Faith.

name: Family Ties / Kinship
translation: In a Believer they respect not the ties either of kinship or of covenant! It is they who have transgressed all bounds.

subtopic2: has no authority over Allah`s servants
translation: His authority is over those only, who take him as patron and who join partners with Allah.

subtopic2: attribute to Allah what they hate for themselves
translation: What is the matter with you? How judge ye?

subtopic2: attribute to Allah what they hate for themselves
translation: Will ye not then receive admonition?

subtopic2: attribute to Allah what they hate for themselves
translation: Or have ye an authority manifest?

name: Truth and Honesty
subtopic2: attribute to Allah what they hate for themselves
translation: Then bring ye your Book (of authority) if ye be truthful!

name: About Disbelievers
translation: Allah disdains not to use the similitude of things, lowest as well as highest. Those who believe know that it is truth from their Lord; but those who reject Faith say: "What means Allah by this similitude?" By it He causes many to stray, and many He leads into the right path; but He causes not to stray, except those who forsake (the path),-

Seest thou not how Allah sets forth a parable? - A goodly word like a goodly tree, whose root is firmly fixed, and its branches (reach) to the heavens,- of its Lord. So Allah sets forth parables for men, in order that they may receive admonition.
It brings forth its fruit at all times, by the leave of its Lord. So Allah sets forth parables for men, in order that they may receive admonition.

name: Nafs
translation: And ye dwelt in the dwellings of men who wronged their own souls; ye were clearly shown how We dealt with them; and We put forth (many) parables in your behoof!

name: Taqwa
translation: Allah sets forth a Parable: a city enjoying security and quiet, abundantly supplied with sustenance from every place: Yet was it ungrateful for the favours of Allah: so Allah made it taste of hunger and terror (in extremes) (closing in on it) like a garment (from every side), because of the (evil) which (its people) wrought.
And such are the Parables We set forth for mankind, but only those understand them who have knowledge.

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
translation: verily We have propounded for men, in this Qur'an every kind of Parable: But if thou bring to them any Sign, the Unbelievers are sure to say, "Ye do nothing but talk vanities."

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
translation: We have put forth for men, in this Qur'an every kind of Parable, in order that they may receive admonition.
That Day (Allah) will call to them, and say "Where are my 'partners'?- whom ye imagined (to be such)?"

Those against whom the charge will be proved, will say: "Our Lord! These are the ones whom we led astray: we led them astray, as we were astray ourselves: we free ourselves (from them) in Thy presence: it was not us they worshipped."

It will be said (to them): "Call upon your 'partners' (for help)": they will call upon them, but they will not listen to them; and they will see the Penalty (before them); (how they will wish) 'if only they had been open to guidance!'
And Who bringeth out the (green and luscious) pasture,
And then doth make it (but) swarthy stubble.

name: Swearing
translation: And have patience with what they say, and leave them with noble (dignity).

name: Patience
translation: But, for thy Lord's (Cause), be patient and constant!
Thus indeed do We reward those who do right.
For he was one of our believing Servants.
Nun. By the Pen and the (Record) which (men) write,-

name: People of the Book
translation: Say: "O People of the Book! Why reject ye the Signs of Allah, when Allah is Himself witness to all ye do?"

name: Taqwa
translation: Ye are the best of peoples, evolved for mankind, enjoining what is right, forbidding what is wrong, and believing in Allah. If only the People of the Book had faith, it were best for them: among them are some who have faith, but most of them are perverted transgressors.

name: Hurting Others
translation: They will do you no harm, barring a trifling annoyance; if they come out to fight you, they will show you their backs, and no help shall they get.

name: Disobedience
translation: Shame is pitched over them (Like a tent) wherever they are found, except when under a covenant (of protection) from Allah and from men; they draw on themselves wrath from Allah, and pitched over them is (the tent of) destitution. This because they rejected the Signs of Allah, and slew the prophets in defiance of right; this because they rebelled and transgressed beyond bounds.

name: Taqwa
subtopic2: among them are those who believe
translation: Of the good that they do, nothing will be rejected of them; for Allah knoweth well those that do right.

name: People of the Book
translation: Not your desires, nor those of the People of the Book (can prevail): whoever works evil, will be requited accordingly. Nor will he find, besides Allah, any protector or helper.

name: Nafs
translation: Those to whom We have given the Book know this as they know their own sons. Those who have lost their own souls refuse therefore to believe.

name: People of the Book
translation: Those who reject (Truth), among the People of the Book and among the Polytheists, were not going to depart (from their ways) until there should come to them Clear Evidence,-

name: Qiyamah
translation: Verily thy Lord will judge between them on the Day of Judgment, in the matters wherein they differ (among themselves)
But sects from among themselves fell into disagreement: then woe to the wrong-doers, from the Penalty of a Grievous Day!

name: Qiyamah
translation: And We granted them Clear Signs in affairs (of Religion): it was only after knowledge had been granted to them that they fell into schisms, through insolent envy among themselves. Verily thy Lord will judge between them on the Day of Judgment as to those matters in which they set up differences.

name: People of the Book
translation: Nor did the People of the Book make schisms, until after there came to them Clear Evidence.

name: Nafs
translation: It is the wish of a section of the People of the Book to lead you astray. But they shall lead astray (Not you), but themselves, and they do not perceive!

name: Vanity
translation: Ye People of the Book! Why do ye clothe Truth with falsehood, and conceal the Truth, while ye have knowledge?

name: People of the Book
translation: Among the People of the Book are some who, if entrusted with a hoard of gold, will (readily) pay it back; others, who, if entrusted with a single silver coin, will not repay it unless thou constantly stoodest demanding, because, they say, "there is no call on us (to keep faith) with these ignorant (Pagans)." but they tell a lie against Allah, and (well) they know it.

name: Taqwa
translation: Nay.- Those that keep their plighted faith and act aright,-verily Allah loves those who act aright.

name: On Wisdom
translation: It is not (possible) that a man, to whom is given the Book, and Wisdom, and the prophetic office, should say to people: "Be ye my worshippers rather than Allah's": on the contrary (He would say) "Be ye worshippers of Him Who is truly the Cherisher of all: For ye have taught the Book and ye have studied it earnestly."

name: Faith
translation: O ye who believe! If ye listen to a faction among the People of the Book, they would (indeed) render you apostates after ye have believed!

name: About Disbelievers
translation: And how would ye deny Faith while unto you are rehearsed the Signs of Allah, and among you Lives the Messenger? Whoever holds firmly to Allah will be shown a way that is straight.
Hast thou not turned Thy vision to those who were given a portion of the Book? they traffic in error, and wish that ye should lose the right path.

Moses said, "Thou knowest well that these things have been sent down by none but the Lord of the heavens and the earth as eye-opening evidence: and I consider thee indeed, O Pharaoh, to be one doomed to destruction!"

name: Disobedience
translation: But Pharaoh disobeyed the messenger; so We seized him with a heavy Punishment.

name: Disobedience
translation: But (Pharaoh) rejected it and disobeyed (guidance);
And remember We divided the sea for you and saved you and drowned Pharaoh's people within your very sight.

(Deeds) after the manner of the people of Pharaoh and those before them": They treated as false the Signs of their Lord: so We destroyed them for their crimes, and We drowned the people of Pharaoh: for they were all oppressors and wrong-doers.

name: Disobedience
translation: (It was said to him): "Ah now!- But a little while before, wast thou in rebellion!- and thou didst mischief (and violence)!
This day shall We save thee in the body, that thou mayest be a sign to those who come after thee! but verily, many among mankind are heedless of Our Signs!
So he resolved to remove them from the face of the earth: but We did drown him and all who were with him.
So We seized him and his hosts, and We flung them into the sea: Now behold what was the end of those who did wrong!

name: Inheritance
translation: Truly Pharaoh elated himself in the land and broke up its people into sections, depressing a small group among them: their sons he slew, but he kept alive their females: for he was indeed a maker of mischief.

name: Leadership
translation: And We wished to be Gracious to those who were being depressed in the land, to make them leaders (in Faith) and make them heirs,
Further, he turned his back, striving hard (against Allah).
Then he collected (his men) and made a proclamation,

name: Qiyamah
translation: Saying, "I am your Lord, Most High".

name: People of Thamud
translation: Of Pharaoh and the Thamud?
And with Pharaoh, lord of stakes?
(All) these transgressed beyond bounds in the lands,

name: Corruption
translation: And heaped therein mischief (on mischief).

name: Qiyamah
translation: And they are followed by a curse in this (life) and on the Day of Judgment: and woeful is the gift which shall be given (unto them)!

name: Qiyamah
translation: But Allah did punish him, (and made an) example of him, - in the Hereafter, as in this life.
We punished the people of Pharaoh with years (of droughts) and shortness of crops; that they might receive admonition.

name: Prophet Musa (as)
translation: But when good (times) came, they said, "This is due to us;" When gripped by calamity, they ascribed it to evil omens connected with Moses and those with him! Behold! in truth the omens of evil are theirs in Allah's sight, but most of them do not understand!
They said (to Moses): "Whatever be the Signs thou bringest, to work therewith thy sorcery on us, we shall never believe in thee.

name: About Arrogance
translation: So We sent (plagues) on them: Wholesale death, Locusts, Lice, Frogs, And Blood: Signs openly self-explained: but they were steeped in arrogance,- a people given to sin.

name: Prophet Musa (as)
translation: Every time the penalty fell on them, they said: "O Moses! on your behalf call on thy Lord in virtue of his promise to thee: If thou wilt remove the penalty from us, we shall truly believe in thee, and we shall send away the Children of Israel with thee."
But every time We removed the penalty from them according to a fixed term which they had to fulfil,- Behold! they broke their word!

name: About Arrogance
translation: Those who had been arrogant will say: "We are all in this (Fire)! Truly, Allah has judged between (his) Servants!"

name: About Disbelievers
translation: They will say: "Did there not come to you your messengers with Clear Signs?" They will say, "Yes". They will reply, "Then pray (as ye like)! But the prayer of those without Faith is nothing but (futile wandering) in (mazes of) error!"
And wealth (and conveniences of life), wherein they had taken such delight!
And neither heaven nor earth shed a tear over them: nor were they given a respite (again).
To the People of Pharaoh, too, aforetime, came Warners (from Allah).

name: Remembrance of Allah (swt)
translation: Celebrate the praises of Allah during the Appointed Days. But if any one hastens to leave in two days, there is no blame on him, and if any one stays on, there is no blame on him, if his aim is to do right. Then fear Allah, and know that ye will surely be gathered unto Him.
Woe to the makers of the pit (of fire),
Fire supplied (abundantly) with fuel:
Behold! they sat over against the (fire),
And they witnessed (all) that they were doing against the Believers.

name: Dunya
translation: Set forth to them the similitude of the life of this world: It is like the rain which we send down from the skies: the earth's vegetation absorbs it, but soon it becomes dry stubble, which the winds do scatter: it is (only) Allah who prevails over all things.

name: On The Prayer
translation: A votary when he (turns) to pray?

name: On The Prayer
translation: Therefore to thy Lord turn in Prayer and Sacrifice.

name: Allah's Mercy
translation: Our Lord! (they say), "Let not our hearts deviate now after Thou hast guided us, but grant us mercy from Thine own Presence; for Thou art the Grantor of bounties without measure.

name: Vanity
translation: And say: "Truth has (now) arrived, and Falsehood perished: for Falsehood is (by its nature) bound to perish."

name: On The Prayer
mainTopic1: Coloration of Maker – Variegation of Creator
translation: So woe to the worshippers

name: On The Prayer
translation: Who are neglectful of their prayers,
Those who (want but) to be seen (of men),

name: Forgiveness
translation: He said, "O my Lord! Forgive me, and grant me a kingdom which, (it may be), suits not another after me: for Thou art the Grantor of Bounties (without measure).

name: Remembrance of Allah (swt)
subtopic2: sacred duty linked to time of day
translation: When ye pass (Congregational) prayers, celebrate Allah's praises, standing, sitting down, or lying down on your sides; but when ye are free from danger, set up Regular Prayers: For such prayers are enjoined on believers at stated times.

name: Taqwa
mainTopic1: Coloration of Maker – Variegation of Creator
translation: And establish regular prayers at the two ends of the day and at the approaches of the night: For those things, that are good remove those that are evil: Be that the word of remembrance to those who remember (their Lord):

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
mainTopic1: Coloration of Maker – Variegation of Creator
translation: Establish regular prayers - at the sun's decline till the darkness of the night, and the morning prayer and reading: for the prayer and reading in the morning carry their testimony.

name: Qiyam Al-Layl
translation: And pray in the small watches of the morning: (it would be) an additional prayer (or spiritual profit) for thee: soon will thy Lord raise thee to a Station of Praise and Glory!

name: Qiyam Al-Layl
subtopic2: according to best of deeds and more
translation: They were in the habit of sleeping but little by night,

name: Remembrance of Allah (swt)
mainTopic1: Coloration of Maker – Variegation of Creator
translation: And celebrate the name of thy Lord morning and evening,

name: Remembrance of Allah (swt)
translation: If ye fear (an enemy), pray on foot, or riding, (as may be most convenient), but when ye are in security, celebrate Allah's praises in the manner He has taught you, which ye knew not (before).

name: On The Prayer
translation: When ye travel through the earth, there is no blame on you if ye shorten your prayers, for fear the Unbelievers May attack you: For the Unbelievers are unto you open enemies.

name: Beauty of Nature
translation: For Him (alone) is prayer in Truth: any others that they call upon besides Him hear them no more than if they were to stretch forth their hands for water to reach their mouths but it reaches them not: for the prayer of those without Faith is nothing but (futile) wandering (in the mind).

name: Trials of Life
translation: Now, when trouble touches man, he cries to Us: But when We bestow a favour upon him as from Ourselves, he says, "This has been given to me because of a certain knowledge (I have)!" Nay, but this is but a trial, but most of them understand not!
When We bestow favours on man, he turns away, and gets himself remote on his side (instead of coming to Us); and when evil seizes him, (he comes) full of prolonged prayer!
Yet when the Devotee of Allah stands forth to invoke Him, they just make round him a dense crowd.
Say: "I do no more than invoke my Lord, and I join not with Him any (false god)."
Had it not been for a previous ordainment from Allah, a severe penalty would have reached you for the (ransom) that ye took.
Do they think that because We have granted them abundance of wealth and sons,

name: Livelihood
translation: But seek, with the (wealth) which Allah has bestowed on thee, the Home of the Hereafter, nor forget thy portion in this world: but do thou good, as Allah has been good to thee, and seek not (occasions for) mischief in the land: for Allah loves not those who do mischief.

name: Dunya
translation: So he went forth among his people in the (pride of his wordly) glitter. Said those whose aim is the Life of this World: "Oh! that we had the like of what Qarun has got! for he is truly a lord of mighty good fortune!"
Of no profit to me has been my wealth!
To whom I granted resources in abundance,

name: Prophet Isaac (as)
translation: (To them) and to their fathers, and progeny and brethren: We chose them, and we guided them to a straight way.

name: Tawakkul
translation: These were the men to whom We gave the Book, and authority, and prophethood: if these (their descendants) reject them, Behold! We shall entrust their charge to a new people who reject them not.

name: Adversity
translation: Whenever We sent a prophet to a town, We took up its people in suffering and adversity, in order that they might learn humility.
He will say: "Ah! Would that I had sent forth (good deeds) for (this) my (Future) Life!"
And thy garments keep free from stain!
But those will prosper who purify themselves,
Truly he succeeds that purifies it,
Then We caused the earth to swallow up him and his house; and he had not (the least little) party to help him against Allah, nor could he defend himself.

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
translation: Do they not consider the Qur'an (with care)? Had it been from other Than Allah, they would surely have found therein Much discrepancy.
Say: "If Allah had so willed, I should not have rehearsed it to you, nor would He have made it known to you. A whole life-time before this have I tarried amongst you: will ye not then understand?"

subtopic1: Guidance’s Book to Return to Ward God
translation: A. L. R. These are the symbols (or Verses) of the perspicuous Book.

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
translation: We have sent it down as an Arabic Qur'an, in order that ye may learn wisdom.

subtopic1: Guidance’s Book to Return to Ward God
translation: A. L. M. R. These are the signs (or verses) of the Book: that which hath been revealed unto thee from thy Lord is the Truth; but most men believe not.

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
translation: A. L. R. These are the Ayats of Revelation,- of a Qur'an that makes things clear.

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
translation: (So also on such) as have made Qur'an into shreds (as they please).

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
translation: We have explained (things) in various (ways) in this Qur'an, in order that they may receive admonition, but it only increases their flight (from the Truth)!

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
translation: And We have explained to man, in this Qur'an, every kind of similitude: yet the greater part of men refuse (to receive it) except with ingratitude!
Verily in this (Qur'an) is a Message for people who would (truly) worship Allah.
These are verses of the Book that makes (things) clear.

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
subtopic1: Guidance’s Book to Return to Ward God
translation: These are verses of the Qur'an,-a book that makes (things) clear;
These are Verses of the Book that makes (things) clear.

name: About Disbelievers
translation: That it may give admonition to any (who are) alive, and that the charge may be proved against those who reject (Truth).

name: About Difficulties
subtopic1: Guidance’s Book to Return to Ward God
translation: The (Qur'an) is indeed the message, for thee and for thy people; and soon shall ye (all) be brought to account.

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
translation: Do they not then earnestly seek to understand the Qur'an, or are their hearts locked up by them?

name: Taqwa
translation: But verily this is a Message for the Allah-fearing.
And We certainly know that there are amongst you those that reject (it).

name: About Disbelievers
translation: But truly (Revelation) is a cause of sorrow for the Unbelievers.
But verily it is Truth of assured certainty.
Behold this is the Word that distinguishes (Good from Evil):
It is not a thing for amusement.

name: About Disbelievers
subtopic1: Guidance’s Book to Return to Ward God
subtopic2: a Book of exalted power  no falsehood can approach it
translation: Those who reject the Message when it comes to them (are not hidden from Us). And indeed it is a Book of exalted power.

name: On Knowledge
translation: Thus have We revealed it to be a judgment of authority in Arabic. Wert thou to follow their (vain) desires after the knowledge which hath reached thee, then wouldst thou find neither protector nor defender against Allah.

subtopic1: Guidance’s Book to Return to Ward God
translation: We know indeed that they say, "It is a man that teaches him." The tongue of him they wickedly point to is notably foreign, while this is Arabic, pure and clear.

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
translation: Thus have We sent this down - an arabic Qur'an - and explained therein in detail some of the warnings, in order that they may fear Allah, or that it may cause their remembrance (of Him).
In the perspicuous Arabic tongue.

name: On Wisdom
translation: (It is) a Qur'an in Arabic, without any crookedness (therein): in order that they may guard against Evil.

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
translation: We have made it a Qur'an in Arabic, that ye may be able to understand (and learn wisdom).

name: Prophet Musa (as)
translation: And before this, was the Book of Moses as a guide and a mercy: And this Book confirms (it) in the Arabic tongue; to admonish the unjust, and as Glad Tidings to those who do right.

name: Listening to Qur'an
translation: Say: "Whether ye believe in it or not, it is true that those who were given knowledge beforehand, when it is recited to them, fall down on their faces in humble prostration,
Then what Message, after that, will they believe in?

name: On Wisdom
subtopic1: Guidance’s Book to Return to Ward God
translation: A. L. R. These are the ayats of the Book of Wisdom.

name: Taqwa
mainTopic1: Coloration of Maker – Variegation of Creator
translation: These are Verses of the Wise Book,-

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
translation: By the Qur'an, full of Wisdom,-

name: On Wisdom
translation: And verily, it is in the Mother of the Book, in Our Presence, high (in dignity), full of wisdom.

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
subtopic1: Guidance’s Book to Return to Ward God
translation: Sad: By the Qur'an, Full of Admonition: (This is the Truth).

name: Business
translation: (Here is) a Book which We have sent down unto thee, full of blessings, that they may mediate on its Signs, and that men of understanding may receive admonition.

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
translation: Qaf: By the Glorious Qur'an (Thou art Allah's Messenger).

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
translation: Nay, this is a Glorious Qur'an,

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
translation: We have, without doubt, sent down the Message; and We will assuredly guard it (from corruption).
(Inscribed) in a Tablet Preserved!

name: Guidance
translation: Those who conceal the clear (Signs) We have sent down, and the Guidance, after We have made it clear for the people in the Book,-on them shall be Allah's curse, and the curse of those entitled to curse,-

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
translation: The Unbelievers say: "Listen not to this Qur'an, but talk at random in the midst of its (reading), that ye may gain the upper hand!"

name: Revenge
translation: Verily, We have made this (Qur'an) easy, in thy tongue, in order that they may give heed.

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
translation: And We have indeed made the Qur'an easy to understand and remember: then is there any that will receive admonition?

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
translation: And We have indeed made the Qur'an easy to understand and remember: then is there any that will receive admonition?

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
translation: And We have indeed made the Qur'an easy to understand and remember: then is there any that will receive admonition?
By the Book that makes things clear,-
By the Book that makes things clear;-
Verily in this is a Message for any that has a heart and understanding or who gives ear and earnestly witnesses (the truth).
This is no less than a Message to (all) the Worlds.

name: On The Universe
translation: But it is nothing less than a Message to all the worlds.
When whither go ye?

name: Dawah
subtopic1: Guidance’s Book to Return to Ward God
translation: Verily this is no less than a Message to (all) the Worlds:

name: Swearing
translation: Furthermore I call to witness the setting of the Stars,-

name: About Difficulties
translation: And that is indeed a mighty adjuration if ye but knew,-

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
translation: That this is indeed a qur'an Most Honourable,
In Book well-guarded,

subtopic2: none shall touch but those who are clean
translation: Which none shall touch but those who are clean:
Is it such a Message that ye would hold in light esteem?

name: Livelihood
translation: And have ye made it your livelihood that ye should declare it false?
By no means (should it be so)! For it is indeed a Message of instruction:
Therefore let whoso will, keep it in remembrance.

name: Generosity
translation: (It is) in Books held (greatly) in honour,
Exalted (in dignity), kept pure and holy,
(Written) by the hands of scribes-

name: Generosity
translation: Honourable and Pious and Just.

name: Obedience To Parents
translation: Allah doth blot out or confirm what He pleaseth: with Him is the Mother of the Book.
Wherein are laws (or decrees) right and straight.

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
subtopic2: their hearing and seeing is covered over
translation: When thou dost recite the Qur'an, We put, between thee and those who believe not in the Hereafter, a veil invisible:

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
subtopic2: their hearing and seeing is covered over
translation: And We put coverings over their hearts (and minds) lest they should understand the Qur'an, and deafness into their ears: when thou dost commemorate thy Lord and Him alone in the Qur'an, they turn on their backs, fleeing (from the Truth).

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
translation: (It is) a Qur'an which We have divided (into parts from time to time), in order that thou mightest recite it to men at intervals: We have revealed it by stages.

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
subtopic1: Guidance’s Book to Return to Ward God
translation: But when We have promulgated it, follow thou its recital (as promulgated):

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
translation: And when the Qur'an is read to them, they fall not prostrate,
(Their doom is) because Allah sent down the Book in truth but those who seek causes of dispute in the Book are in a schism Far (from the purpose).

It is He Who sent down to thee (step by step), in truth, the Book, confirming what went before it; and He sent down the Law (of Moses) and the Gospel (of Jesus) before this, as a guide to mankind, and He sent down the criterion (of judgment between right and wrong).

name: Zakat
translation: Say: "Shall I seek for judge other than Allah? - when He it is Who hath sent unto you the Book, explained in detail." They know full well, to whom We have given the Book, that it hath been sent down from thy Lord in truth. Never be then of those who doubt.

name: People of the Book
translation: Lest ye should say: "The Book was sent down to two Peoples before us, and for our part, we remained unacquainted with all that they learned by assiduous study:"

name: Taqwa
translation: A Book revealed unto thee,- So let thy heart be oppressed no more by any difficulty on that account,- that with it thou mightest warn (the erring) and teach the Believers).

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
translation: Follow (O men!) the revelation given unto you from your Lord, and follow not, as friends or protectors, other than Him. Little it is ye remember of admonition.
We have revealed for you (O men!) a book in which is a Message for you: will ye not then understand?
With it came down the spirit of Faith and Truth-
To thy heart and mind, that thou mayest admonish.
Without doubt it is (announced) in the mystic Books of former peoples.
Had We revealed it to any of the non-Arabs,
And had he recited it to them, they would not have believed in it.

name: Allah's Mercy
translation: And is it not enough for them that we have sent down to thee the Book which is rehearsed to them? Verily, in it is Mercy and a Reminder to those who believe.
Verily it is We Who have revealed the Book to thee in Truth: so serve Allah, offering Him sincere devotion.
Giving good news and admonition: yet most of them turn away, and so they hear not.

name: Listening to Qur'an
translation: Move not thy tongue concerning the (Qur'an) to make haste therewith.

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
translation: It is for Us to collect it and to promulgate it:

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
translation: Nay more, it is for Us to explain it (and make it clear):

name: Truth and Honesty
translation: Or they may say, "He forged it," Say, "Bring ye then ten suras forged, like unto it, and call (to your aid) whomsoever ye can, other than Allah!- If ye speak the truth!

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
translation: We have not sent down the Qur'an to thee to be (an occasion) for thy distress,

name: Zulm
subtopic1: Guidance’s Book to Return to Ward God
translation: But the misbelievers say: "Naught is this but a lie which he has forged, and others have helped him at it." In truth it is they who have put forward an iniquity and a falsehood.

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
translation: Those who reject Faith say: "Why is not the Qur'an revealed to him all at once? Thus (is it revealed), that We may strengthen thy heart thereby, and We have rehearsed it to thee in slow, well-arranged stages, gradually.

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
translation: The Unbelievers say: "We shall neither believe in this scripture nor in (any) that (came) before it." Couldst thou but see when the wrong-doers will be made to stand before their Lord, throwing back the word (of blame) on one another! Those who had been despised will say to the arrogant ones: "Had it not been for you, we should certainly have been believers!"

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
translation: Also, they say: "Why is not this Qur'an sent down to some leading man in either of the two (chief) cities?"

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
translation: But We have indeed made the Qur'an easy to understand and remember: then is there any that will receive admonition?

name: Qur'an Verses on the Qur'an
translation: It is We Who have sent down the Qur'an to thee by stages.
Nor is it the word of an evil spirit accursed.
By the (Winds) sent forth one after another (to man's profit);
As to these (Quraish), they say forsooth:
There is nothing beyond our first death, and we shall not be raised again.

name: Truth and Honesty
translation: Then bring (back) our forefathers, if what ye say is true!
What! Are they better than the people of Tubba and those who were before them? We destroyed them because they were guilty of sin.

name: About Disbelievers
translation: Are your Unbelievers, (O Quraish), better than they? Or have ye an immunity in the Sacred Books?
For the covenants (of security and safeguard enjoyed) by the Quraish,
Their covenants (covering) journeys by winter and summer,-
And We send the fecundating winds, then cause the rain to descend from the sky, therewith providing you with water (in abundance), though ye are not the guardians of its stores.
Even though, before they received (the rain) - just before this - they were dumb with despair!
(And Allah's Message is): "If they (the Pagans) had (only) remained on the (right) Way, We should certainly have bestowed on them Rain in abundance.

name: Rizq
mainTopic1: Allah is Sufficient for me; on Him do the Reliant Rely
translation: There is no moving creature on earth but its sustenance dependeth on Allah: He knoweth the time and place of its definite abode and its temporary deposit: All is in a clear Record.
Nor is there aught of the unseen, in heaven or earth, but is (recorded) in a clear record.
We already know how much of them the earth takes away: With Us is a record guarding (the full account).
Every matter, small and great, is on record.

name: Nafs
subtopic1: Desting – Fate – Decree – Pre – Destination – Divine
translation: No misfortune can happen on earth or in your souls but is recorded in a decree before We bring it into existence: That is truly easy for Allah:
And thou wilt see every sect bowing the knee: Every sect will be called to its Record: "This Day shall ye be recompensed for all that ye did!
This Our Record speaks about you with truth: For We were wont to put on Record all that ye did.
And his Companion will say: "Here is (his Record) ready with me!"
Then he that will be given his Record in his right hand will say: "Ah here! Read ye my Record!
I did really understand that my Account would (One Day) reach me!
And he that will be given his Record in his left hand, will say: "Ah! Would that my Record had not been given to me!
And that I had never realised how my account (stood)!

name: Qiyamah
translation: When the scrolls are laid open;
Nay! Surely the record of the wicked is (preserved) in Sijjin.
And what will explain to thee what Sijjin is?
(There is) a Register (fully) inscribed.
Then he who is given his Record in his right hand,
Soon will his account be taken by an easy reckoning,

name: On Happiness
translation: And he will turn to his people, rejoicing!
But he who is given his Record behind his back,-
About which they cannot agree.
Wert thou to follow the common run of those on earth, they will lead thee away from the way of Allah. They follow nothing but conjecture: they do nothing but lie.

name: Dunya
subtopic2: is not play and transient delight
translation: Such as took their religion to be mere amusement and play, and were deceived by the life of the world. That day shall We forget them as they forgot the meeting of this day of theirs, and as they were wont to reject Our signs.

name: On Lying
subtopic2: wickedness of attributing one`s own lying inventions to Allah
translation: Who doth more wrong than he who inventeth a lie against Allah or rejecteth His signs? But verily the wrong-doers never shall prosper.
As for those who divide their religion and break up into sects, thou hast no part in them in the least: their affair is with Allah: He will in the end tell them the truth of all that they did.
Those who split up their Religion, and become (mere) Sects,- each party rejoicing in that which is with itself!

name: Remembrance of Allah (swt)
translation: (Unbelievers) whose eyes had been under a veil from remembrance of Me, and who had been unable even to hear.

name: Remembrance of Allah (swt)
translation: Therefore shun those who turn away from Our Message and desire nothing but the life of this world.

name: Nafs
translation: And be ye not like those who forgot Allah; and He made them forget their own souls! Such are the rebellious transgressors!

name: Trials of Life
mainTopic1: Coloration of Maker – Variegation of Creator
translation: That We might try them by that (means). But if any turns away from the remembrance of his Lord, He will cause him to undergo a severe Penalty.

name: Dunya
translation: And who is more unjust than he who forbids that in places for the worship of Allah, Allah's name should be celebrated?-whose zeal is (in fact) to ruin them? It was not fitting that such should themselves enter them except in fear. For them there is nothing but disgrace in this world, and in the world to come, an exceeding torment.

name: Ungratefulness
translation: Then do ye remember Me; I will remember you. Be grateful to Me, and reject not Faith.

name: Remembrance of Allah (swt)
translation: He said: "O my Lord! Give me a Sign!" "Thy Sign," was the answer, "Shall be that thou shalt speak to no man for three days but with signals. Then celebrate the praises of thy Lord again and again, and glorify Him in the evening and in the morning."

name: Remembrance of Allah (swt)
translation: And do thou (O reader!) Bring thy Lord to remembrance in thy (very) soul, with humility and in reverence, without loudness in words, in the mornings and evenings; and be not thou of those who are unheedful.

name: Remembrance of Allah (swt)
translation: O ye who believe! When ye meet a force, be firm, and call Allah in remembrance much (and often); that ye may prosper:

Now, if they embark on a boat, they call on Allah, making their devotion sincerely (and exclusively) to Him; but when He has delivered them safely to (dry) land, behold, they give a share (of their worship to others)!-

name: Remembrance of Allah (swt)
mainTopic1: Coloration of Maker – Variegation of Creator
translation: O ye who believe! Celebrate the praises of Allah, and do this often;

name: On The Prayer
translation: And glorify the name of their Guardian-Lord, and (lift their hearts) in prayer.
See they not that they are tried every year once or twice? Yet they turn not in repentance, and they take no heed.
But any that (in this life) had repented, believed, and worked righteousness, will have hopes to be among those who achieve salvation.
Those who eschew Evil,- and fall not into its worship,- and turn to Allah (in repentance),- for them is Good News: so announce the Good News to My Servants,-

name: Nafs
translation: Let not the Unbelievers think that our respite to them is good for themselves: We grant them respite that they may grow in their iniquity: But they will have a shameful punishment.
They running forward with necks outstretched, their heads uplifted, their gaze returning not towards them, and their hearts a (gaping) void!
A (long) respite will I grant them: truly powerful is My Plan.
Therefore grant a delay to the Unbelievers: Give respite to them gently (for awhile).

name: Qiyamah
translation: No prophet could (ever) be false to his trust. If any person is so false, He shall, on the Day of Judgment, restore what he misappropriated; then shall every soul receive its due,- whatever it earned,- and none shall be dealt with unjustly.

name: Qiyamah
translation: Ah! These are the sort of men on whose behalf ye may contend in this world; but who will contend with Allah on their behalf on the Day of Judgment, or who will carry their affairs through?

name: Qiyamah
translation: The Sabbath was only made (strict) for those who disagreed (as to its observance); But Allah will judge between them on the Day of Judgment, as to their differences.

name: Qiyamah
translation: It will be on a Day when He will call you, and ye will answer (His call) with (words of) His praise, and ye will think that ye tarried but a little while!

name: Qiyamah
subtopic1: Desting – Fate – Decree – Pre – Destination – Divine
translation: There is not a population but We shall destroy it before the Day of Judgment or punish it with a dreadful Penalty: that is written in the (eternal) Record.

name: Qiyamah
translation: And everyone of them will come to Him singly on the Day of Judgment.

name: Qiyamah
translation: They will abide in this (state): and grievous will the burden be to them on that Day,-

name: Qiyamah
main_Topic2: Trumpet of the day of judgment
translation: The Day when the Trumpet will be sounded: that Day, We shall gather the sinful, blear-eyed (with terror).

name: Livelihood
translation: But whosoever turns away from My Message, verily for him is a life narrowed down, and We shall raise him up blind on the Day of Judgment.

name: Qiyamah
translation: Allah will judge between you on the Day of Judgment concerning the matters in which ye differ.
The Day that He will call on them, He will say: "Where are my 'partners'? whom ye imagined (to be such)?"

And from each people shall We draw a witness, and We shall say: "Produce your Proof": then shall they know that the Truth is in Allah (alone), and the (lies) which they invented will leave them in lurch.

name: Qiyamah
translation: But those endued with knowledge and faith will say: "Indeed ye did tarry, within Allah's Decree, to the Day of Resurrection, and this is the Day of Resurrection: but ye - ye were not aware!"

name: Qiyamah
translation: Serve ye what ye will besides him. Say: "Truly, those in loss are those who lose their own souls and their People on the Day of Judgment: Ah! that is indeed the (real and) evident Loss!

name: Qiyamah
translation: Is, then, one who has to fear the brunt of the Penalty on the Day of Judgment (and receive it) on his face, (like one guarded therefrom)? It will be said to the wrong-doers: "Taste ye (the fruits of) what ye earned!"

name: Qiyamah
translation: In the end will ye (all), on the Day of Judgment, settle your disputes in the presence of your Lord.

name: Qiyamah
translation: Even if the wrong-doers had all that there is on earth, and as much more, (in vain) would they offer it for ransom from the pain of the Penalty on the Day of Judgment: but something will confront them from Allah, which they could never have counted upon!

name: Qiyamah
translation: When we give him a taste of some Mercy from Ourselves, after some adversity has touched him, he is sure to say, "This is due to my (merit): I think not that the Hour (of Judgment) will (ever) be established; but if I am brought back to my Lord, I have (much) good (stored) in His sight!" But We will show the Unbelievers the truth of all that they did, and We shall give them the taste of a severe Penalty.

name: Qiyamah
translation: And thou wilt see them brought forward to the (Penalty), in a humble frame of mind because of (their) disgrace, (and) looking with a stealthy glance. And the Believers will say: "Those are indeed in loss, who have given to perdition their own selves and those belonging to them on the Day of Judgment. Behold! Truly the Wrong-doers are in a lasting Penalty!"

name: Qiyamah
translation: Hastening, with eyes transfixed, towards the Caller!- "Hard is this Day!", the Unbelievers will say.

name: Qiyamah
translation: Or have ye Covenants with Us to oath, reaching to the Day of Judgment, (providing) that ye shall have whatever ye shall demand?

main_Topic2: Trumpet of the day of judgment
translation: The Day that the Trumpet shall be sounded, and ye shall come forth in crowds;
Some faces that Day will be beaming,
Laughing, rejoicing.
Blackness will cover them:

name: About Disbelievers
translation: Such will be the Rejecters of Allah, the doers of iniquity.

name: Qiyamah
translation: By the promised Day (of Judgment);

name: Creation
translation: Or created matter which, in your minds, is hardest (to be raised up),- (Yet shall ye be raised up)! then will they say: "Who will cause us to return?" Say: "He who created you first!" Then will they wag their heads towards thee, and say, "When will that be?" Say, "May be it will be quite soon!
From the (earth) did We create you, and into it shall We return you, and from it shall We bring you out once again.

name: Ungratefulness
translation: It is He Who gave you life, will cause you to die, and will again give you life: Truly man is a most ungrateful creature!
And the (Unbelievers) must indeed have passed by the town on which was rained a shower of evil: did they not then see it (with their own eyes)? But they fear not the Resurrection.

name: Qiyamah
translation: Does man think that We cannot assemble his bones?

name: Qiyamah
translation: Nay, We are able to put together in perfect order the very tips of his fingers.

name: Ego
translation: And they (sometimes) say: "There is nothing except our life on this earth, and never shall we be raised up again."

name: Hajar
translation: Say: "(Nay!) be ye stones or iron,
Man says: "What! When I am dead, shall I then be raised up alive?"
Does he promise that when ye die and become dust and bones, ye shall be brought forth (again)?
Far, very far is that which ye are promised!

name: On Lying
translation: He is only a man who invents a lie against Allah, but we are not the ones to believe in him!
They say: "What! when we die and become dust and bones, could we really be raised up again?
Such things have been promised to us and to our fathers before! they are nothing but tales of the ancients!

name: About Disbelievers
translation: The Unbelievers say: "What! when we become dust,- we and our fathers,- shall we really be raised (from the dead)?
It is true we were promised this,- we and our fathers before (us): these are nothing but tales of the ancients.
What! when we die, and become dust and bones, shall we (then) be raised up (again)
And also our fathers of old?

name: Dunya
translation: And they say: "What is there but our life in this world? We shall die and we live, and nothing but time can destroy us." But of that they have no knowledge: they merely conjecture:

name: Truth and Honesty
translation: And when Our Clear Signs are rehearsed to them their argument is nothing but this: They say, "Bring (back) our forefathers, if what ye say is true!"
What! When we die and become dust, (shall we live again?) That is a (sort of) return far (from our understanding).

name: About Disbelievers
translation: The Unbelievers think that they will not be raised up (for Judgment). Say: "Yea, By my Lord, Ye shall surely be raised up: then shall ye be told (the truth) of all that ye did. And that is easy for Allah."
And they (came to) think as ye thought, that Allah would not raise up any one (to Judgment).

name: Qiyamah
translation: They say (now): "What! shall we indeed be returned to (our) former state?

name: Qiyamah
translation: What! - when we shall have become rotten bones?

name: Qiyamah
translation: They say: "It would, in that case, be a return with loss!"
Concerning what are they disputing?
Concerning the Great News,
Verily, they shall soon (come to) know!
Verily, verily they shall soon (come to) know!

name: Ego
translation: They say: "Why does he not bring us a sign from his Lord?" Has not a Clear Sign come to them of all that was in the former Books of revelation?

name: About Arrogance
translation: The leaders of the arrogant party among his people said to those who were reckoned powerless - those among them who believed: "know ye indeed that Salih is a messenger from his Lord?" They said: "We do indeed believe in the revelation which hath been sent through him."

main_Topic2: according to best of deeds and more
subtopic2: according to best of deeds and more
translation: Those who believe and work righteous deeds,- from them shall We blot out all evil (that may be) in them, and We shall reward them according to the best of their deeds.

name: On Knowledge
main_Topic2: according to best of deeds and more
subtopic2: according to best of deeds and more
translation: Until, when they come (before the Judgment-seat), (Allah) will say: "Did ye reject My Signs, though ye comprehended them not in knowledge, or what was it ye did?"

subtopic2: according to best of deeds and more
translation: Taking joy in the things which their Lord gives them, because, before then, they lived a good life.

main_Topic2: according to best of deeds and more
subtopic2: according to best of deeds and more
for good  no reward other than good
translation: Is there any Reward for Good - other than Good?
Then (there will be) the Companions of the Right Hand;- What will be the Companions of the Right Hand?
And if he be of the Companions of the Right Hand,
Except the Companions of the Right Hand.
(They will be) in Gardens (of Delight): they will question each other,
And (ask) of the Sinners:

name: Family Ties / Kinship
translation: Such are the Companions of the Right Hand.
And those who believe and work righteous deeds,- them shall We admit to the company of the Righteous.
As for the Righteous, they will be in bliss;
Truly the Righteous will be in Bliss:
Thou wilt recognise in their faces the beaming brightness of Bliss.

name: Taqwa
translation: But those most devoted to Allah shall be removed far from it,-
And soon will they attain (complete) satisfaction.

If only thou couldst see when the guilty ones will bend low their heads before their Lord, (saying:) "Our Lord! We have seen and we have heard: Now then send us back (to the world): we will work righteousness: for we do indeed (now) believe."

name: Taqwa
translation: Or enjoins Righteousness?

name: Hajar
translation: The Companions of the Rocky Tract also rejected the messengers:
We sent them Our Signs, but they persisted in turning away from them.
But the (mighty) Blast seized them of a morning,
With the help of Allah. He helps whom He will, and He is exalted in might, most merciful.

name: Taqwa
translation: Between them and the Cities on which We had poured our blessings, We had placed Cities in prominent positions, and between them We had appointed stages of journey in due proportion: "Travel therein, secure, by night and by day."

name: Taqwa
translation: But they said: "Our Lord! Place longer distances between our journey-stages": but they wronged themselves (therein). At length We made them as a tale (that is told), and We dispersed them all in scattered fragments. Verily in this are Signs for every (soul that is) patiently constant and grateful.

name: About Disbelievers
translation: The Arrogant party said: "For our part, we reject what ye believe in."
So Salih left them, saying: "O my people! I did indeed convey to you the message for which I was sent by my Lord: I gave you good counsel, but ye love not good counsellors!"

name: People of Thamud
translation: We sent (aforetime), to the Thamud, their brother Salih, saying, "Serve Allah": But behold, they became two factions quarrelling with each other.

name: Forgiveness
translation: He said: "O my people! why ask ye to hasten on the evil in preference to the good? If only ye ask Allah for forgiveness, ye may hope to receive mercy.

name: Trials of Life
translation: They said: "Ill omen do we augur from thee and those that are with thee". He said: "Your ill omen is with Allah; yea, ye are a people under trial."

name: On Deception
translation: They plotted and planned, but We too planned, even while they perceived it not.
Then see what was the end of their plot!- this, that We destroyed them and their people, all (of them).
Now such were their houses, - in utter ruin, - because they practised wrong-doing. Verily in this is a Sign for people of knowledge.

name: Shaitan / Satan
translation: Those who devour usury will not stand except as stand one whom the Evil one by his touch Hath driven to madness. That is because they say: "Trade is like usury," but Allah hath permitted trade and forbidden usury. Those who after receiving direction from their Lord, desist, shall be pardoned for the past; their case is for Allah (to judge); but those who repeat (The offence) are companions of the Fire: They will abide therein (for ever).

name: Prophet Adam (as)
translation: Then We said: "O Adam! verily, this is an enemy to thee and thy wife: so let him not get you both out of the Garden, so that thou art landed in misery.

name: Ego
subtopic2: has no authority over Allah`s servants
translation: For over My servants no authority shalt thou have, except such as put themselves in the wrong and follow thee.

name: Cursing
translation: Allah did curse him, but he said: "I will take of Thy servants a portion Marked off;
But he did lead astray a great multitude of you. Did ye not, then, understand?

name: About Difficulties
translation: He it is Who enableth you to traverse through land and sea; so that ye even board ships;- they sail with them with a favourable wind, and they rejoice thereat; then comes a stormy wind and the waves come to them from all sides, and they think they are being overwhelmed: they cry unto Allah, sincerely offering (their) duty unto Him saying, "If thou dost deliver us from this, we shall truly show our gratitude!"
And by the Ocean filled with Swell;-
He has let free the two bodies of flowing water, meeting together:

name: Jannah
translation: If any do deeds of righteousness,- be they male or female - and have faith, they will enter Heaven, and not the least injustice will be done to them.

name: Hypocrites
translation: The Hypocrites, men and women, (have an understanding) with each other: They enjoin evil, and forbid what is just, and are close with their hands. They have forgotten Allah; so He hath forgotten them. Verily the Hypocrites are rebellious and perverse.
Then We draw it in towards Ourselves,- a contraction by easy stages.
And among His Signs are the ships, smooth-running through the ocean, (tall) as mountains.
And His are the Ships sailing smoothly through the seas, lofty as mountains:

name: Ungratefulness
translation: When a wave covers them like the canopy (of clouds), they call to Allah, offering Him sincere devotion. But when He has delivered them safely to land, there are among them those that halt between (right and wrong). But none reject Our Signs except only a perfidious ungrateful (wretch)!
And We have created for them similar (vessels) on which they ride.
If it were Our Will, We could drown them: then would there be no helper (to hear their cry), nor could they be delivered,
Verily, in this is a Sign: but most of them do not believe.
On the earth are signs for those of assured Faith,
And (silver) doors to their houses, and thrones (of silver) on which they could recline,

name: On Sin
translation: Eschew all sin, open or secret: those who earn sin will get due recompense for their "earnings."

name: Taqwa
translation: And remember We took your covenant and We raised above you (The towering height) of Mount (Sinai): (Saying): "Hold firmly to what We have given you and bring (ever) to remembrance what is therein: Perchance ye may fear Allah."
Say: "It is Allah I serve, with my sincere (and exclusive) devotion:

name: Truth and Honesty
translation: And (in all sincerity) testifies to the best,-

name: Nafs
translation: It is Allah that takes the souls (of men) at death; and those that die not (He takes) during their sleep: those on whom He has passed the decree of death, He keeps back (from returning to life), but the rest He sends (to their bodies) for a term appointed verily in this are Signs for those who reflect.

name: Revenge
translation: Then watch thou for the Day that the sky will bring forth a kind of smoke (or mist) plainly visible,
Enveloping the people: this will be a Penalty Grievous.
(They will say:) "Our Lord! remove the Penalty from us, for we do really believe!"
To David We gave Solomon (for a son),- How excellent in Our service! Ever did he turn (to Us)!

name: Trials of Life
translation: And We did try Solomon: We placed on his throne a body (without life); but he did turn (to Us in true devotion):
(It was Our power that made) the violent (unruly) wind flow (tamely) for Solomon, to his order, to the land which We had blessed: for We do know all things.
Then We subjected the wind to his power, to flow gently to his order, Whithersoever he willed,-
Such are Our Bounties: whether thou bestow them (on others) or withhold them, no account will be asked.
And sons to be by his side!-
And he fails that corrupts it!
There is no soul but has a protector over it.

name: Nafs
translation: (To the righteous soul will be said:) "O (thou) soul, in (complete) rest and satisfaction!
Enter thou, then, among My devotees!

name: Qiyamah
translation: And I do call to witness the self-reproaching spirit: (Eschew Evil).

name: Zakat
main_Topic2: Spending in the cause of Allah
translation: O ye who believe! Give of the good things which ye have (honourably) earned, and of the fruits of the earth which We have produced for you, and do not even aim at getting anything which is bad, in order that out of it ye may give away something, when ye yourselves would not receive it except with closed eyes. And know that Allah is Free of all wants, and worthy of all praise.

name: On Wisdom
translation: He granteth wisdom to whom He pleaseth; and he to whom wisdom is granted receiveth indeed a benefit overflowing; but none will grasp the Message but men of understanding.

main_Topic2: Spending in the cause of Allah
translation: Say: "Spend (for the cause) willingly or unwillingly: not from you will it be accepted: for ye are indeed a people rebellious and wicked."

name: Zakat
main_Topic2: Spending in the cause of Allah
