translation: The only reasons why their contributions are not accepted are: that they reject Allah and His Messenger; that they come to prayer without earnestness; and that they offer contributions unwillingly.

name: On Animals
translation: The parable of those who take protectors other than Allah is that of the spider, who builds (to itself) a house; but truly the flimsiest of houses is the spider's house;- if they but knew.

name: On Knowledge
translation: They ask thee concerning the Spirit (of inspiration). Say: "The Spirit (cometh) by command of my Lord: of knowledge it is only a little that is communicated to you, (O men!)"
In them (each) will be two Springs flowing (free);
In them (each) will be two Springs pouring forth water in continuous abundance:
And what will explain to thee what the Night-Visitant is?-
By the Star when it goes down,-
And We should have shown them the Straight Way.
Those who reject our signs are deaf and dumb,- in the midst of darkness profound: whom Allah willeth, He leaveth to wander: whom He willeth, He placeth on the way that is straight.
This is the way of thy Lord, leading straight: We have detailed the signs for those who receive admonition.
(Allah) said: "This (way of My sincere servants) is indeed a way that leads straight to Me.

name: Taqwa
translation: Say: "Each one (of us) is waiting: wait ye, therefore, and soon shall ye know who it is that is on the straight and even way, and who it is that has received Guidance."

name: Guidance
mainTopic1: Coloration of Maker – Variegation of Creator
translation: To every People have We appointed rites and ceremonies which they must follow: let them not then dispute with thee on the matter, but do thou invite (them) to thy Lord: for thou art assuredly on the Right Way.

name: Dawah
translation: But verily thou callest them to the Straight Way;
And verily those who believe not in the Hereafter are deviating from that Way.
And that ye should worship Me, (for that) this was the Straight Way?
Is then one who walks headlong, with his face grovelling, better guided,- or one who walks evenly on a Straight Way?
Verily, (the ends) ye strive for are diverse.
By the Day as it shows up (the Sun's) glory;

name: Truth and Honesty
translation: And if ye are in doubt as to what We have revealed from time to time to Our servant, then produce a Sura like thereunto; and call your witnesses or helpers (If there are any) besides Allah, if your (doubts) are true.

name: Truth and Honesty
translation: Let them then produce a recital like unto it,- If (it be) they speak the truth!
But teach (thy Message) for teaching benefits the Believers.
The (mighty) Blast overtook the wrong-doers, and they lay prostrate in their homes before the morning,-

name: People of Thamud
translation: As if they had never dwelt and flourished there. Ah! Behold! for the Thamud rejected their Lord and Cherisher! Ah! Behold! removed (from sight) were the Thamud!

name: People of Thamud
translation: As to the Thamud, We gave them Guidance, but they preferred blindness (of heart) to Guidance: so the stunning Punishment of humiliation seized them, because of what they had earned.

name: People of Thamud
translation: And in the Thamud (was another Sign): Behold, they were told, "Enjoy (your brief day) for a little while!"
Then they could not even stand (on their feet), nor could they help themselves.
For they said: "What! a man! a Solitary one from among ourselves! shall we follow such a one? Truly should we then be straying in mind, and mad!

name: On Lying
translation: Is it that the Message is sent to him, of all people amongst us? Nay, he is a liar, an insolent one!

name: On Lying
translation: Ah! they will know on the morrow, which is the liar, the insolent one!
Ah! how (terrible) was My Penalty and My Warning!
For We sent against them a single Mighty Blast, and they became like the dry stubble used by one who pens cattle.

name: People of Thamud
translation: And with the Thamud (people), who cut out (huge) rocks in the valley?-

name: People of Thamud
translation: The Thamud (people) rejected (their prophet) through their inordinate wrong-doing,
Behold, the most wicked man among them was deputed (for impiety).

name: On Sin
translation: Then they rejected him (as a false prophet), and they hamstrung her. So their Lord, on account of their crime, obliterated their traces and made them equal (in destruction, high and low)!
So they stayed in their Cave three hundred years, and (some) add nine (more)

name: Qiyamah
translation: In whispers will they consult each other: "Yet tarried not longer than ten (Days);

name: Qiyamah
translation: We know best what they will say, when their leader most eminent in conduct will say: "Ye tarried not longer than a day!"
He will say: "What number of years did ye stay on earth?"
They will say: "We stayed a day or part of a day: but ask those who keep account."
He will say: "Ye stayed not but a little,- if ye had only known!

name: Qiyamah
translation: On the Day that the Hour (of Reckoning) will be established, the transgressors will swear that they tarried not but an hour: thus were they used to being deluded!

name: On Happiness
translation: By (the Token of) Time (through the ages),
Verily Man is in loss,

name: Business
translation: O ye who believe! Shall I lead you to a bargain that will save you from a grievous Penalty?-

name: Taqwa
subtopic2: Travel through the earth and see
translation: Do they not travel through the land, so that their hearts (and minds) may thus learn wisdom and their ears may thus learn to hear? Truly it is not their eyes that are blind, but their hearts which are in their breasts.

subtopic2: Travel through the earth and see
translation: Say: "Go ye through the earth and see what has been the end of those guilty (of sin)."

subtopic2: Travel through the earth and see
translation: Say: "Travel through the earth and see what was the end of those before (you): Most of them worshipped others besides Allah."

name: Strength
subtopic2: Travel through the earth and see
translation: Do they not travel through the earth and see what was the End of those before them? They were more numerous than these and superior in strength and in the traces (they have left) in the land: Yet all that they accomplished was of no profit to them.

name: About Disbelievers
subtopic2: Travel through the earth and see
translation: Do they not travel through the earth, and see what was the End of those before them (who did evil)? Allah brought utter destruction on them, and similar (fates await) those who reject Allah.
And the parable of an evil Word is that of an evil tree: It is torn up by the root from the surface of the earth: it has no stability.

name: Trials of Life
translation: Or do ye think that ye shall enter the Garden (of bliss) without such (trials) as came to those who passed away before you? they encountered suffering and adversity, and were so shaken in spirit that even the Messenger and those of faith who were with him cried: "When (will come) the help of Allah?" Ah! Verily, the help of Allah is (always) near!

name: About Difficulties
translation: Thus did We try some of them by comparison with others, that they should say: "Is it these then that Allah hath favoured from amongst us?" Doth not Allah know best those who are grateful?

name: Ungratefulness
translation: If We give man a taste of Mercy from Ourselves, and then withdraw it from him, behold! he is in despair and (falls into) blasphemy.

name: Hardship
translation: But if We give him a taste of (Our) favours after adversity hath touched him, he is sure to say, "All evil has departed from me:" Behold! he falls into exultation and pride.

name: Adversity
translation: That which is on earth we have made but as a glittering show for the earth, in order that We may test them - as to which of them are best in conduct.

name: Trials of Life
translation: I know not but that it may be a trial for you, and a grant of (worldly) livelihood (to you) for a time.

name: Trials of Life
translation: Deem not the summons of the Messenger among yourselves like the summons of one of you to another: Allah doth know those of you who slip away under shelter of some excuse: then let those beware who withstand the Messenger's order, lest some trial befall them, or a grievous penalty be inflicted on them.

name: Qiyamah
main_Topic2: Trumpet of the day of judgment
translation: On that day We shall leave them to surge like waves on one another: the trumpet will be blown, and We shall collect them all together.

name: Qiyamah
main_Topic2: Trumpet of the day of judgment
translation: Then when the Trumpet is blown, there will be no more relationships between them that Day, nor will one ask after another!

name: About Difficulties
main_Topic2: Trumpet of the day of judgment
translation: And the Trumpet shall be blown: that will be the Day whereof Warning (had been given).

name: Qiyamah
main_Topic2: Trumpet of the day of judgment
translation: Finally, when the Trumpet is sounded,

name: Vanity
translation: Say: "The Truth has arrived, and Falsehood neither creates anything new, nor restores anything."
Remember that morning Thou didst leave Thy household (early) to post the faithful at their stations for battle: And Allah heareth and knoweth all things:

name: About Disbelievers
translation: That He might cut off a fringe of the Unbelievers or expose them to infamy, and they should then be turned back, frustrated of their purpose.
Not for thee, (but for Allah), is the decision: Whether He turn in mercy to them, or punish them; for they are indeed wrong-doers.

name: Nafs
translation: What! When a single disaster smites you, although ye smote (your enemies) with one twice as great, do ye say?- "Whence is this?" Say (to them): "It is from yourselves: For Allah hath power over all things."

name: Grief
translation: Let not those grieve thee who rush headlong into Unbelief: Not the least harm will they do to Allah: Allah's plan is that He will give them no portion in the Hereafter, but a severe punishment.

name: About Disbelievers
translation: Let not the strutting about of the Unbelievers through the land deceive thee:

name: About Disbelievers
translation: They are in truth (equally) unbelievers; and we have prepared for unbelievers a humiliating punishment.
When Our Signs are rehearsed to them, they say: "We have heard this (before): if we wished, we could say (words) like these: these are nothing but tales of the ancients."

name: Forgiveness
translation: But Allah was not going to send them a penalty whilst thou wast amongst them; nor was He going to send it whilst they could ask for pardon.

name: Forgiveness
translation: Say to the Unbelievers, if (now) they desist (from Unbelief), their past would be forgiven them; but if they persist, the punishment of those before them is already (a matter of warning for them).
Then what is the matter with them that they turn away from admonition?-

name: Hope
translation: As if they were affrighted asses,
Fleeing from a lion!
Forsooth, each one of them wants to be given scrolls (of revelation) spread out!
By no means! But they fear not the Hereafter,
But on the contrary, he rejected Truth and turned away!
Then did he stalk to his family in full conceit!
Woe to thee, (O men!), yea, woe!
Again, Woe to thee, (O men!), yea, woe!

name: About Disbelievers
translation: Verily, We have warned you of a Penalty near, the Day when man will see (the deeds) which his hands have sent forth, and the Unbeliever will say, "Woe unto me! Would that I were (metre) dust!"

name: About Disbelievers
translation: Say: O ye that reject Faith!
I worship not that which ye worship,
Nor will ye worship that which I worship.
And I will not worship that which ye have been wont to worship,
Nor will ye worship that which I worship.
We (too) shall turn to (confusion) their hearts and their eyes, even as they refused to believe in this in the first instance: We shall leave them in their trespasses, to wander in distraction.
See what similes they strike for thee: but they have gone astray, and never can they find a way.
See what kinds of comparisons they make for thee! But they have gone astray, and never a way will they be able to find!

name: On Justice
translation: As to those who believe not in the Hereafter, We have made their deeds pleasing in their eyes; and so they wander about in distraction.

name: Revenge
translation: For any whom Allah leaves astray, there is no protector thereafter. And thou wilt see the Wrong-doers, when in sight of the Penalty, Say: "Is there any way (to effect) a return?"
Canst thou then make the deaf to hear, or give direction to the blind or to such as (wander) in manifest error?

name: On Deception
translation: So leave them to babble and play (with vanities) until they meet that Day of theirs, which they have been promised.
That play (and paddle) in shallow trifles.

subtopic2: summoned to bow but do not
translation: Their eyes will be cast down,- ignominy will cover them; seeing that they had been summoned aforetime to bow in adoration, while they were whole, (and had refused).

name: Qiyamah
translation: Their eyes lowered in dejection,- ignominy covering them (all over)! such is the Day the which they are promised!
For he who hateth thee, he will be cut off (from Future Hope).

name: About Disbelievers
translation: The parable of those who reject Faith is as if one were to shout Like a goat-herd, to things that listen to nothing but calls and cries: Deaf, dumb, and blind, they are void of wisdom.

name: Ego
translation: He will say: "O my Lord! why hast Thou raised me up blind, while I had sight (before)?"

name: Dawah
translation: Truly thou canst not cause the dead to listen, nor canst thou cause the deaf to hear the call, (especially) when they turn back in retreat.
Then the (whole) story that Day will seem obscure to them (like light to the blind) and they will not be able (even) to question each other.
So verily thou canst not make the dead to hear, nor canst thou make the deaf to hear the call, when they show their backs and turn away.
Nor canst thou lead back the blind from their straying: only those wilt thou make to hear, who believe in Our signs and submit (their wills in Islam).

name: About Arrogance
translation: When Our Signs are rehearsed to such a one, he turns away in arrogance, as if he heard them not, as if there were deafness in both his ears: announce to him a grievous Penalty.
Then woe that Day to those that treat (Truth) as Falsehood;-
Nay! But ye do reject Right and Judgment!
Woe, that Day, to those that deny-
Those that deny the Day of Judgment.
And none can deny it but the Transgressor beyond bounds the Sinner!
When Our Signs are rehearsed to him, he says, "Tales of the ancients!"

name: On Happiness
translation: Truly, did he go about among his people, rejoicing!
Truly, did he think that he would not have to return (to Us)!

name: Zakat
translation: Seest thou one who denies the Judgment (to come)?
Man does not weary of asking for good (things), but if ill touches him, he gives up all hope (and) is lost in despair.

name: About Disbelievers
translation: O ye who believe! If ye obey the Unbelievers, they will drive you back on your heels, and ye will turn back (from Faith) to your own loss.

name: Taqwa
subtopic2: do not take for friends or helpers
translation: Let not the believers Take for friends or helpers Unbelievers rather than believers: if any do that, in nothing will there be help from Allah: except by way of precaution, that ye may Guard yourselves from them. But Allah cautions you (To remember) Himself; for the final goal is to Allah.

name: About Disbelievers
subtopic2: do not take for friends or helpers
translation: If they were to get the better of you, they would behave to you as enemies, and stretch forth their hands and their tongues against you for evil: and they desire that ye should reject the Truth.

name: About Disbelievers
subtopic1: Guidance’s Book to Return to Ward God
translation: If We had sent unto thee a written (message) on parchment, so that they could touch it with their hands, the Unbelievers would have been sure to say: "This is nothing but obvious magic!"

name: About Disbelievers
translation: Of them there are some who (pretend to) listen to thee; but We have thrown veils on their hearts, So they understand it not, and deafness in their ears; if they saw every one of the signs, not they will believe in them; in so much that when they come to thee, they (but) dispute with thee; the Unbelievers say: "These are nothing but tales of the ancients."
And they say: "Tales of the ancients, which he has caused to be written: and they are dictated before him morning and evening."
Or (Why) has not a treasure been bestowed on him, or why has he (not) a garden for enjoyment? The wicked say: "Ye follow none other than a man bewitched."
Truly dost thou marvel, while they ridicule,
And, when they are admonished, pay no heed,-
And say, "This is nothing but evident sorcery!
We never heard (the like) of this among the people of these latter days: this is nothing but a made-up tale!

name: On Deception
translation: What! has the Message been sent to him - (Of all persons) among us?... but they are in doubt concerning My (Own) Message! Nay, they have not yet tasted My Punishment!
Those who reject the Book and the (revelations) with which We sent our messengers: but soon shall they know,-

name: Guidance
translation: This is (true) Guidance and for those who reject the Signs of their Lord, is a grievous Penalty of abomination.

name: About Disbelievers
translation: But they wonder that there has come to them a Warner from among themselves. So the Unbelievers say: "This is a wonderful thing!
Say thou: "Await ye!- I too will wait along with you!"
Is it that their faculties of understanding urge them to this, or are they but a people transgressing beyond bounds?

name: Allah knows the unseen
translation: Or that the Unseen in it their hands, and they write it down?

name: About Disbelievers
translation: Or do they intend a plot (against thee)? But those who defy Allah are themselves involved in a Plot!
Then said he: "This is nothing but magic, derived from of old;
This is nothing but the word of a mortal!
What then is the matter with them, that they believe not?-

name: About Disbelievers
translation: But on the contrary the Unbelievers reject (it).
Seest thou one who forbids-
Does every man of them long to enter the Garden of Bliss?
By no means! For We have created them out of the (base matter) they know!

subtopic2: fuel for the Fire (Companions of the Fire)
translation: They will then confess their sins: but far will be (Forgiveness) from the Companions of the Blazing Fire!
Those are they whose hearts, ears, and eyes Allah has sealed up, and they take no heed.
Thus does Allah seal up the hearts of those who understand not.

name: Swearing
subtopic2: takes as his god his own desire
their hearing and seeing is covered over
translation: Then seest thou such a one as takes as his god his own vain desire? Allah has, knowing (him as such), left him astray, and sealed his hearing and his heart (and understanding), and put a cover on his sight. Who, then, will guide him after Allah (has withdrawn Guidance)? Will ye not then receive admonition?
By no means! but on their hearts is the stain of the (ill) which they do!

name: Mothers
translation: Those who resist Allah and His Messenger will be humbled to dust, as were those before them: for We have already sent down Clear Signs. And the Unbelievers (will have) a humiliating Penalty,-

name: Revenge
translation: Those who resist Allah and His Messenger will be among those most humiliated.
Those in sin used to laugh at those who believed,
And whenever they passed by them, used to wink at each other (in mockery);
And when they returned to their own people, they would return jesting;
And whenever they saw them, they would say, "Behold! These are the people truly astray!"
But they had not been sent as keepers over them!

name: About Disbelievers
translation: But on this Day the Believers will laugh at the Unbelievers:

name: About Disbelievers
translation: Will not the Unbelievers have been paid back for what they did?

name: Nafs
translation: They are the ones who have lost their own souls: and the (fancies) they invented have left them in the lurch!

name: Guidance
translation: The arrogant ones will say to those who had been despised: "Was it we who kept you back from Guidance after it reached you? Nay, rather, it was ye who transgressed.

name: About Disbelievers
translation: Those who had been despised will say to the arrogant ones: "Nay! it was a plot (of yours) by day and by night: Behold! Ye (constantly) ordered us to be ungrateful to Allah and to attribute equals to Him!" They will declare (their) repentance when they see the Penalty: We shall put yokes on the necks of the Unbelievers: It would only be a requital for their (ill) Deeds.

name: Jinn
translation: And the Unbelievers will say: "Our Lord! Show us those, among Jinns and men, who misled us: We shall crush them beneath our feet, so that they become the vilest (before all)."
Mighty indeed were the plots which they made, but their plots were (well) within the sight of Allah, even though they were such as to shake the hills!
For he thought and he plotted;-
And woe to him! How he plotted!-
Yea, Woe to him; How he plotted!-
As for them, they are but plotting a scheme,
And I am planning a scheme.

name: Backbiting
translation: A slanderer, going about with calumnies,

subtopic2: summoned to bow but do not
translation: The Day that the shin shall be laid bare, and they shall be summoned to bow in adoration, but they shall not be able,-

subtopic2: summoned to bow but do not
translation: And when it is said to them, "Prostrate yourselves!" they do not so.

name: About Disbelievers
translation: Those who reject Allah and hinder (men) from the Path of Allah,- their deeds will Allah render astray (from their mark).

name: About Disbelievers
translation: But those who reject (Allah),- for them is destruction, and (Allah) will render their deeds astray (from their mark).
That is because they hate the Revelation of Allah; so He has made their deeds fruitless.

subtopic2: their hearing and seeing is covered over
translation: And We have put a bar in front of them and a bar behind them, and further, We have covered them up; so that they cannot see.

subtopic2: their hearing and seeing is covered over
translation: They say: "Our hearts are under veils, (concealed) from that to which thou dost invite us, and in our ears in a deafness, and between us and thee is a screen: so do thou (what thou wilt); for us, we shall do (what we will!)"
So turn away from them: not thine is the blame.

name: Forgiveness
translation: Those who reject Allah, and hinder (men) from the Path of Allah, then die rejecting Allah,- Allah will not forgive them.
We have put yokes round their necks right up to their chins, so that their heads are forced up (and they cannot see).

name: Rizq
translation: Who believe in the Unseen, are steadfast in prayer, and spend out of what We have provided for them;

name: Taqwa
translation: O ye who believe! Fear Allah, and give up what remains of your demand for usury, if ye are indeed believers.

name: Business
translation: If ye do it not, Take notice of war from Allah and His Messenger: But if ye turn back, ye shall have your capital sums: Deal not unjustly, and ye shall not be dealt with unjustly.

name: Taqwa
translation: O ye who believe! Devour not usury, doubled and multiplied; but fear Allah; that ye may (really) prosper.

name: Sodomy
translation: For he commands you what is evil and shameful, and that ye should say of Allah that of which ye have no knowledge.

name: Zina
translation: Nor come nigh to adultery: for it is a shameful (deed) and an evil, opening the road (to other evils).

name: On Sin
translation: O ye who believe! when ye meet the Unbelievers in hostile array, never turn your backs to them.
See ye the water which ye drink?
Say: "See ye?- If your stream be some morning lost (in the underground earth), who then can supply you with clear-flowing water?"
And made therein mountains standing firm, lofty (in stature); and provided for you water sweet (and wholesome)?
For him is Entertainment with Boiling Water.

name: Family Ties / Kinship
translation: But he hath made no haste on the path that is steep.

name: Family Ties / Kinship
translation: And what will explain to thee the path that is steep?-

name: Prophet Isaac (as)
translation: And those that lift and bear away heavy weights;
And those that flow with ease and gentleness;
And those that distribute and apportion by Command;-
Which then blow violently in tempestuous Gusts,
And scatter (things) far and wide;
Then separate them, one from another,
Then spread abroad a Message,
Whether of Justification or of Warning;-

name: On Wisdom
translation: When he reached full age, and was firmly established (in life), We bestowed on him wisdom and knowledge: for thus do We reward those who do good.

name: Qiyamah
translation: By one that witnesses, and the subject of the witness;-

name: On Lying
translation: Why did they not bring four witnesses to prove it? When they have not brought the witnesses, such men, in the sight of Allah, (stand forth) themselves as liars!

name: Music
translation: Do ye then wonder at this recital?

name: Revenge
translation: So We exacted retribution from them. They were both on an open highway, plain to see.

name: Dunya
translation: Those who rest not their hope on their meeting with Us, but are pleased and satisfied with the life of the present, and those who heed not Our Signs,-

name: Dunya
translation: Those who desire the life of the present and its glitter,- to them we shall pay (the price of) their deeds therein,- without diminution.

name: Dunya
translation: They know but the outer (things) in the life of this world: but of the End of things they are heedless.

name: Dunya
translation: Nay (behold), ye prefer the life of this world;

name: Contentment
translation: Seest thou? If We do let them enjoy (this life) for a few years,

name: Hypocrites
translation: There is the type of man whose speech about this world's life May dazzle thee, and he calls Allah to witness about what is in his heart; yet is he the most contentious of enemies.
Behold! he cried to his Lord in secret,
Praying: "O my Lord! infirm indeed are my bones, and the hair of my head doth glisten with grey: but never am I unblest, O my Lord, in my prayer to Thee!

name: Wife
translation: Now I fear (what) my relatives (and colleagues) (will do) after me: but my wife is barren: so give me an heir as from Thyself,-

name: People of the Book
translation: And when there came to them a messenger from Allah, confirming what was with them, a party of the people of the Book threw away the Book of Allah behind their backs, as if (it had been something) they did not know!
What ye suffered on the day the two armies Met, was with the leave of Allah, in order that He might test the believers,-
Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?

name: Nafs
translation: Each one of them We seized for his crime: of them, against some We sent a violent tornado (with showers of stones); some were caught by a (mighty) Blast; some We caused the earth to swallow up; and some We drowned (in the waters): It was not Allah Who injured (or oppressed) them:" They injured (and oppressed) their own souls.
Or do ye feel secure that He Who is in Heaven will not send against you a violent tornado (with showers of stones), so that ye shall know how (terrible) was My warning?

name: Inheritance
subtopic1: Supplication – Courtesy – Respect – Begging Praying –Beseeching – Humbly and Secretly
translation: And (remember) Zakariya, when he cried to his Lord: "O my Lord! leave me not without offspring, though thou art the best of inheritors."

name: Slander
translation: Those who brought forward the lie are a body among yourselves: think it not to be an evil to you; On the contrary it is good for you: to every man among them (will come the punishment) of the sin that he earned, and to him who took on himself the lead among them, will be a penalty grievous.

name: Nafs
translation: Why did not the believers - men and women - when ye heard of the affair,- put the best construction on it in their own minds and say, "This (charge) is an obvious lie"?

name: Good Character
translation: Behold, ye received it on your tongues, and said out of your mouths things of which ye had no knowledge; and ye thought it to be a light matter, while it was most serious in the sight of Allah.

name: Hurting Others
translation: Allah doth admonish you, that ye may never repeat such (conduct), if ye are (true) Believers.

name: Jannah
translation: To those who do right is a goodly (reward)- Yea, more (than in measure)! No darkness nor shame shall cover their faces! they are companions of the garden; they will abide therein (for aye)!

name: Ego
translation: And if We had inflicted on them a penalty before this, they would have said: "Our Lord! If only Thou hadst sent us a messenger, we should certainly have followed Thy Signs before we were humbled and put to shame."

name: Prophet Ibrahim (as)
translation: And rehearse to them (something of) Abraham's story.
A twisted rope of palm-leaf fibre round her (own) neck!

name: Taqwa
translation: Let there arise out of you a band of people inviting to all that is good, enjoining what is right, and forbidding what is wrong: They are the ones to attain felicity.

name: Jahannam / Hell
translation: And if he be of those who treat (Truth) as Falsehood, who go wrong,

name: Taqwa
translation: Here is a plain statement to men, a guidance and instruction to those who fear Allah!
Allah doth wish to Turn to you, but the wish of those who follow their lusts is that ye should turn away (from Him),- far, far away.
What! have they settled some plan (among themselves)? But it is We Who settle things.

name: Verses on Killing
translation: When We decide to destroy a population, We (first) send a definite order to those among them who are given the good things of this life and yet transgress; so that the word is proved true against them: then (it is) We destroy them utterly.

name: Taqwa
translation: Until, when We seize in Punishment those of them who received the good things of this world, behold, they will groan in supplication!
And they say: "The Fire shall not touch us but for a few numbered days:" Say: "Have ye taken a promise from Allah, for He never breaks His promise? or is it that ye say of Allah what ye do not know?"

subtopic1: Fellow Ship ”Friend Ship” in Measure and Weight Covenant in Measure and Weight
translation: Is it not (the case) that every time they make a covenant, some party among them throw it aside?- Nay, Most of them are faithless.
Most of them We found not men (true) to their covenant: but most of them We found rebellious and disobedient.
And We should then have given them from our presence a great reward;
If it were His will, He could destroy you, o mankind, and create another race; for He hath power this to do.

name: Ungratefulness
translation: When trouble toucheth a man, He crieth unto Us (in all postures)- lying down on his side, or sitting, or standing. But when We have solved his trouble, he passeth on his way as if he had never cried to Us for a trouble that touched him! thus do the deeds of transgressors seem fair in their eyes!
By way of reminder; and We never are unjust.
From the mischief of those who practise secret arts;

name: Jealousy
translation: And from the mischief of the envious one as he practises envy.

name: About Disbelievers
translation: But when they saw Our Punishment, they said: "We believe in Allah,- the one Allah - and we reject the partners we used to join with Him."

name: Adversity
translation: Then We changed their suffering into prosperity, until they grew and multiplied, and began to say: "Our fathers (too) were touched by suffering and affluence"... Behold! We called them to account of a sudden, while they realised not (their peril).

name: On Lying
translation: No knowledge have they of such a thing, nor had their fathers. It is a grievous thing that issues from their mouths as a saying what they say is nothing but falsehood!

name: Provision
translation: Nay, We gave the good things of this life to these men and their fathers until the period grew long for them; See they not that We gradually reduce the land (in their control) from its outlying borders? Is it then they who will win?

name: Taqwa
translation: Do they not ponder over the Word (of Allah), or has anything (new) come to them that did not come to their fathers of old?

name: Contentment
translation: Yea, I have given the good things of this life to these (men) and their fathers, until the Truth has come to them, and a messenger making things clear.

name: Corruption
translation: When he turns his back, His aim everywhere is to spread mischief through the earth and destroy crops and cattle. But Allah loveth not mischief.

name: Prophet Adam (as)
translation: We said: "O Adam! dwell thou and thy wife in the Garden; and eat of the bountiful things therein as (where and when) ye will; but approach not this tree, or ye run into harm and transgression."

name: Prophet Nuh (as)
translation: And the people of Noah,- when they rejected the messengers, We drowned them, and We made them as a Sign for mankind; and We have prepared for (all) wrong-doers a grievous Penalty;-

name: On The Universe
translation: But We saved him and the companions of the Ark, and We made the (Ark) a Sign for all peoples!

name: About Arrogance
translation: Those who behave arrogantly on the earth in defiance of right - them will I turn away from My signs: Even if they see all the signs, they will not believe in them; and if they see the way of right conduct, they will not adopt it as the way; but if they see the way of error, that is the way they will adopt. For they have rejected our signs, and failed to take warning from them.

name: Patience
translation: They will all be marshalled before Allah together: then will the weak say to those who were arrogant, "For us, we but followed you; can ye then avail us to all against the wrath of Allah?" They will reply, "If we had received the Guidance of Allah, we should have given it to you: to us it makes no difference (now) whether we rage, or bear (these torments) with patience: for ourselves there is no way of escape."
My Signs used to be rehearsed to you, but ye used to turn back on your heels-

name: About Arrogance
translation: In arrogance: talking nonsense about the (Qur'an), like one telling fables by night.

name: Taqwa
subtopic1: Supplication – Courtesy – Respect – Begging Praying –Beseeching – Humbly and Secretly
translation: That Home of the Hereafter We shall give to those who intend not high-handedness or mischief on earth: and the end is (best) for the righteous.

name: About Disbelievers
translation: (The reply will be:) 'Nay, but there came to thee my Signs, and thou didst reject them: thou wast Haughty, and became one of those who reject faith!'

name: About Arrogance
translation: Then he turned back and was haughty;

Or thou have a house adorned with gold, or thou mount a ladder right into the skies. No, we shall not even believe in thy mounting until thou send down to us a book that we could read. Say: "Glory to my Lord! Am I aught but a man,- a messenger?"
Or have they the dominion of the heavens and the earth and all between? If so, let them mount up with the ropes and means (to reach that end)!

name: Shaitan / Satan
translation: Even if We opened out to them a gate from heaven, and they were to continue (all day) ascending therein,

name: Guidance
translation: They are the ones who buy Error in place of Guidance and Torment in place of Forgiveness. Ah! what boldness (They show) for the Fire!

name: Nafs
translation: Behold! how they lie against their own souls! But the (lie) which they invented will leave them in the lurch.

name: Forgiveness
translation: When they repented, and saw that they had erred, they said: "If our Lord have not mercy upon us and forgive us, we shall indeed be of those who perish."
Whom Allah doth guide,- he is on the right path: whom He rejects from His guidance,- such are the persons who perish.

name: Ego
translation: To such as Allah rejects from His guidance, there can be no guide: He will leave them in their trespasses, wandering in distraction.

name: Dunya
translation: Those whose efforts have been wasted in this life, while they thought that they were acquiring good by their works?

name: Qiyamah
translation: How plainly will they see and hear, the Day that they will appear before Us! but the unjust today are in error manifest!
They call on such deities, besides Allah, as can neither hurt nor profit them: that is straying far indeed (from the Way)!
The day He will gather them together as well as those whom they worship besides Allah, He will ask: "Was it ye who let these My servants astray, or did they stray from the Path themselves?"
By Allah, we were truly in an error manifest,
And our seducers were only those who were steeped in guilt.

name: Guidance
translation: But if they hearken not to thee, know that they only follow their own lusts: and who is more astray than one who follow his own lusts, devoid of guidance from Allah? for Allah guides not people given to wrong-doing.

name: On Knowledge
translation: Nay, the wrong-doers (merely) follow their own lusts, being devoid of knowledge. But who will guide those whom Allah leaves astray? To them there will be no helpers.

name: Music
subtopic1: Guidance’s Book to Return to Ward God
translation: But there are, among men, those who purchase idle tales, without knowledge (or meaning), to mislead (men) from the Path of Allah and throw ridicule (on the Path): for such there will be a Humiliating Penalty.
And they would say: "Our Lord! We obeyed our chiefs and our great ones, and they misled us as to the (right) Path.

name: On Lying
translation: Has he invented a falsehood against Allah, or has a spirit (seized) him?- Nay, it is those who believe not in the Hereafter, that are in (real) Penalty, and in farthest error.

name: About Disbelievers
translation: Say: "See ye if the (Revelation) is (really) from Allah, and yet do ye reject it? Who is more astray than one who is in a schism far (from any purpose)?"
And no protectors have they to help them, other than Allah. And for any whom Allah leaves to stray, there is no way (to the Goal).

name: Swearing
translation: His Companion will say: "Our Lord! I did not make him transgress, but he was (himself) far astray."

name: Jahannam / Hell
translation: Truly those in sin are the ones straying in mind, and mad.
Or have We sent down authority to them, which points out to them the things to which they pay part-worship?

name: Qiyamah
translation: Lost indeed are they who treat it as a falsehood that they must meet Allah,- until on a sudden the hour is on them, and they say: "Ah! woe unto us that we took no thought of it"; for they bear their burdens on their backs, and evil indeed are the burdens that they bear?
And between them and their desires, is placed a barrier, as was done in the past with their partisans: for they were indeed in suspicious (disquieting) doubt.

name: Taqwa
translation: And believe in what I reveal, confirming the revelation which is with you, and be not the first to reject Faith therein, nor sell My Signs for a small price; and fear Me, and Me alone.
Can ye (o ye men of Faith) entertain the hope that they will believe in you?- Seeing that a party of them heard the Word of Allah, and perverted it knowingly after they understood it.

Behold! when they meet the men of Faith, they say: "We believe": But when they meet each other in private, they say: "Shall you tell them what Allah hath revealed to you, that they may engage you in argument about it before your Lord?"- Do ye not understand (their aim)?

name: Jannah
translation: But those who have faith and work righteousness, they are companions of the Garden: Therein shall they abide (For ever).

name: Cursing
translation: They say, "Our hearts are the wrappings (which preserve Allah's Word: we need no more)." Nay, Allah's curse is on them for their blasphemy: Little is it they believe.

name: Taqwa
translation: If they had kept their Faith and guarded themselves from evil, far better had been the reward from their Lord, if they but knew!

name: About Disbelievers
translation: Those to whom We have sent the Book study it as it should be studied: They are the ones that believe therein: Those who reject faith therein,- the loss is their own.

name: Good Character
translation: As to those who believe and work righteousness, Allah will pay them (in full) their reward; but Allah loveth not those who do wrong.

name: Qiyamah
translation: On the Day when some faces will be (lit up with) white, and some faces will be (in the gloom of) black: To those whose faces will be black, (will be said): "Did ye reject Faith after accepting it? Taste then the penalty for rejecting Faith."

name: About Disbelievers
translation: Allah's object also is to purge those that are true in Faith and to deprive of blessing Those that resist Faith.

name: Qiyamah
translation: Those who conceal Allah's revelations in the Book, and purchase for them a miserable profit,- they swallow into themselves naught but Fire; Allah will not address them on the Day of Resurrection. Nor purify them: Grievous will be their penalty.

name: About Difficulties
translation: Yet when We bestow Our favours on man, he turns away and becomes remote on his side (instead of coming to Us), and when evil seizes him he gives himself up to despair!

name: Vanity
translation: Do they not then see that We have made a sanctuary secure, and that men are being snatched away from all around them? Then, do they believe in that which is vain, and reject the Grace of Allah?
Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?
Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?
Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?
Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?
Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?
Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?
Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?

name: Qiyamah
translation: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?
Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?
Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?
Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?
Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?-
Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?-
Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?
Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?
Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?
Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?-
Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?
Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?
Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?
Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?

name: Taqwa
translation: For Allah is with those who restrain themselves, and those who do good.
They shall have all that they wish for, in the presence of their Lord: such is the reward of those who do good:
And follow the best of (the courses) revealed to you from your Lord, before the Penalty comes on you - of a sudden while ye perceive not!-

name: Nafs
translation: Lest the soul should (then) say: 'Ah! Woe is me!- In that I neglected (my duty) towards Allah, and was but among those who mocked!'-

name: Taqwa
translation: Or (lest) it should say: 'If only Allah had guided me, I should certainly have been among the righteous!'-
Or (lest) it should say when it (actually) sees the penalty: 'If only I had another chance, I should certainly be among those who do good!'

name: Nafs
translation: Contend not on behalf of such as betray their own souls; for Allah loveth not one given to perfidy and crime:

name: Taqwa
translation: We know best why it is they listen, when they listen to thee; and when they meet in private conference, behold, the wicked say, "Ye follow none other than a man bewitched!"
Then the Blast overtook them with justice, and We made them as rubbish of dead leaves (floating on the stream of Time)! So away with the people who do wrong!
But the (mighty) Blast overtook them before morning,

name: Angel
translation: Say: "I tell you not that with me are the treasures of Allah, nor do I know what is hidden, nor do I tell you I am an angel. I but follow what is revealed to me." Say: "can the blind be held equal to the seeing?" Will ye then consider not?

name: Nafs
translation: Now have come to you, from your Lord, proofs (to open your eyes): if any will see, it will be for (the good of) his own soul; if any will be blind, it will be to his own (harm): I am not (here) to watch over your doings.
These two kinds (of men) may be compared to the blind and deaf, and those who can see and hear well. Are they equal when compared? Will ye not then take heed?
And among them are some who look at thee: but canst thou guide the blind,- even though they will not see?

name: Qiyamah
translation: Not equal are the blind and those who (clearly) see: Nor are (equal) those who believe and work deeds of righteousness, and those who do evil. Little do ye learn by admonition!

name: Swearing
translation: But the Unbelievers (are steeped) in self-glory and Separatism.

name: Backbiting
translation: Soon shall We brand (the beast) on the snout!
But their brethren (the evil ones) plunge them deeper into error, and never relax (their efforts).
The foundation of those who so build is never free from suspicion and shakiness in their hearts, until their hearts are cut to pieces. And Allah is All-Knowing, Wise.
If good befalls thee, it grieves them; but if a misfortune befalls thee, they say, "We took indeed our precautions beforehand," and they turn away rejoicing.
Let them laugh a little: much will they weep: a recompense for the (evil) that they do.

name: Hajar
translation: And We turned (the cities) upside down, and rained down on them brimstones hard as baked clay.

If (We had) not (sent thee to the Quraish),- in case a calamity should seize them for (the deeds) that their hands have sent forth, they might say: "Our Lord! why didst Thou not sent us a messenger? We should then have followed Thy Signs and been amongst those who believe!"
Soon will their multitude be put to flight, and they will show their backs.

name: Qiyamah
translation: Nay, the Hour (of Judgment) is the time promised them (for their full recompense): And that Hour will be most grievous and most bitter.

name: Prophet Musa (as)
translation: There came to you Moses with clear (Signs); yet ye worshipped the calf (Even) after that, and ye did behave wrongfully.
Then We draw (a veil) over their ears, for a number of years, in the Cave, (so that they heard not):
If they could find a place to flee to, or caves, or a place of concealment, they would turn straightaway thereto, with an obstinate rush.

Say those without knowledge: "Why speaketh not Allah unto us? or why cometh not unto us a Sign?" So said the people before them words of similar import. Their hearts are alike. We have indeed made clear the Signs unto any people who hold firmly to Faith (in their hearts).
We would hasten them on in every good? Nay, they do not understand.

name: Backbiting
translation: (Habitually) hindering (all) good, transgressing beyond bounds, deep in sin,

name: Backbiting
translation: Violent (and cruel),- with all that, base-born,-

name: Allah knows the unseen
translation: Except a messenger whom He has chosen: and then He makes a band of watchers march before him and behind him,

name: Taqwa
translation: If the people of the towns had but believed and feared Allah, We should indeed have opened out to them (All kinds of) blessings from heaven and earth; but they rejected (the truth), and We brought them to book for their misdeeds.
Did the people of the towns feel secure against the coming of Our wrath by night while they were asleep?
Or else did they feel secure against its coming in broad daylight while they played about (care-free)?

name: Nafs
translation: Thus have We placed leaders in every town, its wicked men, to plot (and burrow) therein: but they only plot against their own souls, and they perceive it not.
(The messengers were sent) thus, for thy Lord would not destroy for their wrong-doing men's habitations whilst their occupants were unwarned.
How many towns have We destroyed (for their sins)? Our punishment took them on a sudden by night or while they slept for their afternoon rest.
Such is the chastisement of thy Lord when He chastises communities in the midst of their wrong: grievous, indeed, and severe is His chastisement.

name: Taqwa
translation: Nor would thy Lord be the One to destroy communities for a single wrong-doing, if its members were likely to mend.

subtopic1: Desting – Fate – Decree – Pre – Destination – Divine
translation: Never did We destroy a population that had not a term decreed and assigned beforehand.
Such were the populations we destroyed when they committed iniquities; but we fixed an appointed time for their destruction.

name: Haram & Forbidden
translation: But there is a ban on any population which We have destroyed: that they shall not return,
How many populations have We destroyed, which were given to wrong-doing? They tumbled down on their roofs. And how many wells are lying idle and neglected, and castles lofty and well-built?
Had it been Our Will, We could have sent a warner to every centre of population.
Never did We destroy a population, but had its warners -
Just as thy Lord ordered thee out of thy house in truth, even though a party among the Believers disliked it,
Disputing with thee concerning the truth after it was made manifest, as if they were being driven to death and they (actually) saw it.
Their garments of liquid pitch, and their faces covered with Fire;

name: On Animals
translation: And the things on this earth which He has multiplied in varying colours (and qualities): verily in this is a sign for men who celebrate the praises of Allah (in gratitude).
Indeed they had plotted sedition before, and upset matters for thee, until,- the Truth arrived, and the Decree of Allah became manifest much to their disgust.
How then if We brought from each people a witness, and We brought thee as a witness against these people!

subtopic1: Desting – Fate – Decree – Pre – Destination – Divine
translation: To every people is a term appointed: when their term is reached, not an hour can they cause delay, nor (an hour) can they advance (it in anticipation).
Neither can a people anticipate its term, nor delay it.

subtopic1: Desting – Fate – Decree – Pre – Destination – Divine
translation: No people can hasten their term, nor can they delay (it).
One day We shall gather together from every people a troop of those who reject our Signs, and they shall be kept in ranks,-
Nay, those who seek gain in evil, and are girt round by their sins,- they are companions of the Fire: Therein shall they abide (For ever).

name: About Disbelievers
translation: But those who reject Faith and belie Our Signs, they shall be companions of the Fire; they shall abide therein.

name: Humility
subtopic1: Supplication – Courtesy – Respect – Begging Praying –Beseeching – Humbly and Secretly
translation: But those who believe and work righteousness, and humble themselves before their Lord,- They will be companions of the gardens, to dwell therein for aye!

name: Jannah
translation: Such shall be Companions of the Gardens, dwelling therein (for aye): a recompense for their (good) deeds.
Of all such things the evil is hateful in the sight of thy Lord.

name: Corruption
translation: But if they turn back, Allah hath full knowledge of those who do mischief.

name: Corruption
translation: Of them there are some who believe therein, and some who do not: and thy Lord knoweth best those who are out for mischief.

name: Swearing
translation: If the Truth had been in accord with their desires, truly the heavens and the earth, and all beings therein would have been in confusion and corruption! Nay, We have sent them their admonition, but they turn away from their admonition.

name: Taqwa
translation: Shall We treat those who believe and work deeds of righteousness, the same as those who do mischief on earth? Shall We treat those who guard against evil, the same as those who turn aside from the right?

name: Swearing
translation: They swear by Allah that they are indeed of you; but they are not of you: yet they are afraid (to appear in their true colours).

name: Nafs
translation: Those who reject Faith will suffer from that rejection: and those who work righteousness will spread their couch (of repose) for themselves (in heaven):
To whom I made (life) smooth and comfortable!

Do they see nothing in the government of the heavens and the earth and all that Allah hath created? (Do they not see) that it may well be that their terms is nigh drawing to an end? In what message after this will they then believe?
Is then He Who creates like one that creates not? Will ye not receive admonition?
A revelation from Him Who created the earth and the heavens on high.
If thou ask them, who created them, they will certainly say, Allah: How then are they deluded away (from the Truth)?

name: Cursing
translation: Our Lord! Give them double Penalty and curse them with a very great Curse!

name: Cursing
translation: The Day when no profit will it be to Wrong-doers to present their excuses, but they will (only) have the Curse and the Home of Misery.

name: Taqwa
translation: Then guard yourselves against a Day when one soul shall not avail another, nor shall compensation be accepted from her nor shall intercession profit her nor shall anyone be helped (from outside).

name: Qiyamah
translation: But how (will they fare) when we gather them together against a day about which there is no doubt, and each soul will be paid out just what it has earned, without (favour or) injustice?

name: Disobedience
translation: Say: "I would, if I disobeyed my Lord, indeed have fear of the penalty of a Mighty Day.

name: Allah's Mercy
translation: On that day, if the penalty is averted from any, it is due to Allah's mercy; And that would be (Salvation), the obvious fulfilment of all desire.

name: Qiyamah
translation: Say: "Think ye to yourselves, if there come upon you the wrath of Allah, or the Hour (that ye dread), would ye then call upon other than Allah?- (reply) if ye are truthful!

If We delay the penalty for them for a definite term, they are sure to say, "What keeps it back?" Ah! On the day it (actually) reaches them, nothing will turn it away from them, and they will be completely encircled by that which they used to mock at!
In that is a Sign for those who fear the penalty of the Hereafter: that is a Day for which mankind will be gathered together: that will be a Day of Testimony.

name: Qiyamah
translation: Do they then feel secure from the coming against them of the covering veil of the wrath of Allah,- or of the coming against them of the (final) Hour all of a sudden while they perceive not?

name: Dawah
translation: So warn mankind of the Day when the Wrath will reach them: then will the wrong-doers say: "Our Lord! respite us (if only) for a short term: we will answer Thy call, and follow the messengers!" "What! were ye not wont to swear aforetime that ye should suffer no decline?

name: Taqwa
translation: One Day every soul will come up struggling for itself, and every soul will be recompensed (fully) for all its actions, and none will be unjustly dealt with.

name: About Disbelievers
translation: But the sects differ among themselves: and woe to the unbelievers because of the (coming) Judgment of a Momentous Day!

name: Qiyamah
translation: But warn them of the Day of Distress, when the matter will be determined: for (behold,) they are negligent and they do not believe!

name: Zulm
translation: But he who works deeds of righteousness, and has faith, will have no fear of harm nor of any curtailment (of what is his due).

name: Qiyamah
translation: Those who fear their Lord in their most secret thoughts, and who hold the Hour (of Judgment) in awe.

name: Qiyamah
translation: Those who reject Faith will not cease to be in doubt concerning (Revelation) until the Hour (of Judgment) comes suddenly upon them, or there comes to them the Penalty of a Day of Disaster.

name: Qiyamah
translation: On the Day that the Hour will be established, the guilty will be struck dumb with despair.

name: Qiyamah
translation: On the Day that the Hour will be established,- that Day shall (all men) be sorted out.

name: Disobedience
translation: Say: "I would, if I disobeyed my Lord, indeed have fear of the Penalty of a Mighty Day."
On you will be sent (O ye evil ones twain!) a flame of fire (to burn) and a smoke (to choke): no defence will ye have:
And those Foremost (in Faith) will be Foremost (in the Hereafter).
Thus, then, if he be of those Nearest to Allah,

name: Livelihood
translation: And he will be in a life of Bliss,
Ah! Would that (Death) had made an end of me!
My power has perished from me!...

name: Qiyamah
translation: (Then) shall each soul know what it has put forward.
Among them are some who (pretend to) listen to thee: But canst thou make the deaf to hear,- even though they are without understanding?
They will say: "Our Lord! twice hast Thou made us without life, and twice hast Thou given us Life! Now have we recognised our sins: Is there any way out (of this)?"
Then We raised you up after your death: Ye had the chance to be grateful.
In that case We should have made thee taste an equal portion (of punishment) in this life, and an equal portion in death: and moreover thou wouldst have found none to help thee against Us!
But there - will be put to flight even a host of confederates.
Then, shall ye be questioned that Day about the joy (ye indulged in!).

name: On The Prayer
translation: But after them there followed a posterity who missed prayers and followed after lusts soon, then, will they face Destruction,-

name: Jahannam / Hell
translation: If anyone contends with the Messenger even after guidance has been plainly conveyed to him, and follows a path other than that becoming to men of Faith, We shall leave him in the path he has chosen, and land him in Hell,- what an evil refuge!

name: Jannah
translation: And those who are blessed shall be in the Garden: They will dwell therein for all the time that the heavens and the earth endure, except as thy Lord willeth: a gift without break.
Had it not been for a Word that went forth before from thy Lord, (their punishment) must necessarily have come; but there is a Term appointed (for respite).

name: About Difficulties
translation: They ask thee to hasten on the Punishment (for them): had it not been for a term (of respite) appointed, the Punishment would certainly have come to them: and it will certainly reach them,- of a sudden, while they perceive not!
But the transgressors changed the word from that which had been given them; so We sent on the transgressors a plague from heaven, for that they infringed (Our command) repeatedly.

name: About Disbelievers
translation: We have sent down to thee Manifest Signs (ayat); and none reject them but those who are perverse.
If any turn back after this, they are perverted transgressors.
But those who reject our signs,- them shall punishment touch, for that they ceased not from transgressing.
Thus is the word of thy Lord proved true against those who rebel: Verily they will not believe.

name: Good Character
translation: O ye who believe! If a wicked person comes to you with any news, ascertain the truth, lest ye harm people unwittingly, and afterwards become full of repentance for what ye have done.
Be not like those who are divided amongst themselves and fall into disputations after receiving Clear Signs: For them is a dreadful penalty,-

name: Nafs
translation: Miserable is the price for which they have sold their souls, in that they deny (the revelation) which Allah has sent down, in insolent envy that Allah of His Grace should send it to any of His servants He pleases: Thus have they drawn on themselves Wrath upon Wrath. And humiliating is the punishment of those who reject Faith.

name: Dunya
translation: As to those who reject faith, I will punish them with terrible agony in this world and in the Hereafter, nor will they have anyone to help.

name: Generosity
translation: If ye (but) eschew the most heinous of the things which ye are forbidden to do, We shall expel out of you all the evil in you, and admit you to a gate of great honour.

name: About Disbelievers
translation: Some people before you did ask such questions, and on that account lost their faith.

name: About Disbelievers
translation: If thou couldst but see when they are confronted with their Lord! He will say: "Is not this the truth?" They will say: "Yea, by our Lord!" He will say: "Taste ye then the penalty, because ye rejected Faith."

name: About Disbelievers
translation: Thus (will it be said): "Taste ye then of the (punishment): for those who resist Allah, is the penalty of the Fire."

name: Faith
translation: Make ye no excuses: ye have rejected Faith after ye had accepted it. If We pardon some of you, We will punish others amongst you, for that they are in sin.

name: Jahannam / Hell
translation: Do the Unbelievers think that they can take My servants as protectors besides Me? Verily We have prepared Hell for the Unbelievers for (their) entertainment.

name: About Disbelievers
translation: Instead, they shall reject their worship, and become adversaries against them.

name: Ungratefulness
translation: Verily Allah will defend (from ill) those who believe: verily, Allah loveth not any that is a traitor to faith, or show ingratitude.

name: About Disbelievers
translation: And for those who reject Faith and deny our Signs, there will be a humiliating Punishment.

name: Dunya
translation: And the chiefs of his people, who disbelieved and denied the Meeting in the Hereafter, and on whom We had bestowed the good things of this life, said: "He is no more than a man like yourselves: he eats of that of which ye eat, and drinks of what ye drink.

name: About Disbelievers
translation: Yet do they worship, besides Allah, things that can neither profit them nor harm them: and the Misbeliever is a helper (of Evil), against his own Lord!

name: Prophet Musa (as)
translation: But (now), when the Truth has come to them from Ourselves, they say, "Why are not (Signs) sent to him, like those which were sent to Moses?" Do they not then reject (the Signs) which were formerly sent to Moses? They say: "Two kinds of sorcery, each assisting the other!" And they say: "For us, we reject all (such things)!"

name: Contentment
translation: Disdaining ungratefully Our gifts, and giving themselves up to (worldly) enjoyment! But soon will they know.

name: Backbiting
translation: Seeing that they did reject Faith (entirely) before, and that they (continually) cast (slanders) on the unseen from a position far off?

name: Forgiveness
translation: For those who reject Allah, is a terrible Penalty: but for those who believe and work righteous deeds, is Forgiveness, and a magnificent Reward.

name: About Disbelievers
translation: In the end did I punish those who rejected Faith: and how (terrible) was My rejection (of them)!

name: On Lying
translation: So they wonder that a Warner has come to them from among themselves! and the Unbelievers say, "This is a sorcerer telling lies!

name: Nafs
translation: The Unbelievers will be addressed: "Greater was the aversion of Allah to you than (is) your aversion to yourselves, seeing that ye were called to the Faith and ye used to refuse."

name: About Disbelievers
translation: But We will certainly give the Unbelievers a taste of a severe Penalty, and We will requite them for the worst of their deeds.

name: About Disbelievers
translation: But when the Truth came to them, they said: "This is sorcery, and we do reject it."

name: About Disbelievers
subtopic1: Guidance’s Book to Return to Ward God
translation: When Our Clear Signs are rehearsed to them, the Unbelievers say, of the Truth when it comes to them: "This is evident sorcery!"

name: About Disbelievers
translation: The Unbelievers say of those who believe: "If (this Message) were a good thing, (such men) would not have gone to it first, before us!" And seeing that they guide not themselves thereby, they will say, "this is an (old,) falsehood!"

name: Guidance
translation: Those who reject Allah, hinder (men) from the Path of Allah, and resist the Messenger, after Guidance has been clearly shown to them, will not injure Allah in the least, but He will make their deeds of no effect.

name: About Disbelievers
translation: If the Unbelievers should fight you, they would certainly turn their backs; then would they find neither protector nor helper.

name: About Disbelievers
translation: Woe, then, to the Unbelievers, on account of that Day of theirs which they have been promised!

name: Qiyamah
translation: At length, when they see it close at hand, grieved will be the faces of the Unbelievers, and it will be said (to them): "This is (the promise fulfilled), which ye were calling for!"

name: About Disbelievers
translation: And the Unbelievers would almost trip thee up with their eyes when they hear the Message; and they say: "Surely he is possessed!"

name: About Disbelievers
translation: The Unbelievers, the which there is none to ward off,-

name: About Disbelievers
translation: Now what is the matter with the Unbelievers that they rush madly before thee-

name: Ungratefulness
translation: Woe to man! What hath made him reject Allah;

name: About Disbelievers
translation: And yet the Unbelievers (persist) in rejecting (the Truth)!
And they will say, "We do believe (now) in the (Truth)"; but how could they receive (Faith) from a position (so far off,-
Say "It is Allah that delivereth you from these and all (other) distresses: and yet ye worship false gods!"
If it had been Our wish to take (just) a pastime, We should surely have taken it from the things nearest to Us, if We would do (such a thing)!

name: Ego
translation: Leave them alone, to enjoy (the good things of this life) and to please themselves: let (false) hope amuse them: soon will knowledge (undeceive them).

name: On Animals
translation: (Some) say they were three, the dog being the fourth among them; (others) say they were five, the dog being the sixth,- doubtfully guessing at the unknown; (yet others) say they were seven, the dog being the eighth. Say thou: "My Lord knoweth best their number; It is but few that know their (real case)." Enter not, therefore, into controversies concerning them, except on a matter that is clear, nor consult any of them about (the affair of) the Sleepers.

name: On Animals
translation: Thou wouldst have deemed them awake, whilst they were asleep, and We turned them on their right and on their left sides: their dog stretching forth his two fore-legs on the threshold: if thou hadst come up on to them, thou wouldst have certainly turned back from them in flight, and wouldst certainly have been filled with terror of them.
But we think that we can by no means frustrate Allah throughout the earth, nor can we frustrate Him by flight.

name: Nafs
translation: Every soul that hath sinned, if it possessed all that is on earth, would fain give it in ransom: They would declare (their) repentance when they see the penalty: but the judgment between them will be with justice, and no wrong will be done unto them.

name: About Difficulties
translation: They will in no wise frustrate (His design) on earth, nor have they protectors besides Allah! Their penalty will be doubled! They lost the power to hear, and they did not see!
Nor can ye frustrate (aught), (fleeing) through the earth; nor have ye, besides Allah, any one to protect or to help.

name: On Wisdom
translation: A similar (favour have ye already received) in that We have sent among you a Messenger of your own, rehearsing to you Our Signs, and sanctifying you, and instructing you in Scripture and Wisdom, and in new knowledge.

If, then, Allah bring thee back to any of them, and they ask thy permission to come out (with thee), say: "Never shall ye come out with me, nor fight an enemy with me: for ye preferred to sit inactive on the first occasion: Then sit ye (now) with those who lag behind."

name: Contentment
translation: (In such falsehood) is but a paltry profit; but they will have a most grievous Penalty.
Yet there comes to them at length the (Punishment) which they were promised!

name: Contentment
translation: It will profit them not that they enjoyed (this life)!

name: Contentment
translation: We grant them their pleasure for a little while: in the end shall We drive them to a chastisement unrelenting.
The same is it to them whether thou admonish them or thou do not admonish them: they will not believe.

name: Allah's Mercy
translation: But those whose faces will be (lit with) white,- they will be in (the light of) Allah's mercy: therein to dwell (for ever).
They will abide therein: Their penalty will not be lightened, nor will respite be their (lot).

name: Disobedience
translation: But those who disobey Allah and His Messenger and transgress His limits will be admitted to a Fire, to abide therein: And they shall have a humiliating punishment.

name: Jannah
translation: Allah hath prepared for them gardens under which rivers flow, to dwell therein: that is the supreme felicity.

The vanguard (of Islam)- the first of those who forsook (their homes) and of those who gave them aid, and (also) those who follow them in (all) good deeds,- well-pleased is Allah with them, as are they with Him: for them hath He prepared gardens under which rivers flow, to dwell therein for ever: that is the supreme felicity.

name: Nafs
translation: Not the slightest sound will they hear of Hell: what their souls desired, in that will they dwell.
To dwell therein for ever: no protector will they find, nor helper.
Say: "O my People! Do whatever ye can: I will do (my part): but soon will ye know-
Who it is to whom comes a Penalty of ignominy, and on whom descends a Penalty that abides.
Do those who practise evil think that they will get the better of Us? Evil is their judgment!
And no question do they bring to thee but We reveal to thee the truth and the best explanation (thereof).

name: Hardship
translation: If We had mercy on them and removed the distress which is on them, they would obstinately persist in their transgression, wandering in distraction to and fro.

name: Hypocrites
translation: The Hypocrites are afraid lest a Sura should be sent down about them, showing them what is (really passing) in their hearts. Say: "Mock ye! But verily Allah will bring to light all that ye fear (should be revealed).
Then will appear to them the evil (fruits) of what they did, and they will be completely encircled by that which they used to mock at!
Think not that those who exult in what they have brought about, and love to be praised for what they have not done,- think escape the penalty. For them is a penalty Grievous indeed.

But when they forgot the warning they had received, We opened to them the gates of all (good) things, until, in the midst of their enjoyment of Our gifts, on a sudden, We called them to account, when lo! they were plunged in despair!
But people have cut off their affair (of unity), between them, into sects: each party rejoices in that which is with itself.

name: Taqwa
translation: And what is there to keep back men from believing, now that Guidance has come to them, nor from praying for forgiveness from their Lord, but that (they ask that) the ways of the ancients be repeated with them, or the Wrath be brought to them face to face?
If it had been our Will, We could surely have blotted out their eyes; then should they have run about groping for the Path, but how could they have seen?
And how many Signs in the heavens and the earth do they pass by? Yet they turn (their faces) away from them!
There are among us some that are righteous, and some the contrary: we follow divergent paths.

Nay, the evil results of their Deeds overtook them. And the wrong-doers of this (generation)- the evil results of their Deeds will soon overtake them (too), and they will never be able to frustrate (Our Plan)!
They seek to be informed by thee: "Is that true?" Say: "Aye! by my Lord! it is the very truth! and ye cannot frustrate it!"
For if they should come upon you, they would stone you or force you to return to their cult, and in that case ye would never attain prosperity.

name: About Difficulties
translation: Say (to the Rejecters): "My Lord is not uneasy because of you if ye call not on Him: But ye have indeed rejected (Him), and soon will come the inevitable (punishment)!"
He knows what is before them, and what is behind them, and they offer no intercession except for those who are acceptable, and they stand in awe and reverence of His (Glory).

name: Hope
translation: O ye who believe! If ye will aid (the cause of) Allah, He will aid you, and plant your feet firmly.
(For) the sinners will be known by their marks: and they will be seized by their forelocks and their feet.

name: On Lying
translation: Yea, in their own (eyes) will become manifest what before they concealed. But if they were returned, they would certainly relapse to the things they were forbidden, for they are indeed liars.
Nor to suffer from thirst, nor from the sun's heat.

name: Forgiveness
translation: But seek the forgiveness of Allah; for Allah is Oft-forgiving, Most Merciful.

name: Forgiveness
translation: Again will Allah, after this, turn (in mercy) to whom He will: for Allah is Oft-forgiving, Most Merciful.

name: Rizq
translation: Those who believe and work righteousness, for them is forgiveness and a sustenance most generous.
They say: "We shall not believe in thee, until thou cause a spring to gush forth for us from the earth,

name: Shaitan / Satan
translation: One day shall We gather them all together: We shall say to those who ascribed partners (to Us): "Where are the partners whom ye (invented and) talked about?"
But how many (countless) generations before them have We destroyed? Canst thou find a single one of them (now) or hear (so much as) a whisper of them?
Then We raised after them other generations.

name: Vanity
translation: Seest thou such a one as taketh for his god his own passion (or impulse)? Couldst thou be a disposer of affairs for him?

name: Guidance
translation: And as for us, since we have listened to the Guidance, we have accepted it: and any who believes in his Lord has no fear, either of a short (account) or of any injustice.

name: Guidance
translation: Seest thou if he is on (the road of) Guidance?-
But they will never seek for death, on account of the (sins) which their hands have sent on before them. and Allah is well-acquainted with the wrong-doers.

name: Qiyamah
translation: The Day that the wrong-doer will bite at his hands, he will say, "Oh! would that I had taken a (straight) path with the Messenger!

name: Allah knows the unseen
translation: Or that the Unseen is in their hands, so that they can write it down?

name: Ego
translation: If Allah had found in them any good. He would indeed have made them listen: (As it is), if He had made them listen, they would but have turned back and declined (Faith).
Indeed they have been removed far from even (a chance of) hearing it.

name: Vanity
translation: And when they hear vain talk, they turn away therefrom and say: "To us our deeds, and to you yours; peace be to you: we seek not the ignorant."

name: Taqwa
translation: Those are limits set by Allah: those who obey Allah and His Messenger will be admitted to Gardens with rivers flowing beneath, to abide therein (for ever) and that will be the supreme achievement.

name: Taqwa
translation: To the righteous, the Garden will be brought near,

name: Jannah
translation: And besides these two, there are two other Gardens,-
But leave them in their confused ignorance for a time.
But their hearts are in confused ignorance of this; and there are, besides that, deeds of theirs, which they will (continue) to do,-
Nor call on any, other than Allah;- Such will neither profit thee nor hurt thee: if thou dost, behold! thou shalt certainly be of those who do wrong.'

name: Nafs
translation: Or have they gods that can guard them from Us? They have no power to aid themselves, nor can they be defended from Us.

name: On Knowledge
translation: Yet they worship, besides Allah, things for which no authority has been sent down to them, and of which they have (really) no knowledge: for those that do wrong there is no helper.
(It will be said): "Groan not in supplication this day: for ye shall certainly not be helped by Us.

(Allah will say): "Now have they proved you liars in what ye say: so ye cannot avert (your penalty) nor (get) help." And whoever among you does wrong, him shall We cause to taste of a grievous Penalty.
And it shall be said to them: 'Where are the (gods) ye worshipped-
Besides Allah? Can they help you or help themselves?'
Not on earth nor in heaven will ye be able (fleeing) to frustrate (his Plan), nor have ye, besides Allah, any protector or helper.
So on that Day no excuse of theirs will avail the transgressors, nor will they be invited (then) to seek grace (by repentance).

name: Taqwa
translation: Therein will they cry aloud (for assistance): "Our Lord! Bring us out: we shall work righteousness, not the (deeds) we used to do!" - "Did We not give you long enough life so that he that would should receive admonition? and (moreover) the warner came to you. So taste ye (the fruits of your deeds): for the wrong-doers there is no helper."

name: Qiyamah
translation: The Day when their plotting will avail them nothing and no help shall be given them.
(Man) will have no power, and no helper.
Those who reject Our signs and the meeting in the Hereafter,- vain are their deeds: Can they expect to be rewarded except as they have wrought?
Without a doubt, these are the very ones who will lose most in the Hereafter!
Without doubt, in the Hereafter they will perish.
And to those who believe not in the Hereafter, (it announceth) that We have prepared for them a Penalty Grievous (indeed).

name: On Justice
translation: Such are they for whom a grievous Penalty is (waiting); and in the Hereafter theirs will be the greatest loss.
Verily, from (the Light of) their Lord, that Day, will they be veiled.

name: Jinn
translation: True, there were persons among mankind who took shelter with persons among the Jinns, but they increased them in folly.

name: Qiyamah
translation: But man wishes to do wrong (even) in the time in front of him.

name: Qiyamah
translation: That Day will Man say: "Where is the refuge?"

name: About Arrogance
translation: Nay, but man doth transgress all bounds,

name: Humility
translation: They fall down on their faces in tears, and it increases their (earnest) humility.
We inflicted Punishment on them, but they humbled not themselves to their Lord, nor do they submissively entreat (Him)!-
