Until We open on them a gate leading to a severe Punishment: then Lo! they will be plunged in despair therein!
There is therein (enough provision) for thee not to go hungry nor to go naked,

name: Swearing
translation: To you they swear by Allah. In order to please you: But it is more fitting that they should please Allah and His Messenger, if they are Believers.
If thou dost question them, they declare (with emphasis): "We were only talking idly and in play." Say: "Was it at Allah, and His Signs, and His Messenger, that ye were mocking?"

name: On Lying
translation: If any, after this, invent a lie and attribute it to Allah, they are indeed unjust wrong-doers.

name: On Sin
translation: Behold! how they invent a lie against Allah! but that by itself is a manifest sin!

name: On Lying
translation: Who doth more wrong than such as forge a lie against Allah, or deny His Signs? But never will prosper those who sin.

name: On Lying
translation: Say: "Those who invent a lie against Allah will never prosper."

And their purpose was to tempt thee away from that which We had revealed unto thee, to substitute in our name something quite different; (in that case), behold! they would certainly have made thee (their) friend!

name: Prophet Jesus (as)
translation: Such (was) Jesus the son of Mary: (it is) a statement of truth, about which they (vainly) dispute.
Say: Will ye dispute with us about Allah, seeing that He is our Lord and your Lord; that we are responsible for our doings and ye for yours; and that We are sincere (in our faith) in Him?

name: Allah knows the unseen
translation: Such is one of the stories of what happened unseen, which We reveal by inspiration unto thee; nor wast thou (present) with them then when they concerted their plans together in the process of weaving their plots.

Hast thou not turned Thy vision to those who have been given a portion of the Book? They are invited to the Book of Allah, to settle their dispute, but a party of them Turn back and decline (The arbitration).
And what will explain to thee what the Day of Judgment is?
Again, what will explain to thee what the Day of Judgment is?
That Day shall ye be brought to Judgment: not an act of yours that ye hide will be hidden.

name: On Knowledge
translation: And verily, We shall recount their whole story with knowledge, for We were never absent (at any time or place).
Say: "Who is it in whose hands is the governance of all things,- who protects (all), but is not protected (of any)? (say) if ye know."

name: On Knowledge
translation: What! Has he knowledge of the Unseen so that he can see?
Verily what is on earth we shall make but as dust and dry soil (without growth or herbage).

name: Remembrance of Allah (swt)
translation: But ye treated them with ridicule, so much so that (ridicule of) them made you forget My Message while ye were laughing at them!

name: Music
translation: And will ye laugh and not weep,-

name: Music
translation: Wasting your time in vanities?
From the right and from the left, in crowds?
And now they reject the truth when it reaches them: but soon shall they learn the reality of what they used to mock at.
Those who reject Our signs, We shall gradually visit with punishment, in ways they perceive not;

name: Ego
translation: If they charge thee with falsehood, say: "My work to me, and yours to you! ye are free from responsibility for what I do, and I for what ye do!"
Nor be of those who reject the signs of Allah, or thou shalt be of those who perish.
(The prophet) said: "O my Lord! help me: for that they accuse me of falsehood."

name: On Lying
translation: We have sent them the Truth: but they indeed practise falsehood!
They have indeed rejected (the Message): so they will know soon (enough) the truth of what they mocked at!
Those before them (also) rejected (revelation), and so the Punishment came to them from directions they did not perceive.

name: Revenge
translation: So We exacted retribution from them: now see what was the end of those who rejected (Truth)!
But they deny the Truth when it comes to them: so they are in a confused state.
They reject (the warning) and follow their (own) lusts but every matter has its appointed time.
Then will no (soul) entertain falsehood concerning its coming.
But indeed men before them rejected (My warning): then how (terrible) was My rejection (of them)?

subtopic1: Guidance’s Book to Return to Ward God
translation: Then leave Me alone with such as reject this Message: by degrees shall We punish them from directions they perceive not.
Ah woe, that Day! to the Rejecters of Truth!
Ah woe, that Day, to the Rejecters of Truth!
Ah woe, that Day, to the Rejecters of Truth!
Ah woe, that Day, to the Rejecters of Truth!
Ah woe, that Day, to the Rejecters of Truth!
Ah woe, that Day, to the Rejecters of Truth!
Ah woe, that Day, to the Rejecters of Truth!
And gives the lie to the best,-
Then what can, after this, contradict thee, as to the judgment (to come)?
Seest thou if he denies (Truth) and turns away?

name: Faith
translation: O mankind! verily there hath come to you a convincing proof from your Lord: For We have sent unto you a light (that is) manifest.
They will say there in their mutual bickerings:
He will say: "Dispute not with each other in My Presence: I had already in advance sent you Warning.

name: Livelihood
translation: And We have provided therein means of subsistence,- for you and for those for whose sustenance ye are not responsible.
Knoweth he not that Allah doth see?

name: Allah's Mercy
translation: But ye turned back thereafter: Had it not been for the Grace and Mercy of Allah to you, ye had surely been among the lost.
Did they then feel secure against the plan of Allah?- but no one can feel secure from the Plan of Allah, except those (doomed) to ruin!
Say: "Shall we tell you of those who lose most in respect of their deeds?-
If ye obey a man like yourselves, behold, it is certain ye will be lost.
They say: "O thou to whom the Message is being revealed! truly thou art mad (or possessed)!
Yet they turn away from him and say: "Tutored (by others), a man possessed!"
Soon wilt thou see, and they will see,
Which of you is afflicted with madness.

name: Guidance
translation: We relate to thee their story in truth: they were youths who believed in their Lord, and We advanced them in guidance:

Say: "Can you expect for us (any fate) other than one of two glorious things- (Martyrdom or victory)? But we can expect for you either that Allah will send his punishment from Himself, or by our hands. So wait (expectant); we too will wait with you."

name: Blessings
translation: They are those on whom (Descend) blessings from Allah, and Mercy, and they are the ones that receive guidance.

name: Taqwa
translation: Of those who answered the call of Allah and the Messenger, even after being wounded, those who do right and refrain from wrong have a great reward;-

When there comes to them a sign (from Allah), They say: "We shall not believe until we receive one (exactly) like those received by Allah's messengers." Allah knoweth best where (and how) to carry out His mission. Soon will the wicked be overtaken by humiliation before Allah, and a severe punishment, for all their plots.
That Day (Allah) will call to them, and say: "What was the answer ye gave to the messengers?"

name: Dawah
translation: Or do they think that We hear not their secrets and their private counsels? Indeed (We do), and Our messengers are by them, to record.
How shall the message be (effectual) for them, seeing that an Messenger explaining things clearly has (already) come to them,-
For the evils of their Deeds will confront them, and they will be (completely) encircled by that which they used to mock at!
(Allah) said: "In but a little while, they are sure to be sorry!"
But when it descends into the open space before them, evil will be the morning for those who were warned (and heeded not)!
Thus do We relate to thee some stories of what happened before: for We have sent thee a Message from Our own Presence.

name: Qiyam Al-Layl
translation: Truly the rising by night is most potent for governing (the soul), and most suitable for (framing) the Word (of Prayer and Praise).

name: Tyranny
translation: But they sought victory and decision (there and then), and frustration was the lot of every powerful obstinate transgressor.

name: Rizq
translation: And in heaven is your Sustenance, as (also) that which ye are promised.
One Day He will say, "Call on those whom ye thought to be My partners," and they will call on them, but they will not listen to them; and We shall make for them a place of common perdition.

name: Taqwa
translation: So We made it an example to their own time and to their posterity, and a lesson to those who fear Allah.

name: Truth and Honesty
translation: O ye who believe! Fear Allah and be with those who are true (in word and deed).

name: Taqwa
translation: Those who believe and (constantly) guard against evil;-

name: Taqwa
translation: But We shall save those who guarded against evil, and We shall leave the wrong-doers therein, (humbled) to their knees.

name: Taqwa
translation: O ye who believe! Fear Allah, and (always) say a word directed to the Right:

name: Truth and Honesty
translation: And he who brings the Truth and he who confirms (and supports) it - such are the men who do right.
And they have taken (for worship) gods other than Allah, to give them power and glory!
All that they do is noted in (their) Books (of Deeds):
(Of just such wrath) as We sent down on those who divided (Scripture into arbitrary parts),-
It is these who hasten in every good work, and these who are foremost in them.
Now have We caused the Word to reach them themselves, in order that they may receive admonition.

name: Creation
translation: And ye certainly know already the first form of creation: why then do ye not celebrate His praises?
Nay, this surely is an admonition:
Let any who will, keep it in remembrance!

name: On Wisdom
translation: This is what we rehearse unto thee of the Signs and the Message of Wisdom.
But only as an admonition to those who fear (Allah),-
And this is a blessed Message which We have sent down: will ye then reject it?
Shall We then take away the Message from you and repel (you), for that ye are a people transgressing beyond bounds?
Verily this is an Admonition: therefore, whoso will, let him take a (straight) path to his Lord!

name: Jahannam / Hell
translation: If any of them should say, "I am a god besides Him", such a one We should reward with Hell: thus do We reward those who do wrong.
If any does good, the reward to him is better than his deed; but if any does evil, the doers of evil are only punished (to the extent) of their deeds.

Except for those who repent, mend (their lives) hold fast to Allah, and purify their religion as in Allah's sight: if so they will be (numbered) with the believers. And soon will Allah grant to the believers a reward of immense value.
Therefore stand firm (in the straight Path) as thou art commanded,- thou and those who with thee turn (unto Allah); and transgress not (from the Path): for He seeth well all that ye do.

name: Revenge
translation: Even if We take thee away, We shall be sure to exact retribution from them,

name: Revenge
translation: One day We shall seize you with a mighty onslaught: We will indeed (then) exact Retribution!
If any do good, good will (accrue) to them therefrom; and they will be secure from terror that Day.
Not one of you but will pass over it: this is, with thy Lord, a Decree which must be accomplished.
This, because they said to those who hate what Allah has revealed, "We will obey you in part of (this) matter"; but Allah knows their (inner) secrets.
The Day that (all) things secret will be tested,

name: Rizq
translation: They say: "If we were to follow the guidance with thee, we should be snatched away from our land." Have We not established for them a secure sanctuary, to which are brought as tribute fruits of all kinds,- a provision from Ourselves? but most of them understand not.

name: Nafs
translation: Others they keep away from it, and themselves they keep away; but they only destroy their own souls, and they perceive it not.

name: Nafs
translation: Every soul will be (held) in pledge for its deeds.

name: Qiyamah
translation: (Then) shall each soul know what it hath sent forward and (what it hath) kept back.
In that he looketh upon himself as self-sufficient.
And watch them (how they fare), and they soon shall see (how thou farest)!
And watch (how they fare) and they soon shall see (how thou farest)!

name: Swearing
subtopic1: Guidance’s Book to Return to Ward God
translation: So I do call to witness what ye see,
And what ye see not,
But never did a single one of the signs of their Lord reach them, but they turned away therefrom.
Seest thou not those that dispute concerning the Signs of Allah? How are they turned away (from Reality)?-
Say: "Behold all that is in the heavens and on earth"; but neither Signs nor Warners profit those who believe not.

name: Humility
translation: If (such) were Our Will, We could send down to them from the sky a Sign, to which they would bend their necks in humility.
Of Him seeks (its need) every creature in the heavens and on earth: every day in (new) Splendour doth He (shine)!
Has the story reached thee, of the forces-

name: Allah knows the unseen
translation: Neither doth he withhold grudgingly a knowledge of the Unseen.

name: About Difficulties
translation: We will indeed make smooth for him the path to Misery;
Or have ye a book through which ye learn-

name: Guidance
translation: They are on (true) guidance, from their Lord, and it is these who will prosper.
Then, O my Lord! put me not amongst the people who do wrong!

name: Qiyamah
translation: And ye shall be sorted out into three classes.
There have already come to them Recitals wherein there is (enough) to check (them),
So announce to them a Penalty Grievous,
There will then be (left) no subterfuge for them but to say: "By Allah our Lord, we were not those who joined gods with Allah."
Can lead (any) into temptation concerning Allah,
And ye shall certainly know the truth of it (all) after a while.

name: Qiyamah
translation: Verily We have brought the Truth to you: but most of you have a hatred for Truth.

Whenever there cometh down a Sura, they look at each other, (saying), "Doth anyone see you?" Then they turn aside: Allah hath turned their hearts (from the light); for they are a people that understand not.
And say: "I am indeed he that warneth openly and without ambiguity,"-
This is a Warner, of the (series of) Warners of old!

name: On Wisdom
translation: Mature wisdom;- but (the preaching of) Warners profits them not.
But how (terrible) was My Penalty and My Warning?
A warning to mankind,-
Is this the legacy they have transmitted, one to another? Nay, they are themselves a people transgressing beyond bounds!

name: Dawah
translation: And lower thy wing to the Believers who follow thee.
Say: "Think ye, if the punishment of Allah comes to you, whether suddenly or openly, will any be destroyed except those who do wrong?
When (thus) Our punishment took them, no cry did they utter but this: "Indeed we did wrong."
If but a breath of the Wrath of thy Lord do touch them, they will then say, "Woe to us! we did wrong indeed!"
Say: "O my Lord! if Thou wilt show me (in my lifetime) that which they are warned against,-
And the Word will be fulfilled against them, because of their wrong-doing, and they will be unable to speak (in plea).
And verily, for those who do wrong, there is another punishment besides this: But most of them understand not.

name: Allah knows the unseen
translation: Yet no faith will the greater part of mankind have, however ardently thou dost desire it.

name: Health
mainTopic1: Allah is Sufficient for me; on Him do the Reliant Rely
translation: If Allah touch thee with affliction, none can remove it but He; if He touch thee with happiness, He hath power over all things.

name: Taqwa
translation: Say to those who do not believe: "Do what ever ye can: We shall do our part;

name: Listening to Qur'an
translation: Those to whom We sent the Book before this,- they do believe in this (revelation):

name: Mothers
translation: Then do We abase him (to be) the lowest of the low,-

name: Revenge
translation: But turn away from them, and say "Peace!" But soon shall they know!

name: Riba (interest)
translation: Nor expect, in giving, any increase (for thyself)!

name: Inheritance
translation: Seest thou one who turns back,

name: Revenge
translation: So wait thou and watch; for they (too) are waiting.

name: Taqwa
translation: Alif, Lam, Mim, Sad.

name: Taqwa
translation: And wait ye! We too shall wait.

name: Taqwa
translation: So make no haste against them, for We but count out to them a (limited) number (of days).

name: Taqwa
subtopic1: Guidance’s Book to Return to Ward God
translation: Ta. Sin. Mim.

name: Truth and Honesty
translation: Say: "Then bring ye a Book from Allah, which is a better guide than either of them, that I may follow it! (do), if ye are truthful!"

name: On Wisdom
mainTopic1: Coloration of Maker – Variegation of Creator
translation: Ya Sin.

name: Qiyamah
translation: But if they turn back, Say: "I have proclaimed the Message to you all alike and in truth; but I know not whether that which ye are promised is near or far.

name: Qiyamah
translation: This day plead not for a single destruction: plead for destruction oft-repeated!

name: Qiyamah
translation: They see the (Day) indeed as a far-off (event):

name: Qiyamah
translation: So leave them to plunge in vain talk and play about, until they encounter that Day of theirs which they have been promised!-

name: Qiyamah
translation: For what Day are these (portents) deferred?

name: Qiyamah
translation: And that which is (locked up) in (human) breasts is made manifest-
Truly strong is the Grip (and Power) of thy Lord.

subtopic2: Allah Knows Hearts, Consistent return to Allah, Value of Righteous Deeds
translation: Your Lord knoweth best what is in your hearts: If ye do deeds of righteousness, verily He is Most Forgiving to those who turn to Him again and again (in true penitence).
By no means hath he fulfilled what Allah hath commanded him.

subtopic2: Preparation for the Afterlife, Awareness of Deeds, Allah Know Actions
translation: O ye who believe! Fear Allah, and let every soul look to what (provision) He has sent forth for the morrow. Yea, fear Allah: for Allah is well-acquainted with (all) that ye do.
A questioner asked about a Penalty to befall-

subtopic2: Affirmation of Revelation, Characteristics of the Righteous
translation: And he who brings the Truth and he who confirms (and supports) it - such are the men who do right.
Those who strive against Our Signs, to frustrate them, will be given over into Punishment.
And most of them believe not in Allah without associating (other as partners) with Him!
But people have cut off their affair (of unity), between them, into sects: each party rejoices in that which is with itself.
Soon shall We settle your affairs, O both ye worlds!
Those for whom the good (record) from Us has gone before, will be removed far therefrom.
Is then one who is on a clear (Path) from his Lord, no better than one to whom the evil of his conduct seems pleasing, and such as follow their own lusts?

Say: "I am but a man like yourselves, (but) the inspiration has come to me, that your Allah is one Allah: whoever expects to meet his Lord, let him work righteousness, and, in the worship of his Lord, admit no one as partner.
Ain. Sin. Qaf.
The Word is proved true against the greater part of them: for they do not believe.
And (remember) Zakariya, when he cried to his Lord: "O my Lord! leave me not without offspring, though thou art the best of inheritors."
And indeed We will make them taste of the Penalty of this (life) prior to the supreme Penalty, in order that they may (repent and) return.

subtopic2: Signs and Nearness of the Hour
translation: Men ask thee concerning the Hour: Say, "The knowledge thereof is with Allah (alone)": and what will make thee understand?- perchance the Hour is nigh!
But whosoever turns away from My Message, verily for him is a life narrowed down, and We shall raise him up blind on the Day of Judgment.

subtopic1: Guidance’s Book to Return to Ward God
translation: Ta. Sin. Mim.
To Us are known those of you who hasten forward, and those who lag behind.
Is then one who walks headlong, with his face grovelling, better guided,- or one who walks evenly on a Straight Way?
